Great location and clean, good staff, and great breakfast. I marked them down on service due to the wifi on 9th floor.
Gute lage im touristenquartier, viele restaurants mit verschiedensten angeboten in der nähe. Geräumige zimmer, ausgezeichnetes frühstück mit grosses auswahl.
Hotellet såg fantastiskt i lobbyn och personalen var väldigt hjälpsam men rummen var otroligt nersliten.

Comfortable bed and clean room. The wifi was spotty when away from the room. The roof bar did not exist. The bar on the 7th floor by the pool was nice. Never had breakfast there because it ended to early for me. Staff was friendly and helpful. Nice location. Hot shower and air-conditioning worked well.
Easy to get to imperial city, tombs, etc. Great place, nice rooms

Abbiamo soggiornato io e mia figlia per una notte il 22 agosto. L hotel è più bello all interno che all esterno. Avevamo una suite ai piani alti da cui si gode il panorama (anche se in parte limitato da altro hotel di fronte) del fiume. La città di hue non ha nulla di particolare se non la città imperiale. Dall asia si arriva o a piedi (circa 15 minuti passando il ponte sul fiume) oppure con il risciò (50.000 dong pari a circa 3 dollari per due persone) oppure con il taxi. Il personale è gentile ed efficiente. Ottima come sempre in vietnam la colazione
The lobby was hot as well as the hallways. The rooms were fine but need some updating. Excellent breakfast buffet. Very nice staff
One of the front clerk was very rude! rooms are outdated and smell horribly.
Hotel bien situé dans la ville de hué, à proximités des restaurants et des lieux à visiter.
Zimmer mit balkon zahlreiche restaurants in direkter umgebung hoteleigene dachterasse - pool (zu klein, nicht schön)

Asia hotel is bang in the middle of the action of hue. It s a great location and there are loads of great restaurants nearby (check out elegant restaurant and red chilli). The swimming pool is in the dining area which is a bit weird but didn t bother me. Breakfast buffet was good. Recommended.
객실이 깨끗하고 넓고, 관광 쇼핑 식사에 매우 편리한 호텔임. 바로 앞에 가격대비 훌륭한 식당들이 많이 있으며, 종업원들이 아주 친절하고 조식도 좋음
Good hotel, good location, nice big rooms, good breakfast. Hotel could do with a refresh. Didn t use the spa facilities, looked like it could do with an upgrade. Pool was good.
Great hotel in central location. Within 10-15min wall of the old palace and citidel.
주변관광지 가깝고 호텔시설 가성비높음/ 직원 친절히 응대해주어서 인상적임
Great staff and really convenient with some excellent views over the city and river
Fantastic location!!! kind and helpful staff, clean rooms, very comprehensive breakfast. Overall, it was a very good experience
このホテルの前の道は歩行者天国になっていました フエは相対的に静かな場所におもえますが 騒音もなくゆっくりできました 駅からタクシーで行くと タクシーの運転手さんがホテルに電話をかけてくれポーターさんが迎えにきてくれました 夜遅かったのですが 安心できました 朝食も良かったです
Hotel is centrally located near the market. Hotel staff was courteous and helpful.

L hotel est situé en plein centre-ville. Il porte très bien ces 4 étoiles et quoi dire de l expérience client... Nous devions quitter l établissement pour 5h30 du matin vers l aéroport, le taxi avec un petit dejeuner nous attendais à notre sorti de la chambre. La cerise sur le gateau, nous avions réservé dernière minute, par manque de chambre disponible, ils nous ont tout simplement installé dans une superbe suite au 10 ème étage. Wow!

Staying at the asia hotel hue was a really good experience. Clean, spacious room. Easy check in. The very best thing however was the location, right in the middle of the backpacker street with plenty of restaurants, bars and such. Despite the location my room on the 10th floor was completely quiet.

일 때문에 자주 방문하는편입니다 주변 흥장,무엉탄,임페리얼,자스민 숙박과 비교하였을때 가격 서비스 모두 만족스러웠습니다. 식사공간이 좀 작았지만 다양한 메뉴가 있으면 조금씩 자주 준비되기때문에 조식 뷔페의 품질은 임페리얼호텔보다 좋았습니다. 객실은 무엉탄 호텔과 비슷한 수준이며 일반객실임에도 불구하고 40인치 삼성 스마트 tv가 있으며 다양한 채널을 이용할수 있었습니다. 전반적으로 매우 만족스럽습니다.
주변호텔에 비해 관리가 잘 되어있습니다. 아침식사하는곳이 좀 어수선하고 단체관광객들이 많이 와서 다소 시끄럽습니다.
Room is very comfortable and clean. We did enjoy it. Thanks

We booked a king bed but when we checked in we were told they only have a room with twin beds left but tried to upsell us to a suite for double the booking cost. For the second night they moved us to a king bed. The shower in our first room was aweful, could barely adjust the cold water and often had hot scolding water. The place is pretty weathered and feels dark inside. They also wanted to book us a tour which was more than double than what you can fine at any of the travel tour agencies in town. Calling this a 3 star hotel is s very big stretch. We also woke up to very loud music which ended up being music coming from their event space on the top floor, had to ask the front desk to have them lower it - seems like they were prepping for an event that evening. The beds are also very firm (hard)
部屋がきれいで 立地もよく快適でした お湯の出がちょっとわるかったかな プールがちょっと期待はずれ 近くの床屋の耳かきが最高
The location is perfect for sightseeing, nur also really good restaurants and shops are directly in front of the house. Staff is really nice

We got upgraded to honeymoon suite which was lovely so can t comment on standard rooms. Bed huge and comfortable. Swimming pool very small. Breakfast buffet was small and a bit strange but thats ok...overall would recommend and staff were lovely, helpful and polite. And hue is a beautiful town
Fint hotel, god service og central beliggenhed. Lækker morgenmad

The hotel itself needs a good refresh. Rooms are ok but when you look into the details you see that it starts to be outdated painting, curtains, bathroom... It is also very baddy soundproofed. If you are a light sleeper or have a noisy neighbors just call reception they are super efficient. On the good side the service is very good and the location is ideal lots of restaurants and bars in the street and also some shops and travel agents. Taxi to the imperial palace is about 30,000. In terms of room choice, x09 and x10 are right on the lift lobby. 7th floor is the restaurant and the pool so i would suggest these rooms just below the pool 602, 604, 606 and 608 (at the end of the corridor by the staircase).
Das personal war etwas abweisend. Die räumlichkeiten etwas stickig und muffig. Der hoteleingang wurde gerade renoviert. Aber daraus resultierten keine lärmbelästigung.

L accueil de l hotel était mauvais et la personne ne cessait de me dire don t worry my friend . Après avoir attendu 30 min et rouspété auprès de la manager, nous avons été surclassé. Le petit déjeuner était bien.

It was a decent hotel for its price. The location is great for walking aroubd.the perfume river is also walking distance away. The only downfall is the wifi was terrible from our room and they only provide one room key which was really inconvenient when i wanted to go out a little late.
Magnifique chambre au 10eme étage dans cet hôtel du centre ville. Dommage que la piscine soit glaciale

Very dirty! when i checked in the room, there are some shirts left-behind from the previous guest. Then cockroach are found inside my shoes! during breakfast, lots of ants! the cleanliness is not acceptable. And the pillow is not comfortable. Makes my shoulder pain. The lift is so old that you cant use it. The television, is useless. The breakfast is not eatable, the fruit juice is so water....
Breakfast buffet, troubled by the bad manners of chinese group guests.
Convenient location...staff were great

Stayed for two nights. Near lotsa food outlets, coffeeshops, etc. Safe enough neighborhood albeit with pushers claiming their stock is from laos but won t bother you if you say no. No signs of open prostitution either. Room itself is good and value for money. Shower is disappointing as there s not sufficient water pressure and mixing hot cold isn t friendly. Good overall. Won t mind staying here again. Taxi fare is 40k to the train station.
Receptionist,porter,staff of breakfast restaurant are impolite and unkind,never stay again.
Receptionist,porter,staff of breakfast restaurant are impolite and unkind,never stay again.
Lät att hitta till hotelet.
멜리아 다낭. 호이안 리버타운에 있었는데 제가 느끼기로는 조식이 가장 맛있었고 방도 쾌적했습니다. 드라이 비용이 상당히 저렴했던 걸로 기억. 위치도 신시가지에 딱! 만족스러웠어요.

Hôtel bien situé dans un quartier central. Chambre spacieuse et bien entretenue. L acceuil est bon mais manque un peu de chaleur. Buffet du petit déjeuner copieux. Par contre, le wifi ne fonctionne que partiellement avec pas mal d interruption.
Lovely hotel. Great quality especially for price. Great streets around it. Restaurant and drinkeries for all types of tourist. Wished we d stayed longer
飲み屋街がすぐあり 飲んでもすぐ戻れるホテルです 従業員の対応も若干私語が多い気もしましたが 程よい対応です 食堂ではじめ冷房がついていなくて暑かったですが 依頼すればつけてくれるようでした 全体的に値段相応のホテルだと思います

O hotel é péssimo. Fede a mofo, cama cheia de ácaros, todos os materiais que usaram é de segunda. Serviço péssimo, recepcionistas que não falam inglês e com má vontade pra tudo. Um erro. Não pode ser 4 estrelas. Um hotel grande, que vende pacote para grandes excursões, caótico. Apenas a localização presta.
El hotel está bastante viejo, el elevador es muy lento y las camas no están muy cómodas.

The purpose of our trip to vietnam this time was to stay at this hotel, which we had long wanted to experience. It took us about three hours from hoi an, but it was truly worth it. The hotel is magnificent, beautifully renovated from an old building, and its solid, luxurious presence is something that could hardly be built today. The room we stayed in was spacious and located at the center of the property, offering stunning views that allowed us to overlook the entire building. The scenery from our room was simply breathtaking. As a special highlight of our stay, we reserved the royal court cuisine dinner at the hotel restaurant. We dressed in royal costumes and enjoyed a unique dining experience at a beautifully prepared setting. Each dish was crafted with great care, and not only the flavors but also the presentation and atmosphere allowed us to fully enjoy the meal with all five senses. It was one of the most fascinating and memorable experiences we have ever had. The staff member who served us during dinner was exceptionally kind. They eased our nervousness, encouraging us to fully embrace the roles of king and princess, which made the evening even more enjoyable. They also explained the dishes in detail and kindly shared recommendations of places to visit in hue, which we truly appreciated. We were also able to relax at the hotel and enjoyed a pleasant evening stroll along the nearby river, which was a delightful experience. Although the hotel is a little distant from
It s a beautiful hotel with history. The decor is impeccable to small details. The service staff are good, too.

I find my entire short stay at the hotel very warm and memorable! throughout the entire time we we re there, we had received services that were outstanding but truly genuine from all the staffs that we encountered from the front desk manager tam, to khanh and another young lady at reception who went out of their ways to make us felt at home from simple thing like trying to get us the kind of tea i wanted to buy ! restaurant staffs who served us dinner also were very attentive and helpful! the hotel has been newly renovated since we last stayed. It s azerai now and for sure it has lived up to its name! the room design s still faithfully art deco as the entire historical building first built by the french! it s spacious and tastefully decorated! the food was excellent too ! i have nothing but praise for this hotel!
We really enjoyed our stay here staff were friendly and helpful. Pool was large. Rooms very comfortable. We will definitely stay here again
Vị trí tốt. Tuy nhiên do khách hàng ít nên cắt bỏ nhiều dịch vụ, khách hàng không có trải nghiệm kỳ nghỉ đầy đủ.
Beautiful property! large rooms. Great bathrooms personal service
Staffs were very kind. Not very fluent in english, but no problem at all in communication. I came to respect vietnamese.
Điểm thích đồ đạc và thiết kế tinh tế, view đẹp điểm ko thích ko có bồn tắm, giường nằm hơi mềm dễ bị đau cổ
Good hotel in central location
Great service and friendly people! truly unique experience in great hotel. Highly recommend staying there.
Fantastic stay. The service delivery team delivered and exceeded expectations. Room layout amenities stylists and align to overall decor. Ideal location.
Very nice stay with great views of the river. Defo recommend

My friend and i had an amazing stay at the azerai. Everything was perfect. The room was clean and very comfortable. The staff are so helpful and nice. My friend went to the spa and loved it (it s pricey for vietnam but he said it was worth it). There is a very nice pool and gym as well. I highly recommend staying at the azerai!

The hotel is in excellent location- right next to walking strip along the perfume river. Oue expedia reservations cane with free upgrade to room to. River view with balcony. It was great. Staff is super friendly. We were celebrating our 25th wedding anniversary. And they decided the room and surprised my wife with a bouquet of a dozen roses and a cake
Magnifique emplacement. Très beau jardin. Atmosphère détendue. Près de la cité impériale.
The property is beautiful and the staff couldn t be more welcoming. And the breakfast was great!

Hue is an amazing city not to be by missed in any trip to vietnam. The residence azarai was truly exceptional. Beauty and comfort combined with h the best service we have ever had in any hotel in the world. Everybody was going out of its way to help, assist and make our stay truly exceptional porganizing amazing tours, scheduling transportation and reserving on great restaurants. Two individuals were particularly helpful lam, the rooms manager and moon, the client service manger. Nobody gets better than them in the hotel business !! bravo !
Beautiful property and room. Former french governor s residence in vietnam. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Pool looked amazing although we didn t swim with the cool and cloudy weather.
Have no complaints, just completely happy with our stay. Excellent staff.

C est une institution a hué ! l hôtel est magnifique véritable monument art déco remarquablement situé au centre ville. Tout est superbe, les chambres, le hall, le salon et la salle de restaurant. Second séjour dans cet hôtel mythique et nous y reviendrons volontiers.
Fantastic staff and nice atmosphere. We felt like we had stepped back in time to different luxury.

Beautiful property in a great location overlooking the perfume river. If i had one gripe it would be the lack of storage in the bedroom, aside from a small wardrobe with 5 coat hangers, there s nothing. Aside from that it s a gorgeous hotel in all aspects with a great pool area. I wouldn t hesitate to stay again.

The best hotel in hue.the location,the old world charming through out the hotel,the all super friendly staffs,the nice restaurant are unforgettable.there was a technical problem with our room.although we were upsetted, we fully understand that it wasn t anyone s fault.but ms.tran thi minh tam took extra care of us.she s a magician who turned an upsetted beginning into an unforgettable happy ending.she and her team made us regret that our stay was too short.and want to stay at more azerai hotels.
Like stepping back in time to colonial french times. Beautiful hotel and very quiet. Convenient for the sights of hue. Only one night here but wished we d had longer.
Excellent location close to the river. High quality. Very comfortable. Could not ask for more
This is a jewel of a hotel. Exquisitely designed and first class service.

The azerai la residence hue was a great option for a first time visitor to hue. I had a room overlooking the huong (perfume) river and it offered a view of the imperial city s central bastion as well. It was located across the street from the ho chi minh museum, and the high school he attended while his family lived in hue. The hotel had amazing staff who were able to help with anything you might need. The restaurant was great and offered a river view as well. And they offered free bike rental, if you wanted to explore the city by scooter. It was great and it made my stay in hue feel like home!
Briljant hotel. Mooi gelegen, fantastisch personeel en prachtige kamers. In vietnam vind je dit soort hotels bijna niet. Het azerai is een prachtige uitzondering.

Excellent séjour dans un hôtel à la fois luxueux et plein de charme. Piscine idéale pour se relaxer au calme. Personnel très attentionné avec une mention particulière pour la concierge madame nguyet qui s est montrée d une gentillesse et d une efficacité remarquable. Tous les atouts pour séjour de trois nuits très réussi.

Room was great. Bed and pillows very comfortable. Well maintained property with a lot of charm. Excellent breakfast, and restaurant. Service is exceptional, especially ms. Nguyet, customer service, ms. Mơ, restaurant, mr. Anh reception, and the very helpful woman (sorry, i forgot her name) from reception who helped us book train tickets and check on some scheduling changes at our next destination. It was also a special anniversary, and la residence helped to make it so. Thank you all!
Séjour fantastique, personnel très professionnel. Le spa de grande qualité. Le massage azerai signature très complet et la masseuse très efficace.
とても良い滞在でした スパの時は裸なのでクーラーが寒かった 客が裸でいる場合は気温に気を付けて欲しい 客は温度変化に慣れていないので風邪をひくかもしれません マッサージの技術は最高でした
Un séjour inoubliable dans un hôtel au charme incroyable!

This was a marvellous choice of hotel in an excellent location by the perfume river. Often had a drink - in this case a singapore sling - in their stylish bar, a delight. Bedroom beautifully restored. The art deco design i began to to expect david suchet as hercule poirot to turn up. This was in total a real pleasure and i will go back, not least to savour the sights of hue again. Sorry not to have tried the pool.
Outstanding property. Would definitely stay again.
Very good fitness center with new equipment and a refurbished room.

The hotel is beautiful and the staff are amazing. I became sick during the trip and one of the staff walked my husband to the pharmacy and helped him order medicine for me. Then sent complimentary ginger tea up to the room for me. They couldn t have been more gracious and welcoming.

The property itself was lovely as was the staff. We ran into a wedding reception that took over the pool area for two days. We also had just come from a hotel in hoi-an that just did everything as well but for 35 less. We would still definitely recommend this hotel.

Attractive colonial style property with well-tended grounds. Comfortable and spacious room. Good location on edge of hue - 15 mins walk along river or 2 taxi. Some building work around hotel which can affect enjoyment of pool etc. Great staff and super customer service. Excellent restaurant recommendations
Th hotel is fantastic

Outstanding stay!! the staff was above and beyond friendly, helpful, and professional. The spa was very welcoming and had wonderful service. The hotel looked great and room was fantastic. Highly recommend and i would definitely stay again.
호텔 룸 수영장 모든 시설이 좋았습니다. 직원들 모두 표정이 밝고 친절하고 특히 기억에 남을 원데이 투어를 어레인지 해준 직원에게 감사합니다

Very welcoming and staff helpful. Full service including evening turndown, fresh towels and complementary welcome snacks and water. Refrigerator to provide cold water. Everything was perfect in and around hotel. Next to perfume river promenade so morning/evening strolling lovely. Walkable to citadel. Highly recommend and definitely stay again and again!
Classic beauty elegance supported by outstanding staff

Beautiful art deco hotel, spotlessly clean. Staff the best we ve encountered, nothing is too much. Private car amazing and very cost effective for trips. Food great. Location - on the perfume river. Local guides, we ll worth booking 10 out of 10
If you want the best of the best, you ll find it at azarai. Helpful and polite staff, clean and eco-friendly rooms, and top-notch restaurant. Will stay here again!

This hotel is exactly what you are looking for during a stay in hue calm, tranquility and comfort after a day of discovery. Perfect location, caring and very professional staff, impeccable cleanliness.
Fabulous and wonderful property. We had a river facing room and the balcony looked onto the citadel. Stunning vista. Highly recommend.
2 night stay, friendly staff and good location
Excellent hotel very friendly staff who are very engaging and can t do enough for you. Rooms are very good and we had a river view hotel is spotless. We eat breakfast and lunch which was really good

This property oversells itself as 5 star. It is more like 4 star. Rooms are small. We also booked two rooms with 2 queens for family. These rooms had two single beds not two queens. False advertising. Spa massage is excellent and food is good although can get boring if you stay many days. The view of the river is good but view is hindered by trees. The hotel could do a better job of using the outdoor area.
Fantastic hotel, with great facilities. The staff were second to none and pulled out every stop so we could have a lovely stay! truly exceptional service
Beautiful art deco hotel in our 2nd favourite city in viet nam.
Service et nourriture exceptionnel. Un cadre hors du commun, style colonial année 1930, avec tout le confort et la modernité possible. Une expérience magique.

Here s the revised version of your review --- i had an unforgettable stay at this stunning hotel, which is not only a historical landmark but also a true architectural gem. The beauty of the building is breathtaking, and every corner reflects elegance and charm. The rooms were impeccably clean, and the environment was simply beautiful, with a magnificent view overlooking the perfume river. The service here is simply outstanding every staff member was exceptionally attentive and kind, always quick to respond to any request. Overall, this hotel exceeded all of my expectations, and i would highly recommend it to anyone. I look forward to returning in the future!
V good - great pool and.spa

Despite weather that didn t allow us to enjoy the pool, we had a great stay. The hotel staff are very welcoming (and helpfully loaned umbrellas), the room was comfortable (great shower!), and the breakfast buffet was excellent. I would be happy to stay here again.
Outstanding excellent service and accommodation le parfum restaurant was delicious loved it all
Everything about this hotel was top quality.
A bit outdated hotel. Breakfest was less attractive than in other hotels in vietnam. The price was really high for vietnam and this level of the hotel.
Ett fantastiskt hotell.
Beautiful architectural style and furnishings. Very friendly and attentive staff in restaurant and bar. Enjoyed spa treatments

Every staff member showed genuine care and concern for their guests. Incredible hospitality all around. Each time we returned from being out and about, it felt like we were coming home. There is construction happening in front of the property and it is truly a shame, but the staff and amenities more than made up for this. Food was also excellent. Would recommend this place 100 times over to anyone visiting hue. Spa services were also amazing. Thank you nhi and nao for your excellent care!

The most exquisite hotel i stayed at on my trip to vietnam. Gorgeous rooms, wonderful amenities, tremendous bar and restaurant. I truly did not want to leave. The staff is exceptional. Best massage of my trip
This hotel is beautiful, full of character, with excellent service
Customer service was excellent
Building work next door.

Fantastic hotel! beautiful building, exquisite deco design, wonderful restaurant, exquisite rooms, terrific large pool. Everything about this place is magnificent. It justifies a visit to hue on its own but the tombs and imperial city are wonderful attractions too.
Stunning hotel with extraordinary friendly and helpful staff!

Hotel is superb with dedicated staff. No recognition of vip status at check-in or that i had been before. No upgrade from superior, advised no availability despite deluxe rooms being on sale throughout our 4 night stay.

Our stay at azerai in huế was exceptional. The building is absolutely stunning elegant, full of character, and beautifully preserved. The staff were warm and professional, and the facilities were excellent throughout. A special mention goes to oanh, the barman, who was not only skilled but also incredibly entertaining he added a lot of fun to our evenings. Every part of the hotel felt thoughtfully designed to offer a relaxing and memorable experience. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enjoy huế in comfort and style.

I have stayed in many international hotels over several decades. The staff here were outstanding and completely focussed on their residents. Nothing was too much trouble. Guest relations was incredible. E mails from uk instantly responded to and travel arrangements made with accurate professionalism when we arrived. The food provided is also worth a mention. It was excellent and beautifully presented.

Azerai la residence hue is truly one of the most elegant and charming hotels i ve ever stayed in. From the moment i arrived, everything exuded class, tranquility, and thoughtful attention to detail. The colonial-era architecture, lush gardens, and riverside setting created an atmosphere that was both refined and deeply relaxing. The staff were absolutely exceptional warm, professional, and genuinely attentive. They even went above and beyond to air ship a piece of clothing i had forgotten after check-out, which speaks volumes about their commitment to guest care. The pool and facilities were flawless, and the location is perfect peaceful yet just minutes from hue s top attractions. Every corner of the property feels beautifully curated and meticulously maintained. If you re looking for a place that combines historic charm, modern luxury, and five-star service, this is it. I can t wait to return.

Beautiful art deco hotel that is so immaculate in its facilities, attention to detail, service, and staff friendliness. Absolutely loved the pool, gym and spa. With spectacular sunrise views over the river. This is a little piece of paradise in hue
Very clean and very confortable. Personnel very helpful and efficient.
Beautiful property, great room, public areas are nicely appointed, beautiful pool, bars. Highly recommend.

We had a wonderful stay at the azerai in hue. The staff were courteous and helpful and arranged a couple of last minute tours for us around the area. The restaurant was lovely with a great selection of food (especially the desserts!), and the staff on the bar were especially kind and lovely during our stay. The room itself was comfortable and well equipped. The property is a little outside the hustle and hustle of hue, it s about a 20 min walk along the riverside to the city centre or a short taxi ride. This was fine for us but could imagine some might want to be closer to the action. Overall we had a great stay and would stay again next time we visit hue!
Increíble la residence, muy atentos todo el personal. Muy buen desayuno y magnifica ubicación. Regresaría sin pensarlo.
Excellent location for exploring hué. Stunning swimming pool beside the river - perfect for sunset. 5 star service at all times.
滞在中は スタッフの心地よい距離感のおかげでのんびりと過ごすことができました 凝った意匠のクラシックなホテルです 建築や細部にわたる衣装に興味がある方には もう一つの楽しみが待っています

Un voyage dans le passe colonial. Magnifique bâtiment art deco. Les meubles qui décorent le hall, le bar et les chambres du bâtiment principal sont d une grande beauté . Seul regret, il faut choisir entre vivre dans le batiment historique mais sans la vue sur le fleuve ou passer sur les annexes mais qui ont moins de charme. La gentillesse du personnel est a la hauteur du lieu.

Sehr nettes und professionelles personal, sehr schoene lage am fluss, ausgezeichentes fruehstuecksbuffet, gute drinks in der bar, grosser pool, toller fitnessraum, komfortables zimmer mit balkon zum park und alles in pures art deco style. Restaurant direktor arnaud sehr nett
設備は問題なし プールも席にタオルが備え付けられており 広さも十分 ２m以上と深いエリアもあるので注意 コンシェルジュの提案で500万ドンでタクシーを借りて ２箇所の郊外の寺院を見るツアーに参加したが とてもよかった ホテルは市内 宮殿 から若干距離あるので 歩きも可能だが 日中気温が高い時はタクシーが無難 客層は欧米系が多く 日本人客も若干
とにかくリゾートを味わいたいならこのホテルがお勧め 何から何までサービスで溢れてる プールも部屋もすべてが素晴らしい 英語が苦手なので少しだけ意味が伝わらないところもあったので日本語で分かるようになればまたいきたい
Colonial luxury in spacious grounds. Definitely worth the price. Stylish old world rooms.

This is a fantastic hotel! one of the absolute best hotels we have stayed at. This was the second time we stayed here, and we had no doubts about it when going to hué. The staff is incredibly nice and serviceminded. The hotel site is beautiful. The food is of high quality. The location is perfect - in the centre of hue, by the river bank, looking at the imperial city on the other side of the river. Yes it costs a lot, but if you can afford it, you should stay here.
Very well decorated and really helpful staff. A little out of the way.
値段相応のサービスでした 優雅に過ごせます

Absolutely loved staying three nights at this wonderful hotel. Staff is very friendly and service is impeccable. Great atmosphere. Organised a few private tours through the concierge and they were great. Also the small boutiques carry original well selected objects of vietnamese craftsmanship, not the usual ones you can pick up at more touristy markets. If ever back in hue i would stay here again.
ベトナムとは思えない静かな空間 フランス料理も美味しいです リバーサイド部屋からの景色はいいです

The hotel is beautifully decorated and very service oriented. The concierge desk followed up to make sure the tour they booked for us went well. I would highly recommend la residence when staying in hue.

My husband and i loved the warm and friendly greeting we received upon arrival and the hotel is beautiful. The french design from the simplicity of the architecture to the furnishings is so relaxing to the outside pool which waits. The breakfast la residence served was one of the best through our travels in vietnam!

Stunningly refurbished guest rooms, splendid and serene location along the perfume river, exquisite restaurant -- but above all, a fabulously thoughtful and supremely helpful staff that never missed a beat. You just can t find friendlier, better or more intuitive service than we found at the azerai la residence. Superb in every way!
Very comfortable and with great character, also relatively convenient to major sites and town centre.
We did not manage to stay here due to issues with my visa, but they were very helpful and good communicators. We will visit here one day.

Azerai hotels including this one have a level of service and facilities that is truly a cut above other 5 star hotels. There are many many small details they cover that others do not and this sets them apart. Its not just good coffee its excellent coffee, not just comfortable beds its really comfortable beds, and the people are just the best.
The staff is exceptionally attentive, helpful, and are always willing to accommodate requests.
Good hospitality
The stay was idyllic. A great location - and loved the bikes which took us the short distance to the historic city. The setting is perfect and the staff very friendly. We loved our stay
Excellent location,service, facilities, food. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely go back.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện. Thang máy rất nhỏ, 3-4 người là chật. Phòng nhỏ nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi, xinh.
Nhân viên k take care, k có chỗ để xe, để xe ngoài trời. Thang máy chỉ đứng đc 2 ng
Các nhân viên rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình!
Phòng sạch sẽ, bạn nhân viên thân thiện và lịch sự. Hơi xa trung tâm chút, nhưng mà khá ổn.
Sạch sẽ, giá phòng hợp lý, lần sau tới sẽ ghé
Nhân viên rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, ks giá cả rẻ nhưng đầy đủ tiện nghi
Nhân viên thân thiện
Ksan khá tuyệt vời các bạn lễ tân niềm nở vui vẻ tận tình tuy nhiên phòng ốc của mình vệ sinh ch kĩ lắm với cả wifi đôi lúc khá chập chờn
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, vị trí khá gần các nơi tham quan
Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, ks gần trung tâm, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại lần sau
Nhân viên dễ thương, ai cũng xinh nhìn có thiện cảm. Bá trung hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Phòng ốc khá tốt. Vị trí thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển. Lần sau sẽ ghé lại

Mở bài thật thu hút nào chia sẻ thêm về trải nghiệm của bạn không gian/cơ sở vật chất chia sẻ cảm nghĩ về không gian và cơ sở vật chất của khách sạn món ăn chia sẻ cảm nhận về những món được phục vụ nhân viên hỗ trợ miêu tả trải nghiệm với nhân viên khách sạn điểm sáng bạn có thể nói về những điểm khiến chuyến đi đáng nhớ giá cả chia sẻ quan điểm về giá trị nhận được so với giá tiền bỏ ra vị trí chia sẻ thêm về vị trí của khách sạn, ví dụ nó có nằm gần điểm tham quan/ăn uống nào không
Tiện nghi đầy đủ, dụng cụ vệ sinh có thêm dao cạo râu tiện lợi, nhà tắm rất tốt

Đặt được 1 chiếc phòng giá rẻ nhưng lại vô cùng ưng ý, nhân viên ở đây rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Khách sạn gần với các địa điểm nổi tiếng của huế nên dù chỉ ở 1 ngày nhưng bọn mình đã đi được hầu hết các chỗ rồi
Mọi thứ đều ok. Vị trí cách trung tâm không xa, giá rẻ, phòng sạch sẽ

Phòng nằm ở hẻm nhỏ, khá tối hầu như ko có đèn đường. Gần đường ray xe lửa nên lâu lâu tối ngủ có tiếng còi tàu. Nhân viên thì tạm tạm, giá thuê xe máy 140k, phòng thì rất nhỏ so với ảnh trên mạng, phòng cực kì chật. Được cái nhà vệ sinh sạch sẽ và đẹp. Tối ngủ mà quên đóng cửa sổ là mấy con bọ cam, muỗi vô ngủ chung. Ks này không có chỗ để xe máy nhé, tối ngủ để xe ở ngoài đường và ko có máy che. Ks có thang máy nhưng nhỏ xíu à, 2 người là chật rồi.
Kỳ nghỉ vừa qua thực sự là trải nghiệm tuyệt vời, để lại nhiều ấn tượng khó quên. Khách sạn hiện đại, sạch sẽ, bài trí tinh tế và ấm cúng, tạo cảm giác thư giãn ngay khi bước vào.

Điểm cộng phòng nhìn mới, sạch sẽ, nhân viên cũng nhiệt tình điểm trừ ngoại trừ cái tên ks là big, thì tất cả mọi thứ ở đây đều rất nhỏ bé. Đoàn mình ở 4 phòng tầng 5, thì có 2 phòng quá nhỏ và thấp, phòng lệch tường với trần nên nhiều chỗ trong phòng rất thấp, phải cần thận k là bị cụng đầu vào tường. 1 phòng nhà tắm cũng thấp phải cúi xuống, với bồn rửa mặt cực kì nhỏ, bằng nửa các bồn rửa bình thường nên rửa là nước té ướt hết người. - thang máy cũng siêu nhỏ, đứng dc 2 ng là vừa, 3-4 người (k hành lý) là phải nép sát vào nhau - máy sấy tóc phòng mình rất nhỏ, sấy còn bị kẹt tóc , cháy kết thành mấy cục nhỏ phải lấy kéo cắt tóc cháy đi, nên phải đi mượn phòng khác dùng - ở 2 đêm nhưng chỉ set up 2 chai nc lọc, uống thêm thì tính tiền so với giá 5xx/phòng/đêm thì mình thấy 2 phòng vát trần chất lượng chưa tương xứng với giá tiền.

Tôi đã note thời gian nhận phòng và trả phòng khi đặt phòng nhưng nhân viên khách sạn đã không để ý sắp xếp phòng cho tôi. Bòng đèn hành lang cứ bật tắt liên tục cộng với tiếng ồn từ phòng trên làm tôi khó ngủ.

Khách sạn ở ngay cạnh lăng vua dục đức nhưng hiện tại lăng đang tu sửa nên đóng cửa. Khách sạn có phòng đơn, giá cả hợp lý. Mình ở tầng 2, phòng mới và sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Duy nhất 1 điểm trừ đó là đèn tự động ngoài hành lang tắt bật nháy liên tục, mình hỏi nhân viên thì nhân viên nói có người qua thì nó mới nháy. Nhưng nó nháy liên tục ấy, cộng thêm cửa phòng là loại đèn sáng vẫn qua được mờ mờ, ở một mình nên có hơi sợ nên mình dùng bịt mắt mới ngủ được. Nhân viên tận tình.

Home siêu gần trung tâm, cách mỗi điểm đi chơi và các quán ăn tầm 2-3km thôi. Home sạch sẽ, thoáng và hỗ trợ check in- out cho khách rất nhanh. Rất recommend mọi người ở đây. Giá lại khá tốt nữa. Nếu có dịp tới huế chắc chắn sẽ quay trở lại

Mình có để đồ cụ thể là vòng vàng trong túi xách và để lại home, sau khi đi chơi về phát hiện mất đồ. Trong lúc không ở phòng home có cho người dọn lại phòng và mình có nhờ check cam được chỉ duy nhất khi dọn phòng là có người ra vào nhưng trong khi đó rác (là các ly nước hoa quả mình đã uống hết để vào góc thì không được vứt đi) đến ngày thứ 3 vẫn còn nguyên rác từ ngày mình nhờ bạn nhân viên check cam và liên lạc với quản lý từ sáng nhưng đến chiều quản lý mới trao đổi với mình trong khi đó 15h30 mình cần lên xe về hà nội home không chịu trách nhiệm với tài sản đồ đạc mất trong phòng mà đã đưa ra 2 hướng giải quyết - tự ra phường trình báo công an ( vì mình vội về và mình cũng không còn niềm tin là sẽ tìm lại được nếu vòng qua vòng lại nên mình bỏ qua) - home sẽ hoàn tiền phòng 2 ngày cho mình với khoảng hơn 600k còn tiền vòng của mình là hơn 6 triệu nên mình cũng thôi vì cảm giác nó không đáng. Mình chia sẻ lên đây để mn cân nhắc khi đặt phòng vì mình không được nhắc vêg vấn đề dọn phòng và phòng khi mình về thì vẫn để rác như vậy.
A perfect 10
I would highly recommend banyan tree lang co in central vietnam. Everything from the amenities to the dining options and staff service was world class!
This was a beautiful property . Our villa was beyond our expectations. All of the hotel staff were so friendly and very helpful. We absolutely loved our stay!!
Excellent spot for relaxation and restoration. First class service.

If you are looking for a beautiful place in nature where you can restore your spirit and calm your mind this is for you. Fantastic service and very well kept property. They will accommodate all your needs, just communicate them ) man is the best villa butler you could ask for. Thank you for a great stay.
Unbelievable place and service.

Since our arrival until our check out, our time at the banyan tree lang co has been fabulous. The only negative is that we stayed for only 5 nights. I wish it could have been more. Our lagoon view villa was beautiful, designed in a traditional style. Our preference over a large scale hotel resort. We had the use of bicycles for our stay which was perfect for getting around the complex. Lovely little paths and pretty lantern lit bridges to cycle or walk through. We ate in all the restaurants over the course of our stay and also tried out rice bowl next door in the angsana hotel. Every meal was delicious with exceptional service. We had what s app chat with our own villa host which felt personal. We enjoyed the beach with stunning sea views. Staff there would bring us complementary sorbet, water and snacks each day. We also enjoyed a couples massage in the spa. Another lovely experience. I have to say the staff really made the difference. Stand out service, smiles and hellos from everyone. We have stayed in lovely resorts in the past but the bayan tree lang co truly stands out. Would love to return.
Fantastic location, beautiful views, very friendly
The property was beautiful and the staff was friendly. Be sure to utilize the spa. Don t miss the incredible breakfast!
First class service
Exhilarating view, comfortable villa and quiet attentive service. Though the location a bit remote, the food at its outlet, particularly at zaffron, is exceptional. Highly recommended.
It s great! impeccable service

Incredible hotel and location with exceptional staff. Room exceeded expectations. Only downside is proximity to activities outside of the property. In some ways, this was a plus as it allowed us to take advantage of all the hotel had to offer including jet skis, paddle boards and gym
スタッフはとても親切で バトラーサービスもあり とても快適に過ごせました
The location and service are all excellent.

Banyan tree lang co, in da nang area is certainly one of the best resorts we have visited, in asia, and possibly in the world first and foremost - the service is attentive and maticulous the rooms are spacious, the private pools are wonderful. The public area - swimming pool and the beach are just fantastic food quality is decent only thing we did not appreciate was the private bbq grill in the villa it is one of the resorts that we would like to come back to highly recommended

We had a fantastic stay at the hotel during our trip with our parents. The entire staff was warm, friendly, and made us feel truly welcome. A special thank you to mr. Tuan, our manager. His exceptional service and kindness really stood out and made our experience even more memorable. We would love to come back again. Highly recommended!
Super ort - traumhafte lage - absolut ruhig - immer wieder
良かった

Wow!! i cannot stress how beautiful this holiday was. The staff were absolutely incredible, nothing was too much for them . They were helpful , friendly and knowledgeable. The villa was perfect. It was clean , comfortable and nothing hadn t been thought of . The in room check in after a long journey was a perfect touch . Fresh fruit , tea. Coffee , fresh towels and toiletries were stocked up daily . On the last night we arrived back to a beautiful bath with petals and fresh fruit . All the small things matter to the staff here . I would 100 return . A perfect holiday made better by fabulous staff and setting

Wir waren 2 wochen im banyan tree, das erste mal in vietnam. Die anlage ist wunderschön, die auswahl an restaurants gut vor allem aber der service und die freundlichkeit des personals sind unvergleichlich. Wir danken dem guest-servive nochmals von herzen für die tolle betreuung und den aufmerksamen service. Zu nennen vor allem win, unseren villa host man und alle weiteren verantwortlichen damen des gäste service teams für die vielen - nicht selbstverständlichen aufmerksamkeiten und die fürsorge. Danke! cảm ơn
Awesome setting comfortable bed

Our villa host, man was amazing!!!! super friendly, responsible, helpful, spontaneous and personable!!!! he has exceeded my expectations every time! an absolute super staff you have!!! the villa was clean and comfortable. Privacy was respected. Cleaning staff were quick and quite thorough. I also really like the maintenance option you have on the website so i can report any defects, which were all taken care of at the indicted time. A big thumbs up for your maintenance team too! greeters at the restaurants were all great! they remembered us by face and our orders from the day before ..amazing! shi was particularly attentive!!!! your spa is also of high standard loved the massages!!!! ladies there were skillful and gentle! in general, our stay with you was great! i would definitely recommend and have already recommended to our friends!
非常に良い滞在でした
너무 편안하고 아름 다운 호텔입니다

This was my second visit to banyan tree in 6 years, and i found the staff to be more friendly and the atmosphere more comfortable. For banyan tree management however, there were some imperfections in the service, such as the hammock in out the room being hung on the evening of the 3 or 4 day of our stay, and the few of conditioner. Additionally, as the facility has been in operation for over 10 years, i noticed signs of wear and tear in the furnishings and other areas of the facility. In my case, i communicated with the facility several times about my itinerary between making the reservation and arriving. There were no communication lapses, but i think that if i had been able to communicate directly with the butler once he had been assigned, i would have felt more at ease before my stay and my stay would have been smoother. Despite the significant changes in the world post-covid-19, the staff have continued to improve. For guests quality like many hotels, the guest demographic has deteriorated compared to 6 years ago, with an increase in guests lacking proper manners. In an era where everyone can easily travel overseas, many people seem to be visiting the resort despite some forcibly, prioritizing the present moment post-pandemic.
素晴らしいの一言 スタッフの献身性 施設のきれいさ 料理 どれも最高でした

Excellent hôtel , mais temps horrible , pluie durant nos 2 jours , pas pu profiter de la place et autres services de l hôtel à cause du mauvais temps , mais pas la faute de l hôtel , peut trouver plus d occupation à part les massages lorsqu il pleut ..
아름다운 자연환경을 가진 반얀트리 랑코 너무나 사랑스러운 리조트입니다. 친절한 직원들과 청결한 숙소의 컨디션은 여행을 한층 즐겁게 해 주었습니다. 가족과의 여행이나 친구 연인들의 여행에 적극 추천드립니다. 감사합니다. 반얀트리 랑코

Absolutely gorgeous resort! all of the hotel staff went above and beyond to ensure we had the best experience. I was also fortunate enough to celebrate my birthday during our stay, and phung, our villa host, coordinated with my girlfriend to make it the most special birthday ever! we would absolutely recommend staying at this resort if you re in the da nang/hue area.
Amazing location and view from our room. Staff excellent.

What an incredible and unique luxury hotel experience this was! banyan tree are a different type of hotel offering very personal experience throughout your stay. We stayed here for our honeymoon, and despite the weather not being on our side the hotel team did an awesome job and making up for it! we were greeting by our awesome host named bich, who took us up to our upgraded 2-bedroom sea view villa. Due to the colder rainy weather we were upgraded to have a heated jacuzzi so we could still enjoy the beautiful outdoors and the infinity pool! this was a very classy move the the team. We were surprised multiple times a day with lovely thoughtful gestures for our honeymoon, including an upgrade, complimentary spa treatment of couples massage for 60mins, and many cakes and sweet treats. The host made the effort to converse with us at breakfast every day and ensure they re taking feedback and optimising our experience at all times. She even went above and beyond by sourcing vegetarian food options for our in-room dining as my wife is vegetarian. The attention to detail was impeccable.
It was a comfortable resting place, and a free time.

自然豊かな環境にあるvillaで楽しめました レストランのバリエーションが少ないかと思ってましたが隣のアンサナホテルへはバギーで行き来できて便利です 隣接のゴルフコースのクラブハウスにはミニマートもありました 空港の送迎は無料で数便出ています また利用はしませんでしたが フエへは1人10usdで朝9時半出発 帰りは16時出発のバスがありました また車でそう遠くないところにランコーのシーフードレストランが道の両側にあるので楽しめると思います
Great stay

We can for sure give banyan tree lang co our very best recommendations. Service excellent service from all the staff. Location perfectly peaceful in a small bay. Pros delicious breakfast and selection of food. Cons deck around the main pool is worn out, and need renovation, consider to replace the paper drinking straw to metal or glass (it is really ignoring to have a delicious cocktail and after 5 minutes the paper straw is dissolved)

It was clear that the lockdown has caused some devastation to tourist industry in vietnam. However, i am not at all impressed by their policy of taking deposit without my permission. They took deposit from my debit card instead of just swiping, on the 9th may and they still ( 2 june) owe me the difference from deductions of our spend. They assured me it would be refunded within a week! we are on a 6 week tour and if every hotel had employed this policy we would have no funds left on the charge card to live on. The staff at reception desk appeared very inexperienced. On the positive the cart drivers, chamber maids, gardeners were absolutely happy and provided service with a genuine smile. The a la cart food in the vietnamese rest was amazing.
The hotel stay on the hidden place back are the mountain and facing to the ocean. Away from everything, crossing the tunnel every time you want to go đa nang and hoi an which is i like it very much.

This is a beautiful hotel where we were able to relax for a few days following a wonderful breakfast! despite some construction noise in the distance, our lagoon villa and magnificent views were great and some minor issues with the villa were quickly resolved. We had a wonderful meal at saffron which we would recommend.

We stayed for 2 weeks and did not want to leave. The villa was beautiful, and the staff and service was the next level! we ve never had such service at a hotel! our host and hostess tuan and bich were amazing making sure we had everything we needed, even arranging foot baths for us when we returned to our villa after a long day sight seeing. If you want a hotel to totally unwind, away from shops etc then this is the place to go! extra thank you to all the staff in the restuarants and the pool guys who looked after us every day as we relaxed. Also if you get the chance do try the spa as the deep tissue massage was the best i ve had.

Banyan tree lang co is a small piece of heaven, the villas are clean, comfortable and all have beautiful views. We were treated so well by all the staff and it felt like we were saying goodbye to family at the end of our stay. We are so in love with this area and resort that we are planning another trip here in the near future.
Outstanding get away on the middle coast of vietnam! lots of luxury and culture. If you like golf and spa you will love this place.
I visited christmas season so the weather was not the best, but thanks to the kind services and hospitality of everyone, it was one of my best vacations.

Everything about this place is amazing from the fresh flowers and fruit in the room to the bikes that guest can use to roam around property. Our villa was beautiful and steps away from the beach. The daily breakfast was standout with so many options and a mimosa station. The staff were by far the friendliest out of all the places we stayed in the past. We were too jet lagged to go out for dinner so we ordered room service they sent a delicious cake for my spouses bday with candles. We will definitely be back with friends.

I stayed at pool villa. It has a nice jakuji so we can swimming a bit even though cold and windy weather. Their cleaning service is great. Even though i didn t ask to make our room up, they keep managing our room with cleanness. Unlimited tea, coffee, cookies and water supplements. And turn down service is also great. They also provide extra blanket and heater based on my requests. The staffs are all amazing. Very well service minded and ready for helping me. Main reason to stay is hotel is playing a golf. Caddy is lind and very helpful. I am satisfied of the most of service in banyan tree.

A big thank you to the bayan tree hotel staff and managers for having taken such great care of us during our stay. Tuyen, thank you for handling all our needs ( hope we were not too demanding), huyen for daily suggesting new and very delicious vietnamese breakfast dishes and ensuring they were diet compliant, hung for the hand wash and tea ceremonies, oanh for organising the many surprises on my birthday, my and y duong for your exceptional welcome and always smiling days. Thank you phuoc, our buggy driver for taking us at night to angsana and saffron. We will also remember the housekeeping team handling our villa and surprising us every day with small gifts, cool set ups, relaxing flowery bath and the aromatherapy foot wash. Last but not least, thank you for the trips to hue and hoi an, with an exceptionally nice, safe, knowledgeable driver, canh. Overall, the trip was very enjoyable. Villa was very comfortable and well appointed. The hot jacuzzi was fun to use while raining and windy outside. Food wise, we never ate that much at breakfast. Dinners at water cress and saffron were top! both restaurants have great chefs and staff!

My partner and i decided to celebrate my birthday at the banyan tree in lang co. We drove through hai van pass to arrive at this paradise where the staff welcomed us with warm hospitality. The dinner at the water court was particularly memorable - vietnamese cuisine at its best - i was really pleased to have this opportunity to sample fine vietnamese food (not just international menu). Breakfast and room service were also delicious. The attention to detail in the level of service is also excellent - discreet but present, personal and personable. Highly recommend for a special treat!
Amazing staff. Could not be more helpful or do more to make your stay the most enjoyable possible

다낭에서 너무 멀다 많이 떨어지는 접근성에 비해서 셔틀 운영은 개선이 필요하다 리조트가 평화롭고 청결하고 직원들도 친화적이고 거의 모든 부분 완벽했다 특히 담당 직원이 아주 친절했고 기분 좋고 편안한 분위기였다 그 외 마주치는 모든 직원들이 거의 다 친절했다 하지만 상황에 맞지 않는 식당 입장시 드레스코드 요구는 이해 할 수가 없었다 그리고 바닷가쪽 식당을 낮에 매일 이용했었는데 남자 직원은 교육이 필요할 것 같다 이유없이 실실 웃고 (친절한 미소가 아닌 불쾌한 표정) 내 영어 발음을 지적했다 못 알아들은게 아니라 말 그대로 지적을 했다 샌드위치 잘라달라는 말이었는데 참 어이가 없었다

Great relaxing stay at banyan tree. We ate in all five restaurants including the rice bowl in sister hotel angsana - the rice bowl restaurant is very nice. Spa treatments were lovely, professional and extremely relaxing. Golf was challenging but amazing. Staff meet your every need and lastly the pool suites resort is beautiful.
スタッフの気遣いが素晴らしかったです
Amazing place to enjoy beautiful nature, totally relaxing. The hotel is beautiful, whole team is very friendly and professional. Hope will be back soon
快適に過ごせました
Beautiful resort with outstanding staff. Peaceful and relaxing. Hillside villa view of the beach is picturesque. The villa is amazing.

Weather was atrocious which put a bit of a dampener on the stay but obviously the hotel cannot control that. Staff were friendly and enthusiastic if a little overwhelmed at peak times. Biggest gripe was lack of food and beverage choices with only 2 restaurants open and limited menu items. Food quality was okay, not great given the cost of it relative to outside the resort.
Great service - fabulous accommodation (hill side villa pool with ocean view of the bay)
Staff are friendly and smiley, attentive to our needs too. Hope to be back again.

All staff at the banyan tree were so helpful and happy. We had a very relaxing time and our villa hosts were fantastic in getting anything we needed organised. We were especially surprised by the anniversary and birthday surprises they arranged.
We loved the peacefulness and calm
다낭에서 머무는데 너무 좋은숙소였습니다 아코르 플러스 이용시 식사도 저렴해지구요 추천드려요
Paradise

Villas are far away from the lobby and a buggy ride is necessary. The dining on property is somewhat limited. Resort location is beautiful and staff are very friendly. We were upgraded and very spacious. Can t really complain about anything except the two things above. At least in our room, there was a kitchen so if we knew, we would have probably brought something to cook. However, no convenience store or anything on property and anything local was not near by.
6박했고요 아무것도 할것도 없고 엑티비티 모조리 별로구 식당 겁나 비싸구 청소도 더러워요 하얏트에서 5박했는데 하얏트에서 11박 안한게 너무 후회 됩니다 접근성 전혀 없고요
Beautiful property in remote location
My wife and i fully enjoyed the stay here with the kind care of phung who took good care of all our needs and request. A good sanctuary to relax. Love the champagne breakfast to kick start our day.

We had the most amazing time at the banyan tree lang co. Our beach pool villa was incredible. The pool has a great size for swimming and the jacuzzi is heated. And you are just a short walk from the beach and you have a beautiful view of the beach from the comfort of the villa. While we were there we enjoyed a deep tissue couples massage, which was one of the best massages i ever had - the masseuse totally made the bump at the back of my neck disappear. I am just in awe of her technique! we also enjoyed dinner twice at the saffron restaurant, which has some of the best thai food we ever had. The chef comes to greet her guests personally and the staff is just wonderful. And this is true for the overall experience here - the staff was so professional, friendly and thoughtful. We even received little gifts every evening and there is also a complimentary snack brought to you in the afternoon. The watercourt restaurant where breakfast is served is also very, very good and the staff will prepare delicious dishes for you on demand and also cut fresh fruit for you! unfortunately, i do not have all the names of the incredible staff we met, but a big thank you to mi, ngan, hai and the manager dao. We enjoyed our stay tremendously and will hopefully be able to come back soon
スタッフがとても親切で 接客に心がこもっていて 心地良い滞在でした あいにく雨天でしたが 有料無料のサービスプログラムが多く楽しめました 1泊しかできなかったのが残念です 次回は5日ほど滞在したい
施設に入ったら特別な雰囲気を感じられる ベトナムとは思えない完成した場所でした
Lovely resort, the staff were great
Veldig pent og rolig sted. Topp service

In a formerly war torn part of vietnam, this hotel stands as a wonderful oasis of peace and tranquility. We can t speak too highly of this hotel to which we return every year. The rooms - we stayed in a sea view hill pool villa - have fantastic views and are huge providing a real sense of space and privacy. The quality of the food is excellent as well but what makes this place truly exceptional is the quality of service. The staff are so friendly and go to huge lengths to ensure guests stays are as close to perfection as possible. Its the little touches that we liked - lovely birthday cake and tree planting ceremony on birthdays and the traditional vietnamese afternoon tea experience.

Beautiful resort with very friendly staff. Spend nearly two weeks in a big sea view villa christmas/ new years 2024/25 rain every day! nearly all the time ! nothing to do at the resort when it is raining except massage and restaurants.
Beautiful resort with excellent spa
The views are amazing. One direction you have the ocean the other amazing mountains
Best service out there, at banyan tree lang co they go above and beyond in terms of service. Everything was excellent! special thanks to bich and nhi from angsana.
空港から遠いけど それを上回るぐらい最高のホテルでした 景色も最高 サービスも最高 そして 何より部屋がとても素敵でした レストランもアンサナも使えてよかったです バギーも呼ぶとすぐに来てくれて凄く良かったです
深夜便で到着 3歳の孫が居たためアーリーチェックインの対応をしていただき大変ありがたかったです 滞在中は 担当の方とラインでのやりとりでゴルフの予約など手配をスムーズにしていただき 大変助かりました 朝食も種類が豊富でとても心地よく過ごせました
非常によかった
Absolutely out of this world
조용하게 휴가를 즐기기에 너무 좋았어요. 모든 직원들이 친절해서 머무는동안 어느곳을 가던 행복했어요.

The banyan tree in lang co is a truly beautiful exceptional place to stay and enjoy all that vietnam has to offer. The resort has exemplary accommodations in particular the hillside villas. They are simply superb. Built on a hillside and peninsula the hillside villas are truly peaceful, tranquil and relaxing for all families. In particular all of the staff at the resort are truly exemplar and really make the resort a great place for all types of vacations. Whether you are simply looking for a peaceful relaxing retreat the resort packs in abundance. If you fancy the hustle and bustle of the local major cities hue, hoi an and da nang are also in very close proximity. You can enjoy the hustle of any city and the retreat to the resort for rest, relaxation and superb food in any of the choice of restaurants at the resort. The banyan tree resort is also twinned with the adjoining angsana resort next door where the banyan tree guests can also enjoy all amenities offered there too, including an 18 hole golf course within the lang co hillside. In arrival each guest party is allocated to a villa host. The villa host provide a great service for arranging local water sports, booking restaurants, arranging day trips and simply attending to each and every need one would ever need whilst staying here. The bt resort team have simply done themselves proud during our stay and we would wholly recommend for all types and sizes of families.
가족과 힐링에 최고
The place was one of the best resorts i have been to. The 3 bedroom villa had the best view. The service and attention to detail was excellent. In particular bich took excellent care of us.

The property truly shines amidst a backdrop of breathtaking nature, meticulously landscaped gardens, and a pristine beach. The staff exhibited exceptional promptness and friendliness throughout our stay. Celebrating my birthday there was made unforgettable by the thoughtful surprises they orchestrated during the day. However, there were some notable lapses in attention to detail. Upon entering our villa, a strong damp odor greeted us, and the white wine served was barely chilled in all restaurants. The main bar, while elegantly designed, oddly featured a large screen playing netflix at a volume reminiscent of a local pub, which seemed out of place for a luxury hotel. To add to the culinary letdowns, the expensive pizza at the italian restaurant left much to be desired, falling below the quality of even frozen options found in local supermarkets. We raised our concerns, and the restaurant kindly removed it from our bill. Perhaps the most puzzling experience was being charged for a flimsy cloth washbag containing hotel amenities like a toothbrush and haircomb. It left us wondering how such bags could be reused. In conclusion, our stay was enjoyable, but it could have easily transitioned from great to exceptional had these seemingly small yet important details not detracted from the overall experience, especially given the premium price tag.
Top zu empfehlen
너무 다 좋음 아이데리고 가기에 너무 좋음
我們在banyan tree lang co 住了五晚 這是一家非常好的渡假村 最令人感動和印像深刻的地方 在於每一位渡假村的人員都非常用心 每一位房客都有貴賓的禮遇 他們的用心和真誠感動人心 我們告訴接待人員 期待再回banyan tree待一段時間
Espectacular. Fuimos de luna de miel y ha sido el mejor hotel de nuestras vidas. Volveremos para nuestros aniversarios. Banyan tree es nuestra cadena de hoteles favorita!
The overall condition of the hotel was excellent, the staff was friendly, and the food was pretty good.

The beach view villa, with pool and jacuzzi was amazing. A very relaxing holiday. The staff were very attentive. The beach is a vast stretch of sand with a nice wavey sea, still quite safe for bathing. A fabulous location. Very nice to have vietnamese restaurants but we would have liked more choice. The azura did provide an italian menu but it was quite limited.

We stayed in the lagoon view villa and could bird watch from the pool deck. There were kingfishers, bee eaters, jacanas, egrets and many other birds that came around. The pool was delightful and the perfect temperature. Using the bikes to get around the resort was fun. The beach is huge with very few people.

とても快適で素晴らしいリゾート施設でした ラグーンヴィラに泊まり ゆっくり過ごすことができました 朝はヨガレッスンから始まり カンフーのレッスンやサップボートで楽しんだり リゾート施設内で全て完結することができ 観光には出かけませんでした 食事は朝のバイキングをたくさん食べて 午後はアフタヌーンティーのサービスがあり 夜は施設内のレストランやルームサービスで食べました 飲み物は1000円から2000円 料理は一皿3000円から5000円程度で ハンバーガーが3500円くらいでした 5泊6日で施設内で全て済まして2人で8万円くらいで過ごすことができました 大変満足の旅行で 自然に囲まれてリフレッシュできて良かったです 流石のバンヤンツリーだなと感じました スパも素晴らしい体験でした 3泊以上をオススメします great hospitality and beautiful nature. The experience in banyantree was so amazing and i could feel relaxed and spend good time there. They have several activities every day, like yoga lesson, tai-chi lesson and sup boating and i enjoyed them a lot. Definitely i recommend banyantree lang co.
のんびり快適に過ごすことができました スタッフのかたのご配慮に感謝いたします 次回は夫と訪れたいと思います

We had the best time at banyan! our villa host mi was amazing, she was super friendly and attentive! upon our arrival, we received tea with local mung bean snack, i said that i really liked it and to my surprise mi gifted me an entire bag when we were about to leave. She texted us throughout our entire stay, checking if we needed anything. We dined at the saffron twice, and the waiter who i also discussed mung bean cake with did the same on our second visit - i m leaving banyan witch a lot of mung bean cake!! dinner at saffron was wonderful, delicious food beautifully presented and the service was 10/10! we even got some complimentary starter snacks and tea after our meal. We were staying at the lagoon view villa, it was spacious and clean. There were no ants in the room, and the air conditioning was working perfectly. We had everything we needed at all times. The gym was nice, even though it was small it had all necessary equipment. The mats were not the best for pilates/yoga, but when i asked mi if i could borrow one from the yoga pavilion, they delivered one for me at the villa. There are a lot of activities to choose from if you get bored by the pool. We played tennis and did a tai chi class. The staff at the breakfast restaurant were all wonderful, lady at the crepe station made us delicious fresh crepes every morning and the head chef at the kitchen was super sweet coming over to chat while making sure everything was to our liking. Very happy with our stay at banyan!
Wonderful and relaxing stay. We enjoyed every second and the massage at the spa was the best we ve ever had. Staff go above and beyond to make everything perfect!
大変満足しました

This place is heaven. All the staff are very attentive and helpful. Everyone has a smile and spread positive energy. The resort is great, the villas enchanting - we were completely satisfied. The best thing was that my wife is highly allergic and is dependent on gluten-free food. We have never eaten so well gluten-free. They made all dishes safely gluten-free and possible for celiac disease. We will be back again. Special thanks to the staff bich and dao hoang who made everything possible for us and ensured that my wife could eat safely.

The resort is an hour from da nang city and the airport. If you are looking for a mediation style holiday or a break, it is the best option. Away trom the busiest city life, casinos and nightlife. The staff service is on top of best. Welcome to share more of my experience from potential guests!
Đáng tiền, tuy hơi xa trung tâm 1 xíu nhưng không gian và phòng ốc rất ok
Chỗ nghỉ rất sạch sẽ, nhóm mình hài lòng. Nhân viên cực kì thân thiện, chu đáo và đáng yêu. Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp trở về huế.
Nhân viên va khách sạn rất tệ . Không giúp đở gi khách. Đường khó đi

Very helpful staff and you felt like home, we were allowed being in the kitchen drinking our coffee. Only thing that can be improved is the very thin matress in the room, it was like sleeping on the floor.
一家物超所值的旅店 服務親切 房間整齊清潔 早餐也不錯
這是我第一晚住宿後臨時網路上加訂的 記住一定要在網路上預訂 因為我詢問前台臨時加訂的金額比網路上預訂貴

Great value mid priced hotel. We thought the location was great and easy to find. Good sized clean rooms. Comfortable beds and a good quality breakfast. The staff, as in many vietnamese hotels try extremely hard to please their guests. It works for me. Another recommended hotel.
I really enjoyed my stay here. The staff were friendly helpful, my room was very comfortable it proved great value for money. This is what a budget hotel should be.

We got to hue one night earlier than expected and the hotel we booked into the next night didn t have a spare room, so we went there. Basic and functional facilities. We couldn t help but think the room was a bit moldy. The breakfast was the most uninspiring thus far in vietnam.

When booking we, paid slightly more for 1 double instead of 2 singles. On checking in we were shown to a room with 2 beds (506?) by the bellhop, but he did get that i was unhappy. I tried to head back to the lobby to sort it, but he insisted we call the desk clerk from the room phone instead. The desk clerk told me that it was impossible that i was charged more for a double bed bed (both my husband i clearly remember we were) and that they had upgraded our room to a superior room with a balcony. They offered to show me the room with a double that we had actually reserved (601?). The bathroom had barely enough room to walk around the bed, very little space to set stuff, and it smelled funny. We opted to go back to once settled, we saw that one of the beds was actually a double so we were quite happy. While preparing for bed, two problems became apparent it was loud (we were right on the road and the windows were single glazed without good sealing) and there were a small number of ants on the smaller bed. Given how tired we were, the smell in the alternative room, the fact that we didn t plan on using the smaller bed, and that we were only staying one night, we opted to stay. After a very noisy night, we awoke to find significantly more ants on the small bed, on the nightstand between the beds, and coming up through the floor at the end of the small bed. Yuck! we were very happy to be leaving so early. When told about the ants, the front desk said they would not

Vi var uheldig at det værelse vi havde bestilt ikke var ledig. Vi fik tildelt et lille mørkt rum som var meget fugtigt. Internettet virkede ikke, så en dårlig oplevelse. Andre værelser var fine og servicen var helt i top
Stains on furniture, usual awful breakfast, can get better for the same cost.
Good all n all. Friendly staff, nice breakfast. Only real complaint was that the bathroom door didn t close, which wasn t too nice since you had to hold it for it to not open wide by itself.
Sehr nettes hotel, freundliches personal. Gut ausgestattet und sauber. Würden wieder kommen.

Everything was almost perfect. We arrived very early but we could get into the room before the check in time. Everytime we got a water and a tea. Stuff very friendly. Room generally clean but the walls needs some refreshment )
Budget hotel with really good price and good location
We stayed a couple of nights. Everything was good and the staff were excellent.

Arrivé en milieu de matinée, j ai pu bénéficier de ma chambre dés mon arrivée et ainsi me raffraichir après une nuit passée dans le train. Accueil agréable et de bon conseil pour visiter la ville et réserver excursion et billet de bus. Chambres spacieuses, bien aménagées et propres, un peu bruyante cependant, concernant la mienne donnant sur la rue. Hôtel bien situé sur le centre d huê, la cité impériale est à 20 minute de marche ou à 2 km

Das hotel war nicht schlecht aber leider hatte es schimmel an den wänden und der geruch war schlimm und mit offenem fenster und balkon auch nicht wegzukriegen! leider! lage ist gut und personal freundlich und hilfsbereit!
L hôtel demanderais un bon lifting. Dans les chambres les draps n étaient pas très propres. Le personnel par contre était très gentil efficace et prévenant.
Bon séjour, hôtel propre, le personnel est très serviable et aimable
Hôtel moyen petit déjeuner moyen mais rien à dire rapport qualité prix

I continue to stay at canary hotel when i visit hue, vietnam. The staff is very friendly and they provide excellent service. The rooms are clean and comfortable and the hotel is conveniently located. I recommend this hotel as it is also very affordable. They also rent motorbikes there which makes it easy to get around.
Enjoyed my 2 nights
The whole town was flooded with boats going down the main street. The hotel staff did all they possibly could do to help. Amazing staff!
Le personnel est accueillant et serviable.
Schönes hotel mit nettem frühstück und sauberen zimmern personal war sehr hilfsbereit bei der organisation von touren.
快適でした 新市街も旧市街も徒歩でまわれるといえばまわれます 少し遠いですが スタッフも親切で 朝ごはんが選べます 豪華でした

Hôtel moderne et chambre propre et confortable. Personnel à l écoute et disponible. Petit déjeuner très bon mais limité à un plat une boisson et un dessert pas de buffet à volonté. Service irréprochable très bon point de chute sur hué. Je recommande cet hôtel .

友人と二人で利用しましたが 部屋が狭いのと 窓が無いため薄暗く圧迫感がありました シャワーはお湯の出は良いのですが バスタブの排水がバスルームの床へ直接排水と なっているので バスルームは水浸しとなります ホテルスタッフはとても親切で 英語と挨拶程度の日本語が出来ます 食事は上層階のフロアーがレストランとなっているのでこちらで頂きます 景色は期待しないほうが良いです barが密集しているエリアから近いので食事に便利です この値段なので贅沢は言えませんが 値段なりかと思います

We booked twin room but they gave us a very small double right by an elevator. There was no separate space for a shower, the showerhead hanged right near the toilet, so that the water would have drained on the bathroom floor. It was most natural to have a shower sitting on the toilet. After complaining they gave us a twin which was two times larger with a balcony and a real shower. We did not understand why they could not give us the second room in the first place. We made an assumption that they offered us the double because our twin was not clean yet due to the fact that we arrived earlier than check-in time. It would have been better if they had explained such confusions ahead. Not the most cozy place, it was fairly cold (in january), and the breakfast was not very good, but we were happy with our stay, nevertheless. The staff was very frienldly
Good hotel with great staff!

On the border of a bit of an edgy area, but turned out to be within 2 blocks of a lot of great restaurants. Reception staff was english speaking and extremely friendly and helpful. Housekeeping fell a little short on supplies replacement, and one wall had black mould showing through the paint.
Nice hotel and super service from the staff.
酒店整潔,職員服務親切.
Zentral gelegen, gutes personal nur die matratzen sind für europäer ein wenig zu hart sehr gutes preis-leistungsverhältnis !!

The staff worked hard to keep the customer happy, bringing tea when i used the computer , answering questions well without tryin to sell stuff and not trying to overcharge when we left. It all left a very good impression
Stayed one night with good feeling. Hotel staffs were kind and communication in english was ok. I recommend this hotel.

La chambre que nous occupions n avait pas de fenêtre. Mais les personnes de la réception étaient tellement gentil. Que nous gardons une bonne impression de cet hôtel. En effet nous ne sommes resté qu une seule nuit, mais on a pu laisser nos sacs pour visiter hué dans la journée, puis avant de prendre le train, prendre une douche et se servir des ordinateurs et imprimante. Ils se sont occupé également de nous réserver un taxi.

Friendly staff, very helpful. Choice of breakfast.staff very helpful in organising our pick up for hanoi. They did not hesitate to change our room when we saw some ants in our first room. They even sent someone with hot water thermos when they discovered that we would come to the lobby for hot water. Overall our stay was very pleasant. There was always some nice words from the staff. The french speaking accountant was very friendly too. I would recommend the hotel very highly, especially for the value you get out of what you pay.
Tres bonne surprise pour cet hotel avec un acceuil chaleureux et surtout une mise a disposition de la chambre des notre arrivee sans besoin d attendre 14h.chambre borgne mais tres calme et propre.
Hôtel bien tenu, par un personnel agréable et prévenant. Chambre et petit-déjeûner corrects. Pas trop loin de la cité impériale (demie-heure à pied). Un très bon rapport qualité/prix.
服務人員相當貼心的解釋周遭環境,並在我們提出要求時提供相應的服務 例如早餐外帶 翻譯等 房間大小普通但整潔
We spent a pleasant stay. The staff of the hotel is fantastic. This has affected us much

Service really friendly. When i checked in i was initially given a room right next to the elevator but then upgraded to one with a balcony. The staff answered all my questions about what to do, and for a change weren t trying to sell me something but genuinely just wanted to give information. Room very clean, but the room could use a paint job - black marks that looked like mold but weren t if you saw up close. Separate shower stall so the entire bathroom didn t get wet when you showered! hot water for coffee in the room. Minibar was nice and roomy enough to stick in your own water or drinks. Tv had great reception for english language channels. One of the two beds was soft, but the other one was the typical hard bed. The hotel is a bit of a walk - about 30 minutes - to the citadel, but there are lots of restaurants and shops in the surrounding area. About 10 minutes by taxi from the train station. The breakfast is pretty typical - your choice of options but the fresh fruit and cake choice results in a few grapes and apricots, or a choco-pie pre-wrapped so i wasn t too impressed.
Le personnel est très accueillant et très serviable. L hôtel est agréable et les chambres grandes et confortables. Seul petit bémol le taxi devant nous attendre à l aéroport ne s est jamais montré.
Mycket trevlig personal, fina rum, blev uppgraderade till ett deluxrum utan extra kostnad. Bra läge med gångavstånd till allt in stan.
Almost perfect, friendly stuff, nice rooms, but one wall could get a new painting )
Værelset og maden var gennemsnitlig. Men personalet var fantastisk. De gjorde alt for at opholdet skulle være en succes.
A very enjoyable stay - staff were very attentive and helpful - would recommend to budget travellers
Sehr angenehm
Ganske fint hotel til pengene. Ligger måske 500 m for langt fra centrum. Morgenmaden er sparsom, men værelserne fine og rene. Overall et hotel, hvor man får mere end hvad man betaler for.

We had a spacious twin room. The window faced the hallway only, which made it a fairly noisy room. It also was a bit stuffy and smelly. Other than that the breakfast was good, staff was friendly and helpful, and the wifi was fast.

Le personnel est très agréable et les conditions de chambres sont très bonnes ( un lit double et un lit simple pour presque rien ) - la salle de bain avec son eau chaude à n importe quelle heure est vraiment un plus - le petit déjeuner ( inclus ) peut-être copieux si l on veut - le service de chambre est vraiment très bon et pointilleux - d ailleurs je devais y rester une nuit le 18 et j y suis encore ( ns sms le 22 ) pas beaucoup de passage dans la rue
Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ và tiện nghi. Chủ nhà cực kì thân thiện.

Gia đình tôi rất hài lòng với khách sạn. Chủ nhà, một cặp vợ chồng, rất thân thiện và hữu ích. Họ hỏi chúng tôi những gì chúng tôi cần và họ ngay lập tức cung cấp. Họ hỏi rằng giường có quá khó với chúng tôi không và khi bố mẹ chúng tôi đồng ý, họ đã cho họ tấm trải giường dày. Sống ở việt nam được một thời gian, chúng tôi biết người việt nói chung thích giường cứng nên chúng tôi hiểu điều này. Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ và có một bầu không khí mát mẻ. Nó cách bãi biển khoảng một trăm mét. Có cửa hàng và nhà hàng gần đó.
Biển sạch, nước trong. Điểm trừ duy nhất là con dĩn trên cát (lúc ăn ngoài biển) đồ ăn hơi đắt
Rất tốt và nhiệt tình.
Trên cả nhà nghỉ, phòng ốc rộng, sạch, nên thuê tại đây. Chủ thân thiện dễ mến
The staff were friendly and helpful,the room need a couple of repairs done when i entered. The safe didn t work and the door handle broke out on the balcony.

God beliggenhed mellem floden og backpackerområdet med masser af spisesteder. Poolen var rigtig god, også til børn. Taxachaufførene kender hotellet, så det er nemt at komme hjem, hvis man ikke orker at gå hjem fra seværdigheder. Hotellet hjalp os med at arrangere ture og det fungerede perfekt eneste minus var at vi fra vores værelse med garden view kunne høre musikken fra restauranterne på den anden side af vejen om aftenen - også med lukkede vinduer.

Big resort.on arrival i had a mixed opinion as i do not usually stay in hotels like this.its big and staff do a good job of maintaining it. Although water pressure of the shower was my only complaint.location is good and guests make good use of the pool and breakfast buffet is really good.hotel is a bit dated in places but staff across the board do a good job and make your stay very pleasant.as i got a good price on expedia and exchange rate was good the man reasons i booked here.if you can get the same things i say,go for it.

Best location, on the river and also in the centre of town...the view of the river from our balcony was amazing, the breakfasts were also a highlight of our stay at the century with the dining area (outdoor and indoor) overlooking the river
늦은 체크인도 기다려 주시고 위치도 좋으며 친절합니다
Good location and delicious breadfast

Really nice located close to everything in hue, with really nice and serviceminded personel. The pool area is also good for the price. The only bad thing is that the hotel is old and needs to be modernised..

Great location very helpfull staff (loan) she was especially nice helpfull, pool nice clean large room we picked the river view room . Good breakfast as long as you beat the noisy chinese there. Only thing i could say it would have been great if they had some comfy chairs in the room to relax in after tripping around all day . Overall very good value for your money.
Nice view, great and friendly staff. Will return.
マナーの悪い団体客がおおくて うるさかったです 朝食は種類もおおく充実していました

Located next to the perfume river, has the facilities of a good hotel, pool, buffet restaurant and a gym that makes for a good laugh. Rooms are big with balcony views of the river. Furniture dated, the place is clean. You can stay here if you like time travel to the days of socialist vietnam.
좀 오래되어서인지 침대가 불편했고 방음이 잘 안되어서 이런저런 소리가 다 드렸어요 아침식사 위치 직원의 친절은 만족합니다
Very convenient and near the key tourist attractions. Great for a night s party to return to a peaceful and quiet place.
スタッフの方々がとても親切

River front property and adjacent to active nightlife zone. Many restaurants and bars nearby. Upgraded to suite with three beds. Staff was extremely helpful and comfortable with spoken english. Recommend to anyone.
