Great view over the river, good location for restaurents and bars in the evening
Very nice staff very attentive. Helped us when our transfer to hoi an failed to arrive. The hotel may be a little dated however, it was clean and very close to everything..
Goede lokatie, alles makkelijk te bereiken. Personeel is heel behulpzaam en vriendelijk. Een echte aanrader
This hotel needs to be upgraded especially the mattresses, pillows and towels. Great location. The breakfast was limited.
Es hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Wir hatten ein flussblick zimmer, was sehr angenehm und ruhig war. Das frühstück war sehr abwechslungsreich. Wir kommen wieder

Situation de l hotel proche du centre et des embarcadéres accessibles a pied. Citadelle a 20 minutes a pied. Cyclo pousse a la sortie de l hotel. Petit dejeuner tres complet. Parfait avec vue sur la riviere. Belle piscine mais l eau un peu trouble. Chambre tres spacieuse, mal aménagée. Lit exentré a l entrée de la chambre avec peu d espace pour passer .rideaux craqués et sales. Une table chaise et petit séchoir pour secher le maillot de bain serait parfait. Un bon potentiel mais des travaux a effectuer.
Friendly and helpful staff. Great location . Breakfast was more catered for asian rather than western.
Good location, beautiful river view, great breakfast, excellent staff. The hotel need to be updated, looks old

Located on the riverside, the traffic is very convenient. Good facilities for price. Breakfast is also good. The water fell from the air conditioner in the room and the bag was wet. The gym is bad. There is not much exercise equipment in the gym. The pool is small, but it s okay to enjoy it. I like the river view from the room.

Nice older style hotel .very close to every thing.breakfast good selection.rooms spacious, staff friendly need a little more learning with there vocabulary, to cater for tourist .over all very comfortable
Average big hotel with a large breakfast. 50 charaacters

Well located on the river and close to town, this hotel is starting to show its age. Nonetheless, good accommodation and a great breakfast selection. Staff will try to upgrade you to a river view room for usd 10 per night but if you resist you will probably get a river view room anyway if they are not very full.
The century riverside hotel was a first class hotel from its staff who were always very friendly and helpful to our fantastic room with a river view that was the best we have ever experienced.

The hotel was pretty much what i expected. The hotel is starting to show a bit of age and could do with a refurbishment but it wasn t that expensive so i thought it was good value for money. The staff were friendly and the buffet breakfast was ok. The best part about the hotel is the location, it has heaps of restaurants and bars and being right on the river it has amazing views.
今回 ローシーズンだったため リバービューの部屋に無料アップグレードして頂きました 景色はとても良かったです プールも 入っていませんが 比較的広かったです 受付の人もみなフレンドリーでした 繁華街から近く立地も良かったので また機会があれば泊まりたいと思います 値段も安く評価がいまいちだったので 期待していませんでしたが 想像以上に良かったです
朝食バイキングが 種類も豊富で とてもおいしかったです 従業員もフレンドリーで 親切でした 唯一残念だったのは 部屋の窓が隣の建物と接していて 外の光が全く入らないことです
여행자거리 바로 앞에 있어서 숙소로 돌아갈 때 위치가 좋아서 편리했습니다. 근처에 식당 및 카페, 즐길거리가 많아서 좋았습니다. 호텔은 가격대비 깨끗하고 괜찮았습니다.

Family with two young children we were able to stay in one room but at the same time had our own space. The hotel helped to organise hue excursion and transport to hoi an. We all enjoyed pool (could be more sun lounges near the pool) and massage at the hotel spa. Breakfast was ok. Hotel was in a good location. Staff was very helpful, could not praise them more for trying to make our stay comfortable. On arrival our room was upgraded to the river view room free of charge. Staff helped to fix (replace) an iphone cracked screen while we were on the excursion (even called our tour guy to find us and talk about the phone).

This hotel is very old and tired. But location good and situated on the river so very picturesque. However family room on 5th floor facing mainroad is above a street of nightclubs. On saturday night music blares until 12 15 at night! windows are old and unsealed so you cannot sleep. We tried to get moved but hotel full. If hadn t been 10pm when we checked in we would have moved hotels. Beds were so hard and uncomfortable we were shocked as it s rated a 4 star. Hotel staff felt bad so moved us the second night to a suite. This room was on the same floor but the opposite side of the building so faced the perfume river. Room spacious with modern bathroom, comfortable beds and more importantly no noise at all from nightclubs. We had a mixed stay. Used hotels driver for day city sights. They matched the price of other suppliers. Driver was very good and courteous. Also used hotel driver for transfer to hoi an. This time brand new luxury vehicle and again an excellent courteous driver. As i say mixed experience. Would only stay here if i was in a quiet room facing the river. I can not fault the staff as they went out of their way to rectify the situation.

Proche du centre ville et a quelques minutes de la vielle ville .personnel de l hôtel agréable,souriant,et prévenant .nous sommes arrives par le bus très tôt ,on nous a proposé le petit déjeuner le temps de nous monter nos sac dans la chambre que nous aurions du avoir que en début d après midi .
Formidable séjour en famille! reçu de bons conseils à la réception! personnel souriant et très aimable, toujours à disposition!
何と言っても コスパが断然良 ただ 深夜１１時前まで終わらなかったパーティ フロントでは９時までと言っていたが かなりのボリュームで音楽が鳴りやまなかった どうせそうだろうと ホテルの目の前の繁華街で時間をつぶしてはホテルに帰りましたが
모두 대만족
Uitstekend
보트 투어하는 곳 근처로 잡다보니 여기로 잡게 되었는데 호텔 규모는 꽤 크네요 저렴하다보니 단체 관광하시는 분들도 많이 오구요 다만 오래되다 보니 찬바람이 많이 들어와서 많이 추웠어요
Fantastisk trevlig personal, exemplarisk service och ett utmärkt läge.

Nous avons eu la chambre 403, qui était très spacieuse, d un aspect propre et le lit était grand et d un extrème confort. Le personnel est au petit soin, lors de notre arrivé, ils nous attendaient avec un thé de bienvenue. Ils nous ont aidé dans toutes les étapes de notre séjour et lors de notre départ, l hotesse nous a accompagnée jusqu à la sortie en nous remerciant. Le petit déjeuner buffet était très varié et excellent. Malgré l excellente situation géographique, l hotel aurait besoin d un petit rafraichissement mais j y retournerais sans aucun doute!

Outstanding customer service, and genuine interest in the customer s stay and activities. The front desk also assisted me with respect to charging my mobile phone as the moisture in the air in hue (as in hoi an) proved problematic - they provided me with a bowl of rice grains, which absorbed the moisture on three occasions!

Hôtel assez vieillissant mais très propre. Nous avons passés deux nuits, un peu bruyant et nous avions des moucherons sans arrêt dans la chambre. Chauffage ne marchait pas et il faisait assez froid. Problème de toilettes qui ont été réparé rapidement. Le petit déjeuner était plus que moyen et le room service aussi. Les seules points positifs le personnel, la propreté, la situation, literie très confortable.

Personnel professionnel, parlant anglais, souriant. Chambre très propre. Bonne situation malgré le quartier bruyant. Il faudrait une bonne ravalement de façade, les murs face au fleuve sont très abîmé et sale. Malheureusement, nous avions des moucherons dans la chambre en permanence. Nous n avons pas apprécié le petit déjeuner ni le room service.
Very friendly staff. Location is good. Many restaurants in the neighbourhood. The facade of the hotel needs a little renovation.

The checking was chaotic, they forgot we needed twin beds and also excused them self with a big group arriving at the same time, we did just not meet this group. They managed to find good drivers for the tours we booked but they clearly also forgot about those bookings. I would avoid this hotel if not travelling as part of big group - and we will not come back to this hotel
The hotel was close to the main restaurnant and bar area of hue. At nights the streets opposite were closed off and were walking streets, with interesting performers.
Old hotel that needs some renovation. Good breakfast. Friendly staff that tries hard.
Clean, simple, central. Good value.
Habitación básica y vetusta. No tuve agua caliente, ya que olvidaron conectarla o mencionarlo. Personal amable.

Booked a room with riverview and got an upgrade to a wonderful room. Location is very good, all restaurants, shops, laundry, motor rental is all nearby. Breakfast was good, reception very friendly, specifically the lady who organized by next bus trip! thank you again!

The hotel used to be one of the best in hue. Now it is old and worn out. Staff members were friendly, but room cleaning started too early (around 8 am), and bed sheet had some stains on it. Some guests at the hotel are inconsiderate. They came back at around 2 or 3 am and talked loudly in the hallway. Hotel is in a great location, right in the center of hue and next to the perfume river. Too bad that they have not renovated it. We won t book it again in the future. One can certainly get a nicer hotel at a cheaper price.

Great location with lots of dining options within a short walk. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Nice extra touches of welcome drinks, fruit in the room and daily bottles of water. We had no towels in the bathroom but this was quickly remedied. Would happily stay here again.
Close to everything

Älteres, großes gediegendes hotel am fluß. Sehr höfliches personal, zimmer zum fluß ruhig, balkon nicht so guter zustand. Für pool war es zu kalt und regnerisch, frühstück sehr an asiatisches publikum angelehnt
River view, breakfast, tranfortation, property was too old. Water heater was broken, toilet was stuck at first time use since checking in. I m not recommend
The restaurant next to the hotel has extremely loud music every night.
Central location, great river views, and good prices. Recommended for fans of art deco and mid-century aesthetics.

I marked the facilities down a star as the spa was being renovated so i was unable to get a massage. That said the staff were very appologetic and recommened a spa very close by. The room was a good size. The breakfast was good with lots of choice .
Wonderful staff
The room could use

Great location near some lovely bars and restaurants but not too far from the bridge to the imperial city (30 minute walk). Staff fantastic and friendly, go above and beyond to help customers, transfer service was excellent, decent breakfast, nice pool, good views on the river side.

It was a very nice hotel facing the river, right in the centre of town near restaurants/coffee shops, and about 20mins walk to the citadel. Staff were all very polite and helpful. The hotel manager, phuc, even spent time to investigate and explain why someone may have knocked on my door very early one the morning. Great choices for breakfast. Though it does get busy but there is not much waiting time as there are plenty of staff on hand. I would stay again, especially for the price was great for what i got, if i came back to hue.

An odd hotel. Very large with a nice pool. Breakfast was ok but not great. Excellent walking location. Seemed like they were built for a large crowd that never arrived. Very good value for your money. Could use smart tv s. Staff was super helpful and friendly.
친절한서비스 깨끗한방 굿
Very nice welcoming staff. Great location.
Very kind and very coming staff... Perfect location... Great river view... In the heart of city...
We were there overnight only. The hotel is clean, room was very nice, good bed. Ngan at the reception desk was exceptionally helpful.

Super frühstücksbüffet, sehr schönes zimmer mit balkon und blick auf den fluss, sehr freundliches personal, tolle lage. Das hotel ist insgesamt renovierungsbedürftig, dennoch hat es einen gewissen charme. Wir waren sehr zufrieden.
The location to everything was fantastic. The staff were friendly and efficient. Overall, an enjoyable stay.
Great
This hotel has friendly and helpful staff and a good choice at breakfast. It is a little tired but clean with a nice pool. The location is perfect.

Great location, walking distance to restaurants and river walk. Rooms were nice. We had a family room which was a good size but the bathroom was very small and old. The pool was lovely. Breakfast was nice and the staff helpful.

Très bon séjour et emplacement en bord de la rivière, proche de restaurants, bars, petits commerces de souvenirs. Parfait pour se balader le soir. Piscine agréable néanmoins petite pour la taille de l hotel. Personnel serviable et attentionné. Le mobilier de la chambre est sublime et les lits confortables. Nous y avons passé un excellent séjour. Petit déjeuner excellent. Je recommande
The view from my room is very nice, all staffs are friendly and helpful. Location is perfect.
Good for the price and in a cemtral location
Staff was friendly, professional and helpful. Food was good. Pool was good. Location was excellent. Good value for money.
施設は古めですが パフュームリバーを望む部屋の景観は素晴らしい レストランも川に面しており 清々しい朝食が楽しめます

Vắng khách nên dc khách sạn chọn cho nhà mình view khá đẹp, nhìn thẳng ra cầu trường tiền. Khách sạn ngay trung tâm phố tây, ngay cạnh bờ sông nên thuận tiện đi lại. Phòng ốc thì bình thường, nội thất hơi cũ so với chuẩn 4 sao, nhưng vẫn chấp nhận dc.
The pictures shows the room occupying 3 guests then i booked for 3 of us without doubt. But when we came, they asked for an additional fee for extra person. It seemed to make us idiots.
Khách sạn cũ, không xứng tầm 4 so với mặt bằng chung
Hài lòng với khách sạn dù còn một số điểm không ưng ý với thiết bị chung của khách sạn hơi cũ! cần nâg cấp một chút!

大分古くなっているが 部屋は広く 清潔さも問題なし バスタブの水栓の切替が壊れていてシャワーの方しか使えなかったのが不便だった あと部屋にセフティーボックスがなく リクエストしたら持ってきてくれたが リクエストが必要とはどこにも書いてなかった 周辺のライブ演奏をしているレストラン が数件あり夜遅くまで大音量の演奏がうるさい 場所は繁華なところにあり便利 朝食は全体においしい 特にフォーとパイナップルジャムが非常に美味しかった リバーサイドの部屋からの景色が非常に美しいので多少高くてもリバーサイドの部屋が是非お勧めです

Hotellet har nog varit väldigt fint men är i behov av renovering. Rummet var dock stort och bekvämt och poolen väldigt fin med fin utsikt. Frukosten var okej, men lite mer utbud av pålägg, bröd och bättre kaffe hade behövts.
Grymt bra läge med närhet till det mesta. Själva boendet är väldigt nergånget. Rummen ok men tänk på att det är gammalt och ganska sunkigt.
大規模なホテルですが 老朽化が感じられます 夜は橋やリバークルーズの船がきれいでしたが カラオケ船 の音が聞こえてくるぐらいでした また 白い壁がライトアップされているところにはヤモリが集まってきていました 私は嫌ではありませんでしたが 苦手な方もいるでしょうね 総じて あまり洗練された感じはしないホテルでした
The property is located close to food and hue central, which is good. However, if you have trouble sleeping be warned that the night life is very, very loud. The property is old and tired.
Big roomy hotel in great location. Great buffet breakfast. Across the road to walking street, loads of transport options. Highly recommend for your stay in hue

The location is convenient for commuting. Beautiful view of the huong river. It was so peaceful! the breakfast buffet was delicious and had many options from vietnamese cuisine to western food. Staff were friendly and helpful. Their hospitality was great!
Great location on riverside and next to night market street (which is not worth the visit). Staff are first class and very helpful. Breakfast is excellent. Very good stay.
Fint centralt beliggende hotel. Venligt personale
Outdated
Alles super gelaufen
Everything is good
강 뷰는 정말 좋았고 직원들 친절했어요. 그렇지만 오래된 건물이라 청결이 아쉬웠고 방음 안되는데 제일 단점입니다. 조식 잘 나와요.
Perfect location. Wonderful, friendly staffs.

Absolute bust as family accomodation. Room was so small we were all tripping over each other. Two extra single beds were placed where other rooms had sitting areas and the only small, rundown bathroom was right next to one single bed. To top it off every night we had a soundtrack of thumping dance music. To give credit where due, staff weee very friendly and helpful, but this was the worst accomodation of the whole trip.

Staff were excellent and very friendly. Room was a little dated and a bit rough round the edges but it was huge and everything worked. Light switches all over the place and it wasn t necessarily in a logical place or order. Gorgeous pool area, great river and sunset views.
Lovely hotel great breakfast staff very helpful for advice on travel and trips, excellent location overlooking the river also and excellent vibrant area close by for eating
Fantastic service and worth every siwngle dollars.
Tôi thích nơi này

We picked this hotel for its location and value. It is near to get to the modern restaurant area in hue from here (near dmz bar) but also close to the bridges over to the imperial city. We were here during lunar new year so it was very busy which made for a great atmosphere. Hotel facilities were good and breakfast gave a good selection.
Great location. Friendly staff. The best breakfast buffet we had on our trip through vietnam.
Overall is good, good location, price and service
Friendly staff

Situato a 5 minuti a piedi dal centro, con parcheggio incluso. Personale eccellente, si è messo a disposizione per qualsiasi nostra richiesta e la colazione era molto fornita, sia di dolce che soldi salato. Consigliatissimo
Excellent breakfast and very friendly staff. Nice view from the breakfast room

I stayed 11 days at this hotel..all staff very kind ,helpful and friendly they made i feel like home thanks so much..room was clean , spacious breakfast was delicious..fresh fruit everyday quiet area high recommend for who planning to visit hue..best place to experience
Very nice place that i truly enjoyed. The staff were very friendly and helpful

川沿いで静かながら観光中心地にごく近く 歩いてまわるのにとても便利でした 部屋は清潔 スタッフはどの方も親切に対応してくれました 朝食の質 量とも申し分なく パティオで朝の気持ちの良い空気を吸いながらのんびり食事ができました ホイアンに来ることがあればぜひまた利用したいです located along the river, it was quiet yet very close to the main tourist area, making it extremely convenient for walking around. The room was clean, and all the staff were very kind and helpful. The breakfast was excellent in both quality and quantity, and we were able to enjoy a leisurely meal while breathing in the refreshing morning air on the patio. If i come to hoi an again, i would definitely like to stay here.
Nice place

The bed was comfortable, and the breakfast selection was good. The hotel was definitely not what we would expect of a four star hotel. Moldy grout around the bath tub, the last guests towel still hanging on the bathroom door.

A really nice property with friendly staff who were happy to help. It looks like a lot of tour groups rely on this as a hotel which is a good sign that it s tried and tested. Really good location and lots of nice cafes and restaurants less than 5 minutes walk away.

Nice place to stay. Music from the street was a bit loud but it ended around 11 30 pm. Breakfast was good with typical food we have received to date everywhere in vietnam however it would have been nice to have a better variety of fruit. Would return. Thank you
Excellent service from reception to breakfast crew! wonderful buffet style breakfast. There is a restaurant on site but didn t try it. So walkable to many bars and restaurants. Comfortable bedding
Nice large room with lanai. Friendly and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast buffet.
Staff very friendly always tried the best to help you. Buffet is very good with different kind of foods. Safe location and very convenient to go around the city

가족들과 함께 3박을 했습니다. 호텔이 오래되어서 그런지 시설은 좀 낙후되었지만 가격을 생각하면 매우 훌륭합니다. 특히 직원들이 머무는 동안 택시등 이동수단을 친절하게 예약해 주었고,저렴하게 흥정을 해 주기도 했습니다.직원들이 굉장히 친절했습니다. 조식은 특급 호텔 못지 않게 좋아서 조식만 잘 챙겨 먹어도 방값이 빠지고도 남을 정도로 훌륭합니다. 시내 맛집들이 모두 걸어서 5분 이내이고, 여행자 거리도 걸어서 5분입니다. 가족 여행하기에는 가성비 및 가심비 최고의 호텔입니다.
Veldig god service og god frokost. Personalet er blide og fornøyde. God atmosfære.
Good location and comfortable room and service. I could rent a bicycle from this hotel. They also helped us to pick up a taxi.

フロントの中にいい加減なスタッフがいます チェックイン時にすぐ 翌日のdmzツアーを予約したのに 夜リコンファームしたら取れてないことが発覚 危なかったです 2日後バイクをレンタルした時は ガソリンなど点検しないで渡されて 目的地でガス欠 ツアーを頼んだのと同じ彼でした 女性スタッフの方がちゃんとやる印象です 部屋の設備には問題ないし テレビはnhkワールド見れます バスタブもありますし ガウンもあります ポーターも丁寧です 朝食も問題ないですし 価格もリーズナブルなので 再訪の機会があれば また利用したいと思います 特定の彼だけ気をつけて
Good location and great breakfast
Noise noise noise
賑やかな地域に近いですが ホテル自体は落ち着いていて安心して休むことができます
God service i receptionen, meget hjælpsomme med seværdigheder.
Great breakfast and gym facilities. The hotel is located close to some great restaurants.
Personal muy amable, hotel muy limpio y muy buena zona

The hotel staff was excellent, room was clean and comfortable and free breakfast and wifi a plus. The hotel arranged a great boat tour to the pagoda and citadel as well as transportation on a sleeping bus to hoi an.
とても親切で安心でした ホーチミン乗り継ぎでフエに着いたがホーチミン空港で空港ギャングに強奪に会いベトナムに対する不信感だらけでしたがホテルの人の親切に救われました
Friendly staff, english is very well understood. Buffet breakfast was delicious, lots of fresh fruits with a good mix of vietnamese and western breakfast. Would recommend to others.
何回も泊まっていますが すべてに申し分なく とても快適なホテルです 何よりなのが お客様のほとんどが欧米人です なので館内はいつも静かで環境としても素晴らしい

Hueに一人一泊で利用 チェックイン時に待ってるときに ロビー内にあるカシミヤのお店の人に話しかけられました 彼は日本のことが大好きで とても親切に私に説明してくれた それがこのホテルを利用したとき 一番良かった思い出だ また ホテルのスタッフもチェックインからチェックアウトまでとても親切でした 自転車は無料で貸し出し バイクは一日20万ドンで借りられました それらの手配もスタッフが親切にやってくれました ホテル ホテルは全体的に真新しさはない でも綺麗に保たれている 立地 近くにホテルやお店が立ち並ぶ 飯には困らないでしょう もっと歩くと高そうなホテル街がありますが 飯屋の料金が高め 部屋 悪くはない 控えめに言っても 良い方だ 清潔 不足はない 騒音もほぼない 部屋は静か 廊下も隣も静か 外はたまーにクラクション バスルーム 問題ない 清潔 しかしレインシャワーと普通のシャワーの切り替え方法がわからなかった アメニティも不足なし 総評 またhueに来るのならばまた利用したい とても良いサービスを受けた スタッフさんとカシミヤ店員さんから 真心を感じた abiさんとlamさんに感謝です
시설이 노후
Service was excellent. Breakfast very good, tasty and diverse. Our bath tub couldn t hold the water warm enough even to start bathing. Wifi annoyingly poor.
Gute lage, sehr gutes essen.
좋았습니다 영어도 잘 하시고 친절하셨어요 룸 상태도 깨끗하고 좋았습니다 관광지랑 가까워서 편리했어요
スタッフの皆さんがとにかく親切
Nice and clean hotel with very friendly staff. Breakfast great as well. Rooftop bar with great view over the sea
In the heart of the city, staff were pololite and helpful. Very accessible. Nice and friendly hotel. Good vibes.
Great hotel. Great staffs. Excellent breakfast. Comfy bed. Clean room and bathroom. Highly recommend.
Fantastic, friendly staff, ready to assist with all travel questions. Quiet room, excellent and huge breakfast buffet. Great location, with easy walking to lots of restaurants and coffee shops.
Helpful and friendly staff , good breakfast.
Had a very calming atmosphere. The rooms had a nice decor and the staff were helpful. The pool area is beautiful
Good location, friendly staff, good breakfast, hotel needs a bit of maintenance

The front desk staff especially anh was very helpful. The location of the hotel is good, within walking distance to hanh restaurant and pho di bo walking street. Good breakfast spread with fabulous view of hue city as the cafe is located on 10th floor of the hotel
시설에 비해 너무비싸요
Front desk staff needs to be trained on customer service, and to have a friendly and welcoming demeanor. Room was more like a 2 star maybe 3 at most.
Good place to live in hue. Highly recommended!
除了設備較老舊, 其他都還可以
Excellent restaurant and hotel!!! the rooms were very clean, the staff was friendly and accommodating, and the food was sensational!

The hotel is everything a 4 star hotel should be. When we arrived, our temperature was measured and we had to fill a form concerning our health - a sign of these covid times. There is no sauna, even if the hotel information claims so.
This is my 2nd times staying at cherish. Staffs are very nice and helpful. Good food and good areas. Of course i ll be back here in future. Lcp

２回目の利用 １泊デラックスダブル 良い点 部屋はまあまあ広々 フルーツがおいてある ウェルカムドリンク スタッフは終始丁寧 荷物も運んでくれる みんな親切 フロント近くのカシミヤ店のお兄さんも めっちゃ親切 朝食の種類は多かった これまでバンコク ダラット hue danangとホテルを利用しましたが ここの朝食が一番満足できました プリンがおいしかった 部屋も廊下も静か 悪い点 特に見当たらない 総評 これからもhue定宿として使いたいです. 値段もデラックスダブル１泊4300円くらいで安いです
ホテルは落ち着いた雰囲気で設備も良く 周りにベトナム料理レストランなども多く 快適に過ごせました
The shower is not much hot. But other service is good enough!
Very nice hotel with great staff that are always ready to assist.
The cherish hotel visit was something to be cherished it really was an enjoyable experience. The staff and facility were of highest standard. They met every expectation and more.
スタッフも設備も環境も最高です フエ滞在時には このホテルしか考えられません
Rigtig fin hotel. Personalet var venlige og hjælpsomme. Rigtig god morgenmad.
Känns inte rätt att betygsätta hotellet i dessa coronatider. Vi var tre gäster på ett ganska stort hotell.

かなり早い到着でしたが 快く直ぐにチェックインして下さり とても助かりました 受付の皆さんはじめ スタッフの皆さんはいつも笑顔で対応して下さり 気持ちが良かったです 人気のお店やお勧めを教えて頂き とても有り難かったです お部屋も清潔で 気持ち良く過ごせました 今回1番印象に残ったことは ホテルのセーフティボックスに全ての貴重品を忘れてしまい 気付いたら時はもう次のホテルに移動してしまっていたのですが 相談したところ 次の宿泊先まで無料で届けて下さいました ダナンのホテルだったので かなり遠かったのですが 快くご対応下さいました 本当に感謝の気持ちでいっぱいでした 受付のイーネイスさんはじめ マネージャーに感謝いたします ありがとうございました 次回フエを訪れることがありましたら 必ずチェリッシュホテルを利用したいと思います
We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The breakfast buffet was very good with many choices in food selection. The only disappointment was the pool. Not ver well kept.
This hotel exceeded my expectations. The breakfast was great with a lot of varieties. The staff was friendly and helpful. The location was ideal. Highly recommend!
Overall the service rating is very good with nice choice of bread fast. The staff are courteous and swift response. We will come back again.

Ok, the cherish is a little dated, but definitely not tired. Everything is of a good standard, everything is in good condition, and everything works wonderful staff, great breakfast. Super value for money. The hotel is in a great location near walking street. A great place for a night out.
Totally wonderful three night stay. Staff are very efficient and helpful, and buffet breakfast was excellent. Tremendous value, and will return again.
Super bel hôtel et excellent service à l accueil.
Nous etions trois amis.tout a été parfait, les chambres, le service. Le petit-déjeuner est varié et copieux, le personnel dévoué et sympathique. Nous recommandons vivement cet hôtel
Bon hôtel, propre, confortable, petit déjeuner parfait un peu vétuste je recommande
A great trip and a great hotel. Super friendly staff and a super location. We loved the surrounding area.

When we reached the hotel, we were greeted with a glass of juice. A vietnamese girl in traditional costume gave us information about a city tour. We booked the tour for 88k dongs each - the tour was well worth the cost. Next day, we enjoyed buffet breakfast at the terrace restaurant on the top floor with great views of the city. We met with vinh luu phuoc, who instantly connected with us. He met us every day when we went for breakfast. He spoke english very well and we enjoyed talking to him. The tour bus picked us up from cherish hotel at 8 am. The tour started with a boat ride to the thieu pagoda. The guide ms. Trang gave us very interesting information about buddhism and each of the attractions we visited. The lunch at the spring restaurant was especially nice. The tour covered the hue city very well and we thoroughly enjoyed it. Next day, we took the train for a scenic ride through the hai van pass to danang and back. I tried booking the train trip on my own, but it was hard. I asked lam at the hotel reception and he booked it for us for a mere 18 each for the round-trip journey in ac coach with cushion chairs. All in all, it was a great two days in hue city and staying at the cherish hotel.
A hotel with great value, location, and convenience! the fresh juice stand in front of the hotel is also great!

Who ever gave this hotel a 4 star rating needs to lose his/her job. It s a 2 star max. The headboards had wheels, cracks everywhere, paint chipped, stains on bed sheets. And there was no tub, which is stated on the amenities. We had issues with both the toilet and air conditioning our first day. The staff, however, was kind and prompt to address the issues. The property condition definitely does not match the pictures or reviews posted. I m disappointed with expedia s false advertisement of this location.
Exellent staff service, great breakfast buffet. We were happy for the hotel stay.
Good location, helpful staff , great food 9/10.
Good service, clean with connecting room options. Location has many food options in walking distance - short grab ride to attractions
The cherish hotel was in a great location with many restaurants and cafes near the hotel. The hotel itself was very quiet and comfortable. Definitely a great value.
Wonderful location, service and quality of the location.
Khách sạn ngay đường to.thuận tiện.nhưng phòng khách sạn hơi cũ.sàn phòng ọp ẹp.vòi hoa sen bị nứt bắn tung tóe.

Điểm cộng khách sạn nằm gần trung tâm nhưng lại là nơi khá yên tỉnh, có chỗ đậu ô tô phí trước hoặc công viên bên cạnh. Điểm trừ không có thang máy, phòng xuống cấp, nhà tắm cảm giác không sạch sẽ lắm.
Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi
Ấn tượng đầu tiên là nhân viên rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ và có ban công. Với mức giá này thì không có gì để chê được.

Mình sử dụng phòng double, phòng sạch sẽ tiện nghi đầy đủ. Thích nhất là cửa sổ có thể mở ra và có cả quạt máy trong phòng để mở cửa và sử dụng cho thoáng trong trường hợp không muốn dùng điều hoà. Tôi có sử dụng 1 chai nước suối 1,5l và đến khi tính tiền thì được thông báo miễn phí nên rất bất ngờ. Nhân viên rất dễ thương và thân thiện nữa.
Vệ sinh chưa sạch sẽ và nên khuyến mại thêm nước uống trong phòng cho khách, nhân viên thân thiện.
Gần trung tâm phố đi bộ, sông hương. Nhân viên quá tuyệt vời
Khách sạn yên tĩnh, phòng mới, gọn gàng sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thì vui vẻ, nhiệt tình và rất thân thiện. Lần đầu tiên ở mình rất thích. Đặc biệt lần này đặt giá rất mềm
Very friendly! the room was clean and the street was quiet. Ac and refrigerator were nice, and the beds were comfortable. Very pleasant stay!
Ông chủ nhiệt tình , tuy nhiên cơ sở vật chất cũ , hôi ẩm mốc ko đc mới sạch sẽ
Chán lắm chất lượng phòng kém bẩn dịch vụ kém
Tạm được anh chủ than thiện gia ca phu hop
Khách sạn dơ và có muỗi, 1 phòng có mùi

Không bao giờ quay lại đâu ạ. Trả phòng muộn 30 mà đòi thu thêm nửa giá phòng. Cho thuê xe không tính 24h mà bắt trả trước 12h trưa đi thêm phải tính thêm. Không đáng nhiêu nhưng thấy cách làm tiền hơi kỳ. Mọi người cân nhắc khi book.
Phòng sạch sẽ, tuy nhiên 2 tấm nệm quá cũ,bung lò xo nên cần phải thay mới. Kem đánh răng quá tệ,cần phải thay đổi kem đánh răng loại tốt hơn.
Ở tập trung như trong doanh trại quân đội !
Dễ đọc sử dụng phong cách viết chuẩn (chính tả, ngữ pháp, viết hoa và dấu câu). Giảm thiểu việc sử dụng tiếng lóng, chữ hoa và chữ viết tắt.

Phòng vệ sinh sach se, máy lạnh và quạt tốt. Không bao gồm bữa sáng. Chủ sở hữu là rất tốt đẹp, tốt bụng và hỗ trợ. Thưởng thức buổi sáng uống cà phê trên ban công và nhìn ra khu vườn, bình yên đối với tôi. Cân bằng tốt giữa giá cả, vị trí và cơ sở vật chất. Chiếc xe đạp cho thuê từ người chủ giúp tôi thoải mái hơn khi khám phá thành phố.
Sạch sẽ, bà chủ siêu đáng yêu, vườn thoáng mát, gần phố

Tôi viếng thăm huế khi trận lụt diễn ra nên không quá trôi chảy. Tuy nhiên, chủ nhà và căn nhà của chính nó đã làm cho nó tất cả các giá trị. Ngôi nhà được trang trí đẹp mắt với nội thất đông dương cổ. Điểm nổi bật là khu vườn với không gian và thời gian của nó-thay đổi cây xanh tươi tốt và rộng lớn. Chủ nhà là một cặp vợ chồng tuyệt vời sẽ nấu ăn cho bạn và làm cho bạn cảm thấy như một cháu gái hư hỏng (hoặc cháu trai) hoặc chỉ đơn giản là một phần của gia đình họ. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ ở lại đây một lần nữa khi tôi có một cơ hội để thăm huế trong tương lai.

Great ở lại. Những cặp vợ chồng thực sự hiếu khách thích chia sẻ. Phòng thực sự là rất xác thực và khu vườn xung quanh là thực sự dễ chịu. Nó đã được một không quá xa lối vào của bao vây hoàng đế, khoảng 20mins. Đó là xa tất cả các khách sạn mà là bên ngoài citedal. Vì vậy, anyway những người muốn một yên tĩnh và địa phương ở lại, điều này chắc chắn sẽ là nơi.
Phòng khá cũ. Kh chuẩn bị đầy đủ trong phòng. Kh có dầu gội, nước lọc, nóng lạnh lúc có lúc kh
Khách sạn cũ lắm, thiếu tiện nghi, giá cũng không phải là rẻ gì nhưng nước nóng lúc có lúc không, không có chỗ để xe máy, phòng bình thường, được cái gần trung tâm dễ di chuyển.
Rất hợp với giá phòng. Tuyệt vời.
Giá cả ổn định, phòng oke, nhân viên thân thiện
Ổn, phục vụ ok. Chất lượng ổn áp, có máy nước nóng lạnh, ngay trung tâm dễ di chuyển
Xà phòng và dầu gội không được cung cấp. Bạn phải tự mua.
Phòng khá thiếu tiện nghi. Đặt app 228k mà đến kháchsạn tự ý làm tròn 250k. Phòng không có khăn, và giấy vệ sinh tối thiểu cũng không có luôn.
Hài lòng với thái độ phục vụ. Vị trí trung tâm siêu tiện đi lại.
Tôi thấy giá và giá vô cùng hợp lí, chỉ là phòng hơi ít tiện nghi

Nói không hài lòng cũng hơi quá, nhưng nói tuyệt vời thì không thể. Với giá tiền đó thì không thể đòi hỏi gì thêm. Mình chỉ ngủ qua đêm nên không cần gì nhiều. Nói chung phòng hơi cũ, điểm không thích là bữa mình ở, khách sạn cũng đang cho 1 số bạn làm công trình đối diện thuê nên hơi ồn ào và giày dép vứt lung tung ở hành lang nhìn hơi nhếnh nhác.
Sạch sẽ, thoải mái, nhân viên thân thiện.

Khách sạn nằm ngay phố tây. Rất tiện lợi cho việc di chuyển đến các điểm trong nội thành. Giá cả hợp lý. Bạn nào thích yên tĩnh thì không nên chọn vì ở đây náo nhiệt từ sáng tới đêm. Vui cực kỳ. Về chất lượng phòng cũng bình thường, ga với khăn hơi cũ nhưng cũng không đến nỗi. Đội ngũ lễ tân rất nhiệt tình. Lần sau đến lại ghé
Đến nơi lấy phòng thì hết nên đẩy qua khách sạn cùng hệ thống với phòng cũ, wifi chập chờn yếu
Thân thiện, hoà đồng, không gian ấm cúng
Nhân viên nhẹ nhàng, dễ thương. Đồ ăn sáng rất ngon, không gian ấn tượng. Thuê xe máy rất ok luôn

Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình, phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Vị trí nằm cách trung tâm tầm 6km, thích hợp cho những người đến để nghỉ ngơi thư giãn, không khí trong lành. Sẽ quay lại vào lần sau.
Không gian đẹp, sạch sẽ, gần gũi thiên nhiên, anh chị nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, gần một số điểm du lịch như lăng tự đức. Rất phù hợp để nghỉ dưỡng

Hôtel bien placé près des rues commerçantes piétonnes. Chambre confortable et petit déjeuner complet. Pour les visites, il faudra prendre un taxi à chaque fois car les sites sont distants les uns des autres. Piscine intérieure pas très intéressante dans un pays tropicale.
Middle of almost everything. Hotel room is very spacious and comfortable. Roof top bar is understaff and the menu is outdated. This would be my standard go to until i check out the other ones!
A luxurious looking hotel. Got upgraded to a better room which was large and spacious and with an adjoining bathroom which had a whole free-standing bath tub!
Nice as always
호텔이 청결하고 편안 합니다.다만 아침 부페 빼고는 점심 저녁은 가격대비 별로 입니다.
출장으로 좋은 숙박장소. 1층 로비도 크고 편리함.

The hotel was clean, well kept and decorated in a very peculiar way. The swimming pool was awesome and the breakfast very good and fresh. We also had one dinner at the restaurant and it was delicious.
The hotel is good for everything.
Beautiful room big bed staff very friendly walkable to the center very good location good breakfast very good price
部屋の備品が今一歩 部屋は広くてアールデコ調仕様の素敵な雰囲気ではあるが 綿のガウンは糸がほつけ放題でみすぼらしいし クローゼット内のハンガーは数が少ない ただ 猫足のバスタブが思いの外くつろげて気分良かった あの独特のカーブが身体を安定させやすいのだと思う プールやスカイテラスは気持ち良かった
Kjempefint hotell i gammel fransk stil! ingenting å klage på! godt renhold, god beliggenhet! svært vennlig personal! vil absolutt bo her neste gang også!!

We enjoyed our stay at eldora hotel! one thing to note if you book the deluxe room that does not specify city view then you will have a room that looks out onto a concrete wall one inch away. It was hard to tell this from the website since all of the pictures for this room type showed windows without a concrete wall on the other side. When we got to the room, the bellhop asked if this is what we had booked and then helped us change it. At first, they said they couldn t but then they found another room for us across the hall which was much nicer! the rooms were beautifully decorated and very comfortable. We are dinner at the hotel and had breakfast there and both were delicious with lots of options. However, there is only western food served during lunch. We didn t use the pool too much and the bar is in the same room so we didn t spend too much time there either but we did enjoy sitting on the balcony area and watching the sunset. Overall, this was a really nice hotel but it was very empty, so a lot of times we were the only people in these very grand spaces. But i would definitely stay there again if we came back to hue!

Eldora lovely hotel! very beautiful building with impressive interior decor. We really enjoyed our stay. The room was immaculate and so spacious! the bathroom is wonderfully big, with an area for the shower and toilet separated from the clawfoot tub and vanity. The only odd thing was there is no separation between the toilet and shower, so often times the toilet area gets wet after the shower is run. We loved all the extra space for our luggage. There is a pool as well, it was sizable and we spent an afternoon relaxing in it. It was odd that they only had 4 lounge chairs though. The pool area is connected to the sky bar. The breakfast buffet is pretty diverse, though they serve pretty much the same stuff every day. Location is awesome. Very close to the walkable area and lots of good restaurants. Recommend going to quan hanh (hanh restaurant) to try some authentic cheap local food without the plastic chairs, and there are plenty of fans to keep you cool. It s about a 4 minute walk from the hotel. Overall, we really enjoyed this hotel and definitely recommend!
Nice hotel nice bathroom friendly staff. Hue is a good place to visit. Why does this field have to fifty characters long
Nice hotel close to town. However we were given a room with a view of a brick wall. This was disappointing!! could be anywhere!!
The hotel room was great and the selection of all the amenities was fantastic

Perfectly adequate hotel, not much going on at hotel, bar and restaurant were empty! staff all friendly! breakfast okay choice. On a busy street which is undergoing lots of.renovation at present. A short walk from nightlife and restaurants where streets are pedestrianised fri-sun nights! turn left out of hotel walk to the end of the road (5 mins), there is a big intersection with a bar at the far side, talke the second right on to the street where the bar is and there are three or four streets with tourist shopsbars, and restaurants. Walking distance to the imperial city, turn right out of hotel and first right follow down to the river (saigon morin hotel on corner, go over bridge and take first left, go straight until you reach the imperial city - amazing place!
This hotel is very good if you want to be in central location of hue and be close to everything. The breakfast is good, the staff are super nice and the rooms are spacious and comfortable.
친절하고 깨끗. 위치 good.

Beautiful and grand hotel that looks impressive as you pull up to the entrance. Our names were on a display welcoming us to the hotel, which was a lovely personal touch. Very centrally located to the downtown area so easy walking distance to everything. Most of the guests were older, but i think this is reflective of the décor of the hotel, but should not put off a younger crowd. We booked a deluxe double panorama with a roll top bath by the window on a high floor which had great view of the city and mountains. Great breakfast with a huge choice for local and western tastes. Spectacular pool and bar on the top floor. My only criticism is the restaurant s vietnamese food was very bland, so i wouldn t eat in the restaurant, but would definitely stay at the hotel again due to the exceptional smiling staff, grand accommodation and reasonable prices.
Great hotel, nice and comfortable
Nice hotel.we love it
朝室内プールで泳ぎました 一人だけでした ちょうどよい広さのプールが１４階にあるのです 水の品質もよかったです
Neues, modernes hotel in der nähe der walking streets. Gutes frühstück, zimmer sehr gut, nur morgens etwas laut durch die funkgeräte der angestellten
位置方便 法式房間擺設舒適 房間大 設施完善 早餐好食 職員態度友善 要扣分是游池消毒味太重

The hotel has a very opulent feel to it. Our room was clean and comfortable and well air conditioned. It s reasonably close to the walking street, but you d probably want to take a cab to get to the citadel on a very hot day.
방이 크고 욕조와 화장실이 분리되어 있다. 매우 청결하게 잘 관리되고 있는듯하다. 시나 중심에 있어 관광하기 편하다. 조식은 종류가 다양하지만 맛은 보통이다.
Super luxurious room, fantastic breakfast, great pool, excellent value. -lobby was 1 floor up from the road, which required a strenuous climb up what could be slippery steps. -no bikes available
Stayed here in hue for two days - great location and very friendly staff.
一番の繁華街に近いのに静かで便利な場所にあり コストパフォーマンス最高です プールを楽しみにしていましたが 室内の小型のプールのせいか私的には塩素の臭いが気になりました 室内は広く快適でした

Old grand hotel like stay with very friendly reception people and non english speaking restaurant staff - somehow feels out of place but intriguing at the same time. Some parts of the hotel would need refurbishment esp the carpets but overall a very pleasant experience !
Great location and fabulous room with huge bathroom loved it!
Great room with beautful bathtub. Staff really friendly, good breakfast! perfect!
Muito bem localizado, atendimento e serviço excelente, conforto. Estadia dentro do esperado.
Un hotel correcto, buen servicio, instalaciones correctas, ubicacion céntrica, limpieza correcta. En resumen un buen hotel cuatro estrellas.
New hotel, pool inside! too fancy for our taste , good location

Et virkelig dejlig hotel,med den perfekte beliggenhed i hue. Virkelig store værelser med et super lækkert badeværelse til. Servicen er helt i top,og alle er meget hjælpsom og vil gøre alt for at hjælpe en. Morgenmaden er også virkelig lækker og meget alsidige. En rigtig perle i hue

We loved our room decor and the bed was really comfortable. The lobby smelt like smoke perhaps from the outdoors... The rooftop bar was neat to sit in and watch the traffic below. Breakfast was great. At times we found no staff to help us eg in the pool area and rooftop bar midmorning. Perhaps it was too early for anyone to be up there.

Flott hotell i hjerte av hue, 400 meter fra gågaten (fredag-søndag stenger de bykjernen for trafikk mellom 18 00-23 00). Nydelig frokost, flotte rom. Sengen var litt i hardeste laget for min rygg, men det er de alle generelt i asia. Flott basseng i 14 etg. Med utsikt over byen. Booker gjerne dette hotellet igjen.
トイレにをウォシュレットがありません ただしホース付きのビデがありますので何の問題も有りません
部屋はとても立派で なんの不自由もなく快適の過ごすことができました 猫足のバスタブもはじめての経験でしたがとても良かったです 場所は賑やかなところから徒歩でちょっとだけ離れている感じです
Was once clearly a great hotel but feels quite dated by now not in a great neighborhood. Overall ok experience but nothing special
Very quick check in and very helpful and polite staff, could not fault this place i hope that we can stay again in future
Beautiful, clean, well located, great breakfast. Gorgeous pool overlooking the city.

This hotel is right next to local area. The famous quan hanh restaurant is just 2mins away. The hotel lobby and rooms are no less than any 5 star hotel. The staff was very professional, they gave us early check in without any hesitation. I just wish the tv had few more movie channels. Overall very good hotel.

The place was a surprise. It has a beautiful pool area, nice roof top bar and the staff were wonderful. The decorating in the rooms is a little over the top for me but i would stay there again. Friendly staff.

The lobby smelt of smoke. The bar was tired and old and the gym was poor. This hotel needs a refurbishment. The cleaning staff woke us at 6 am with radios out our door and door slamming. When we told reception they apologised but also said they had lots of guests leaving early. This was not the response we expected as they justified the early morning noise.
Un véritable palace très confortable et au service impeccable et attentionné. Excellent emplacement, chambres luxueuses et petit déjeuner extraordinaire.

We stayed at eldora hotel for 2 nights to explore hue. Pros good location, friendly staff, good size room, decent buffet breakfast. Cons our windows face a wall (less than 2m gap) even if we were on 6th floor. Decoration throughout feels very dated. Bathroom flooding each time you take a shower. Very poor gym. Please at least add a bench or 2.
Modern hotel, large room, friendly staff. Very minor negative hotel gym equipment poor quality (only one treadmill that malfunctioned and neither of the two exercise bikes worked properly).

We stayed in eldora hotel for one night and we really wished we could have stayed here much longer! hotel is so beautiful from outside to inside and all the staff was extremely kind and helpful that made our stay with comfort and pleasure. We enjoyed the sky bar which has nice city view and the swimming pool that is connected to the bar. The breakfast was one the best! they have various selection and everything was so tasty. We will definitely go back here and will stay more nights.
Brekfast was very good and all was excellent hotel is in the center
Decoración original y tamaño de las habitaciones amabilidad del personal de recepción
The room is really clean and fresh. All staff dedicated and attentive service. There is no loss or theft. I really like the service from this hotel thanks u so much

This hotel was ok. Large rooms but a bit dated. The front desk and the dining staff were excellent. The issue we had was with the housekeeping staff and the inconsiderate noise level at 7 30 am outside our room. The we re talking on a radio at max volume and on top of this yelling to each other across the hallway. I asked if they could be a bit more quiet as it was 7 30 am and my husband was asleep but they continued at this noise level. Another issue is across from our room is a school that is very noisy. There was a school assembly outside at 8am and a speaker on a microphone that went on for about 30 minutes. If you have the option to have your room face the other way that might be best. The staff at the buffet are really kind and attentive as mentioned earlier. This made up for our other experience.
Central location and great room with five windows. People all very pleasant.
Room is spacious, but breakfast buffet is limited choice. We stayed there for 4 nights and same food every day. The only change was soup (phở, bun). Overall, hotel is good.

My room was you may not like the style of their room decoration but the room is spacious and clean, very comfy. However they need to improve the separation between the shower area and the toilet seat as the whole area was wet. The temperature setting if the air conditioner needs repair, it was still cold when we went to 27.

観光にも買い物にも便利な場所にあるバスタブ付きのホテルということでこのホテルを選び２泊しましたが お風呂に関しては期待外れでした バスタブにお湯を入れようとすると途中からぬるい湯しか出ず 栓からの水漏れもありゆっくり入浴することが出来ませんでした シャワーもヘッドが重みでズレてしまい 思うようにシャワーを浴びることが出来ません 朝食は一般的なベトナムのホテルという感じですが ベトナム料理は日本人の口に合うので美味しくいただきました 残念だったのは チェックアウト時にホテルスタッフがスーツケースをエアポートバスに積み込む際 スーツケースの取っ手を壊したのにそのことを私達に告げなかったことです 空港に着いてからそのことに気付き 帰国後にホテルにメールを送って善処を求めましたが 自分達の非を認めようとしませんでしたので リピートはないと思います

L hotel est très bien placé. Notre chambre était très grande et propre. La décoration est très chargée et pas à notre goût. Le sol de la salle de bain est très glissant. Lit confortable. Petit déjeuner très moyen.

We really loved this hotel, it s classical style looked even better in real life. The rooms were wonderful and the pool was spectacular. Great view over hue, great service, very friendly staff, and close to a lot of good restaurants.
아침 부페 지금 안합니다.코로나 때문에 손 님 거의 없어요.

This is a gorgeous hotel. The rooms are beautifully furnished with a large and gorgeous bathroom. The pool is simply stunning. The breakfast was very elaborate with hue specialties, vietnamese dishes and regular westerners options. We only spent a night there, so we had a very limited time to explore around, but in a short walk you can be on a sidewalk along the river, or you can walk around at night a block of streets that are pedestrians only. Great restaurants options near by too. We highly recommend it!!
Sehr nettes personal sauberkeit lässt zu wünschen übrig etwas in die jahre gekommen

After covid shutdown, the property was trying to restart the facility so there were some kinks like the water were extremely hot even touching the knobs of the faucet. But the staff tried their best. Wish the pool could be a bit warmer
Excelente hotel com boa localização. Café da manhã farto e muito gostoso. Super recomendo.
All very lovely at this hotel! very luxurious, was a slight shame that the pool was closed for maintenance but it has to be done sometime i guess.
Very nice

Everything was alright till i book another day to stay. They said they didn t receive my booking and offer me to upgrade another room with extra charge. I didn t agree and contact expedia customer service, an agent gave me confirm number but the staff still didn t accept that. After that they said someone canceled a room that equal to mine, they could consider for me to stay but still did not receive the booking. It s unacceptable when they tried to get extra money from guests. I left the hotel even it was really hard to book another stay same day at that time. A expedia s agent helped me to cancel and claim the refund later . This hotel s staff is unacceptable.

The staff at the eldora were kind and friendly. This hotel is well located from restaurants and shops and only a 25 minute walk to the citadel. The breakfast was really good every morning. Great value.

Decent 4 stars options to stay near the actions. The complementary breakfast cover a wide selection of cuisines and has some variety between days. Wishing an access to microwave to quickly and independently warming food.

It s location was centrally located to many of the places i wanted to visit. I am an american veteran that was stationed in the hue area during the war. I was able to revisit several locations that were familiar to me. I visited hue 2 years ago with a group of about 20 people and we stayed at your hotel several days. I was so impressed that when i planned this trip i knew i didn t have to look anywhere else, l wanted to stay here again. I would highly recommend your establishment to anyone i know that would be visiting hue.
Great hotel, good location and very friendly and helpful staff.
Very friendly staffs and cleanliness room also convenience location
Stay was comfortable
ロビーのwifiが遅かった それ以外は問題なし
호텔리어 모두가 너무 친절함. 여행예약에 문제가 생겼는데 적극적으로 도움을 주셔서 너무 고마웠음. 전체 분위기가 조용하였으며 조식이 아주 좋음.
Best in town among 4 star hotel.
Very comfortable and peaceful hotel, very convenient but not noisy location, rooms and especially bathrooms are very nice!
Very nice hotel with excellent service.
호텔은 깨끗하고 세련 되었는데 창이 없는 방이 있어 매우 불편 했음
Lovely hotel! beautiful large rooms. Very courteous staff. A bit noisy outside, but less of an issue on upper floors. Large breakfast selection.

The eldora hotel is in a great position near many interesting restaurants and shopping streets. It is within walking distance from the citadel. The decor is very dated - 80s chic - but the room was large and really comfortable with great water pressure, a gigantic bed and, as we had a corner room, excellent views. The rooftop bar, although very expensive, has a wonderful view. The breakfast, however, was a standout. The coffee was not too stewed and the choice of food available was wide. The dragonfruitsculpture is not to be missed. The staff were obliging and recommended an excellent restaurant, filled with locals, great food and wonderful prices - everything we had come to expect about vietnam.

This property is in a convenient area, especially to the imperial city, the citadel. There are plenty of shops and cafe s/restaurants within walking distance. We stayed here 3 nights and enjoyed our stay.
N/a

The staff was very welcoming and helpful in finding a driver for a full day to visit tumbs of emperors and pagoda on one day and setting a private cruise on the perfume river for our group of 6 people. The rooms were spacious and comfortable and the breakfast was fantastic.
Lovely room, but we had no view, ok for 1 or 2 nights but if staying longer and affordable it may be worth paying worth paying that bit extra for a room with windows to the outside world

The staff were incredibly helpful and the room was superbat thos price point. Would havd liked local information in the hotel direcfory as they do not have a formaltour desk. No rooftop bar anx the cafe did not appear to be open. However i called for fresh milk to my room and there was no hesitation in them providing this.
Great stay will be back
Big room and fancy.

Gorgeous hotel in every single way. Wish all of the hotels were as sumptuous as this one. Enjoyed the amazing breakfast, the pool, a drink in the lobby and the wonderfully spacious room. Wish we coukd have stayed longer.
Excellent staff and service!

So the rooms are big, but they only put twin beds if you want a double. Also they have indoor pool which is not heated, so it s pretty cold. Also their gym is on treadmill and a couple pieces of weight so don t even bother. Breakfast there is great they change a few items up every day. Staff is super nice.

Hotel is very good. Location is fairly central but unfortunately at the time of our visit the roads and footpaths were being replaced which meant that walking in the central area was difficult especially in the wet weather that we had

A beautiful hotel in the middle of chaotic hue! from check in until check out the staff have been very helpful and courteous, especially the bell boys. Breakfast is very good and lots of choice. If you are coming to hue i would thoroughly recommend that you stay here. Excellent value

Great room and welcoming, good service. Breakfast adequate but bar overly expensive, so not worth using. Definitely highly recommend staying here as the room was extremely spacious, very clean and had a wonderfully comfortable bed.

L eldora est un grand et très bel hotel. Ma chambre était vraiment très belle. J ai profité de la piscine au dernier étage, un moment agréable. Les bars et l accueil sont somptueux. Ce qui est magnifique, c est le petit déjeuner. En plus, de superbes bouquets de fleurs décorent l accueil. Je reviendrai volontiers dans ce lieu.
Overbooked and couldn t have us stay, they booked us into another hotel but it was still very disruptive to our trip

Overall an ok stay. The 2 rooms we stayed in had mold and when i mentioned it to the staff it sounded like it was a common issue as it is so hot and humid and the hotel lacked air circulation. Be aware a hotel spa resort in vietnam is not like those in america or europe and japan. I would recommend staying at a us chain brand to ensure you don t run into moldy bathrooms.
The room we had was clean and spacious. Comfy bed and linen interesting design - the gym is ill maintained and should be renovated. - the pool needs proper maintainence
Hài lòng trong tầm giá. Có thể đi bộ ra sông hương
Vị trí trung tâm, rất tiện để đến các điểm thăm quan ăn uống, phòng mới, sạch sẽ, nhân viên dễ thương!
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Phòng giá tốt mà có kèm bữa sáng bún bò huế nấu siêu ngon . Chỉ trừ 1 điểm chỗ bình nước nóng, đang tắm thì lạnh, đợi 30p sau mới nóng lại.
Rất chi là ưng khách sạn ở đây, sạch sẽ nhân viên nhiệt tình mọi thứ đều oki la không có gì để chê.
Nhân viên dễ thương, nhiệt tình. Có điều phòng hơi nhỏ

Nhân viên nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, khách sạn có hỗ trợ thuê xe máy, giá cả hợp lý tiện di chuyển, vị trí ở phía nam gần mọi địa điểm vui chơi và cầu trường tiền. Tôi sẽ quay lại đây nghỉ nếu tiếp tục du lịch ờ huế
Phòng nhỏ phù hợp với giá tiền
Mình đặt phòng cho bố mẹ, ông bà rất hài lòng và rất khen ngợi
Thật sự thoải mái khi ở tại elegant hotel
Nhân viên lễ tân phục vụ tuyệt vời. Phòng nghỉ sạch sẽ gọn gàng.
Phòng đẹp và sạch sẽ, khách sạn ngay đúng trung tâm, đi đâu cũng rất dễ. Nhân viên nhiệt tình và thân thiện. 10/10
Với giá cả như thế này không còn gì để chê, mình chỉ book hộ phòng thôi nhưng đi về ai cũng khen
Phòng sạch sẽ giá cả hợp lý, ks ngay trung tâm tiện di chuyển
Ks thoáng mát, thuận tiện đi lại, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Ncl okella
Nv rất rất thân thiện, đồ ăn sáng giản dị nhưng ấm nóng ngon lành. Một số vấn đề cần cải thiện, mình đã trao đổi trực tiếp với các bạn lễ tân. Hi vọng elegant sẽ ngày càng phát triển hơn

Nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình, dễ thương. Mình người huế nhưng làm việc tại hà nội, đợt này mình đưa các bạn công ty về huế chơi thì chọn elegant là nơi lưu trú. Mọi người ai cũng khen khách sạn sang, xịn từ trong ra ngoài, giá rẻ so với chất lượng. Điểm trừ là nhà vệ sinh rõ là rất sạch sẽ nhưng lại bị mùi cống, mong khách sạn cải thiện. Còn nữa mọi thứ rất tốt ạ

Khách sạn mới xây nên đồ rất mới và sạch sẽ, gần trung tâm nên đi lại thuận tiện! đồ ăn không quá nhiều món nhưng rất ngon, mình rất thích món bún bò! nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, có 1 góp ý duy nhất là nhà vệ sinh nên lắp thêm móc treo đồ để khi tắm khách hàng có chỗ để treo quần áo và khăn tắm!

Khách sạn hết phòng k báo trước với khách. Lái xe từ đêm hôm trước tử hn vào đến nơi khách sạn báo đặt cho 1 phòng ở ksan trước nhưng k báo trước với khách, đặt khách vào việc đã rồi. Khách sạn mới khách sạn đặt tệ hơn rất nhiều, k có bể bơi, cũng k có ăn sáng, phòng ốc đều cũ.
Dịch vụ 10 điểm, còn phòng thì hơi hơi có vấn đề, nhưng báo nhân viên là được đổi phòng mới
Phòng hơi mùi, ngoài ra vị trí thuận tiện, đồ ăn sáng ngon và đa dạng. Nhân viên dễ thương nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách.
Mình ở 2 đêm giá siêu rẻ mỗi đêm chỉ hơn 300k, nhân viên cực kì thân thiện nhiệt tình cho mình checkin sớm, phòng ngủ đẹp, sẽ quay lại
Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình
Nhân viên siêu siêu cấp thân thiện.. Phòng đẹp như giới thiệu... Điểm trừ là nước nóng và cách âm hơi kém... Vì tui tắm lâu
Nhân viên nhẹ nhàng, thân thiện, đồ ăn sáng ngon, đa dạng món nhưng khách sạn mới nên vấn đề vệ sinh cần được cải thiện nhiều hơn
Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, giá khá tốt. Ga giường mới, phòng sạch sẽ không có gì để chê.
Khách sạn đẹp, tone màu sáng sủa. Nv hiếu khách. Rất hài lòng với trải nghiệm ở đây.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, lễ phép vui vẻ, dịch vụ khách sạn tốt, đồ ăn hợp khẩu vị
Mn oke lắmmmmm ạaaaaaa )))))))))))))))))))
Phòng sạch sẽ, đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình, 10đ không có nhưng, có dịp nhất định sẽ quay lại

Ks mới, sạch sẽ, tổng quan đẹp và giá phù hợp với chất lượng. Nhưng ks trong phố, phòng nhỏ, phòng mình đặt 1 đêm chỉ có hơn 400k thôi, và với giá phòng này phòng không có ban công cửa sổ. Nếu bạn chọn nơi lưu trú chỉ để ngủ qua đêm, ban ngày bạn đi chơi kín lịch thì phòng như vậy đủ dùng nha. Nhân viên ks đều rất trẻ, niềm nở dễ thương và hỗ trợ. Ks gần quán hạnh, chè hẻm, cứ xuống phố đi 1 đoạn là có hàng ăn rồi
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, thoáng. Nhân viên thân thiện, lịch sự. Đồ ăn tuy ít do lụt nhưng ngon, nhóm của mình rất thích. Nếu có dịp đến huế thì mình sẽ chọn ks này
Khách sạn đẹp, vị trí đẹp, trung tâm, phòng sạch sẽ thơm tho, cái gfi cũng hài lòng trừ ăn sáng có ba món không đa dạng.
Khách sạn nhỏ nhưng thiết kế đẹp, phòng đầy đủ và sắp xếp hợp lý. Bữa ăn sáng ít món nhưng ngon và có các món ăn ngon đậm chất huế. Mình đã có 1 chuyến công tác ngắn nhưng rất hài lòng khi ở đây.
Vị trí tốt , nhân viên thân thiện ,ăn sáng ngon nhưng ít đồ . Phòng khá tốt , chỉ có 1 phòng có mái nhà kề bên nên mưa nghe to quá !

Nhân viên nhiệt tình, thân thiện và giải quyết các vấn đề của khách một cách nhanh chóng. Kì nghỉ là 2 đêm nhưng có book thêm 1 đêm nữa các bạn nhân viên lễ tân đã hỗ trợ gia đình rất nhiệt tình. Lần sau có dịp sẽ chọn khách sạn.
Vị trí ngay trung tâm thành phố. Thuận tiện di chuyển các điểm ăn uống, tham quan. Phòng ổn, sạch sẽ, đồ ăn sáng cũng khá ngon, nhưng phòng không có cửa sổ nên hơi bí.

Rất hài lòng khi ghé khách sạn elagant hotel. Một nơi lý tưởng để bạn có thể đến ở và ghé thăm thành phố huế. Ở trung tâm nên đi lại thuận tiện và tiện nghi khách sạn cũng như bữa sáng rất ổn so với tầm giá. Sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè thêm về nơi này.
Không gian phòng hẹp, không cách âm
Ok và tuyệt vời. Thân thiện dễ thương vô cùng. Ưng nhé. Mỗi tội chê mấy cái giường. Nó di chuyển hoài. Đẩy nhẹ cái là nó đi mất tiêu rồi

Nhân viên nhiệt tình. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ hơi nhỏ nhưng mà đầy đủ và ok, phù hợp với giá tiền. Do mình cũng đi sớm nên chưa kịp ăn sáng ở khách sạn hôm nào cả! nhưng mà tổng thể khá ok! sẽ quay lại lần sau

Các bạn nhân viên nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Bữa sáng buffet tại khách sạn có món bún bò huế ngon, còn các món khác chưa đa dạng lắm. Khách sạn mà có các bạn nhân viên ra đón khách ngoài cửa, xách phụ vali cho khách nữa thì mình không có điểm nào để chê.
Ksan ở trung tâm dễ di chuyển, nhân viên thân thiện , phòng ok
Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời 10 điểm
Khách sạn mới nên mọi thứ ok chưa thử đồ ăn nhưng vị trí khá tốt
Vị trí thuận tiện, phòng đẹp. Ăn sáng hơi ít món.
Nhân viên rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình
Phòng ở sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình, nhiều tiện ích, đồ ăn ngon, giá cả phải chăng lần sau mình sẽ quay lại
Khách sạn nhỏ tuy nhiên nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, dễ thương.
Khách sạn sạch đẹp, nhân viên phục vụ tốt và nhiệt tình . Lần sau sẽ ghé lại
Nhân viên tốt phòng sạch sẽ ấm cúng tầm giá ni mình thấy là ok nhất huế
Huế luôn ổn, sẽ lưu trú dài hơn
Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng sạch, siêu nhỏ, không có chỗ để vali, phòng cách âm kém, cân nhắc nhé mn

Phòng dành cho gia đình ổn, sạch sẽ. Nhà vệ sinh bị tắc. Nhân viên thông báo phục vụ ăn sáng từ 6h. Tuy nhiên, 6h xuống thì chỉ thấy một vài món, khoảng 7h thì mới lên đủ. Đồ ăn ít món nhưng chất lượng.
Mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời. Tôi sẽ tiếp tục lưu trú tại elegant khi nào tôi quay lại huế
Khách sạn gần trung tâm, sạch sẽ.

Schönes hotel mit einem ordentlichen standard. Zimmer sauber und in gutem zustand. Sehr gutes, reichhaltiges frühstück. Das personal ist sehr freundlich und bemüht. Das eigene restaurant zu empfehlen. Die zitadelle von hue ist unkompliziert nach einem 10 minuten fußmarsch zu erreichen. Sonst ist die direkte umgebung des hotels nicht erwähnenswert. Auf nachfrage hat das hotel auch tickets für die weiterreise organisiert. Auch eine buchung von touren wird bei bedarf angeboten. Ohne einschränkungen weiterzuempfehlen.
Excellent services good breakfast staffs are very friendly and politely. Location is good right on all amenities. Walking distance to the city and restaurant.
직원들이 친절하고 전문 조경팀이 항상 호텔의 아름다움을 위하여 열심히 일하는 모습이 인상적이다. 여행자 거리와 후에역 중간에 위치하여 좋았으며 호텔이 조용하였다.

This hotel had everything that we were looking for - clean, comfortable room, great breakfast and it s within walking distance to all the sights in hue. The pool area was also beautiful and spotless. I wouldn t hesitate to stay there again.

Bel hotel avec une belle chambre confortable. Mais avec le défaut des gros hôtels, beaucoup de groupes rendant le petit déjeuner très bruyant. Heureusement réapprovisionnement constant et bonne insonorisation des chambres. Assez proche du centre ville ainsi que de la cité impériale. Bon rapport qualité prix
Great little hotel. Just outside of the tourist areas. This meant it has more space than most. Had a lovely outdoor pool etc. Would recommend.

The manager was very helpful, even directing us to an excellent hospital (everything turned out ok). The room, pool and surrounding area, and buffet breakfast were all very good. My only concern and it was a big one it that they put us in a room below a floor that was being renovated and we could hear a lot of noise (banging, drilling) from 8am to 5pm. Worse, we were not informed of this when we checked in, nor given a discount.
Unable to latch the room door from inside. Unable to lock balcony door as well

En vérité, le séjour a commencé moyennement. Arrivé tardivement (après 22 heures) et ayant réservé la veille pour le lendemain, la personne chargée du check-in ne me trouvait pas dans ses registres. Elle m a attribué une chambre au 8ème étage. La nuit a été dure, avec beaucoup de bruit (claquements de portes intempéstif). Heureusement, le lendemain matin, la responsable de l accueil, qui parle un peu français, a pris les choses en mains changement de chambre, organisation de mes excursions, conseils pertinents sur le programme de la journée. Appréciable. Le soir, après une journée bien remplie, la petite piscine est très rafraichissante. Un violent orage a éclaté pendant que je prenais l apéritif en terrasse. Je ne peux que souligner la gentillesse et le sang-froid du personnel, qui continuait à s occuper de moi alors que tout s envolait autour de nous. L hôtel est plutôt bien situé. On peut aller à la cité impériale à pieds (15 mn de marche) ou en taxi. Les chambres sont spacieuses, avec un petit balcon la literie est bonne le wifi fonctionne bien. Le petit-déjeuner offre un très large choix. La salle est grande et bien agencée.

This is a regular hotel. There is nothing very special about it but i have nothing bad to say either. Clean, buffet breakfast, pool etc. I would say that the rooms aren t soundproofed as the ads say as they re just regular rooms with general normal sounds coming in. Not sure what the pillow menu is either as we weren t offered anything like this. Pool loses sun by around 3pm but we enjoyed it in the mornings. Location is a fair walk from the heart of huê so we got taxis everywhere. Enjoyable relaxing stay.

Nous adorons cette hôtel. Nous étions déjà venus en 2020 et comme nous avions adoré cet endroit, nous avons décidé de revenir (2023). Tout est parfait, la piscine, la chambre, l excellent petit déjeuner et la manager. Si nous revenons un jour à hué, il est certain que nous reviendrons à cet endroit. Nous vous conseillons fortement cette place.
Vi overnattet en natt på connected familierom for romslig og rent.hyggelig og serviceinnstilt personal. Kort vei til serverdigheter og sentrum.
The checkin and pool area was nice and outstanding restaurant upstairs. Good lighting and room was clean. Some small touches would push the review to a 5, like cleaner cushions by the pool.
Rigtig dejligt ophold. God morgenmad, sødt personale og god pool.
Excellent
Lo que no me agradó mucho fue el colchón porque se sentía un poco los resortes. El agua de la alberca no está templada
Really lovely and caring staff - nothing was too difficult - very helpful and our stay was memorable
Hôtel très bien situé pour visiter la cité impériale. Hôtel relaxant avec la piscine.
Great service, lovely place
Amazing stay, great location, fantastic breakfast, excellent staff.
Nice hotel. I would stay there again. The reception was awesome, very friend and helpful
Great service at front desk. Arrived early and were given access to room well ahead of check-in, and given an upgrade. Very helpful staff.
직업상 여행을 많이 합니다. 베트남 후에 여행할 때 선호하는 호텔입니다. 적절한 가격에 위치가 좋습니다.
Great hotel in quiet location less touristy but can walk to most sites and good restaurants
Hôtel très agréable et propre. Personnel top.
Hôtel très bien situé à quelques minutes de la cité impériale. Accueil chaleureux et très agréable. Petit déjeuner copieux et excellent café. À recommander sans hésitation!

Really good hotel that was really cheap, i didn t know what to expect for the price 120au per night with breakfast included, but the room was a great size for the four of us, two seperate bedrooms and the pool area was good too. A 5-10 min grab gets you to anywhere and the best bahn mi in vietnam is a 400m walk away (tiem nha an). Staff were really helpful and friendly, i would absolutely stay here again.
Bon rapport qualité prix
チェックイン開始時刻の3時間前に着いたにも関わらず部屋に入れて頂きました 交差点に面しているため少し車の音が気になりますが寝る分には問題ありません コンビニやスーパーは近くにないのであらかじめどこかで買い出ししておいた法がよいです ご飯を食べるところは比較的ある方だと思います
시설도 깨끗하고 친절하고 모든면에서 만족스러웠습니다.
Good service, friendly staff, comfy and clean bed. Very good location. Recommended for the next visit in hue.
Very clean facilities, friendly staff.
En superbra opplevelse for far og sønn på 16 år. God service og vennlighet fra første stund. Anbefales på det varmeste, spesielt for barnefamilier.
Sehr freundliches personal, die zimmer sind mehr als in ordnung für den preis und es liegt auch recht zentral.

The hotel is fairly well situated. The rooms (we had 2) were very comfortable, very well finished and clean. The wifi was excellent. The pool area was a little small for the size of the hotel. The staff were ok. I was disappointed with the restaurant. I thought the meals they served (apart from breakfast) were pretty ordinary. Breakfast was ok, but nothing special.
전반적으로 만족하고 주변에 빈펄 쇼핑몰이 잏어 편했어요
Preis-/leistung ist sehr gut

Nous avons eu quelques difficultés lors du checking car nous avions réservé en mars des chambres avec lit double et nous avons eu des chambres avec 2 lits simples. Nous étions déçus que notre demande faite il y a plusieurs mois n ait pas été respectée. Neanmoins l équipe a su se montrer conciliante, d autres chambres nous ont été proposées le lendemain, conformes à notre demande. Nous avons été ravis qu un geste commercial nous soit proposé pour le restautant atenant, dans lequel nous avons tres bien diné. Les chambres sont propres, la piscine agreable, et tres bon petit dejeuner.
Thìs hotel is very good for anything even service and food should i come back
Großes zimmer mit sehr guter ausstattung. Perfekter service. Sehr gute lage

Big rooms, bright atmosphere, great breakfast and outstandingly helpful service! clean, no technical defects, good location in hue. I broke a leg befome my stay and they agreed to move a non refundable fixed booking by three weeks to help me, no charges. Exemplary customer orientation!

Hôtel très bien situé en plein centre ville mais au calme. La situation permet de profiter de hué que nous avons bien aimé. Le personnel est souriant et disponible et la chambre au top. Le meilleur rapport qualité prix de hué.
宿泊料金が安かったので心配しましたが サービス 設備 朝食すべて満足できるものでした 昼食 夕食も館内のレストラン spice viet)を使い 落ち着いた雰囲気でおいしくいただきました
Fint hotel og service.
Very quiet inner circle of hotel, still good view on 7 floor great balcony attentive room service and cool pool
Es hat alles gepasst sowohl die lage als auch die unterkunft sind zu empfehlen.
The food in restauranr was wondeful

Nous avons adoré notre séjour au emm hotel à hué. L hôtel est très beau et très propre. La piscine et les transats sont parfaits. Le petit déjeuner et très varié et très bon. Tout le personnel, en particulier la manager, sont très gentils et nous ont aidé durant notre séjour. Nous vous conseillons fortement cet hôtel.
Clean rooms, fine breakfast, nice pool. Good position. Good value for the money
Das hotel hat einen schönen pool, das frühstück ist o.k hat alles was man braucht. Die zimmer sind sehr schön und sehr sauber. Wir hatten eine gute zeit dort.

Eva homestay is a nice place that you can choose if you visit hue and want to stay central. The small minus point is that the homestay does not have a nice view and the accommodation is not in top condition. The host was very helpful and friendly

Eva was amazing. Our family of four stayed for two nights. It was a great location and very affordable. But the best part was eva - she was very friendly and accommodating, she helped us set up a city tour, directed us to good restaurants and generally made our stay wonderful.

Wir wurden von der ersten sekunde an mit offenen armen und herzen empfangen und von vorne bis hinten verwöhnt wo es ging. Eva und das ganze personal sind liebevoll und herzlich, kümmern sich, beantworten fragen und man fühlt sich wie ein teil der familie. Die zimmer sind super, betten komfortabel und frühstück sehr gut für vietnam. Wir haben uns unfassbar wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen. Danke für den schönen aufenthalt!
Das haus liegt sehr zentral und trotzdem ruhig,man kann zum parfümfluss und zur zitadelle zu fuß laufen.eva ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit,sie gab mir viele gute tipps.

Eva homestay is the best choice in hue for everything. Eva s family and her staff is very friendly and lovely. Her home in good location, comfortable and very good values for money. She can speak really good english and help you with tour and transport booking if needed.

Very nice hotel for the price. Clean rooms, well maintained and comfortable bed. Located a few minutes from restaurants and busy area (pedestrian street on week-end) the owner was very friendly and available, she took very good care of our group. Included breakfast made to order (about 5-10 options) was excellent and accompanied with fresh fruits. Kids (and adults) loved the chocolate banana pancake!!

Eva s homestay war einfach super. Ich bin nach einer langer zugfahrt bereits in der früh angekommen. Das zimmer konnte ich zu dieser uhrzeit bereits beziehen. In dieser zimmer habe ich so gut geschlafen, dass ich kaum wieder rauswollte. Die besitzerin war zudem super nett und hat alles rund um die unterkunft und sehenswürdigkeiten erklärt. Wenn ihr in hue seit, kommt zu eva. Hier gibt es alles was du brauchst, zwar kein luxus, aber was will man für 12 euro auch erwarten. Es ist sauber, die besitzerin herzlich und das bett ein traum.
Good location not too far from attractions. The room was clean and owners very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!
The location is super convenient and ready to find. Eva is very helpful and provided suggestion on local restaurant recommendations and tour help us to sign-up for local tour.
Had a great night here, location is easy for tour pick ups and had lots of great coffee shops around. The staff were really friendly and couldn t do enough for me. Would definitely come back

This is a five star review for a two night stay. You must consider hotel cost when rating the eva. It was half the price of all of our other stays in vietnam. Room bed a little hard but this tracks with vietnamese hotel bed standards. Fridge did not work. There is no safe in room. The air conditioner is incredibly strong and can be left on even when you leave the room which is important as we were leaving and coming back frequently due to the heat. I wish they provided hair conditioner as only one packet of 3-in-1 was given. For the price this room was exceptional. Service we rented a motorbike for the same cost as at other rental places yet felt safe knowing it is the owners own bike and not through a third party. There was no issue with it, and i feel she would have been good to deal with if there was any damage which cannot always be said of independent renters of bikes. Overall would stay again if looking to save money as this is a great deal. At this price all i expect is a clean room with a decent bed, strong ac, and a working shower.

No elevator. I booked 3 rooms (2 rooms for 5 days, 1 room for 2 days, 2 persons per room). The first question the owner asked me (do you want to upgrade? upgrade for what? lower level-for how much? bla bla bla or you can take one bigger room at lower level in exchange for 2 rooms you booked, the prices i (the owner) posted on expedia was years ago, now they are much higher, bla,bla, i do not want to continue the conversation,etc.

Excellent accueil et tres aimable. Le petit dejeuner est tres bon et la proprietaire offre plein de conseils et d aide. Malheureusement sans ascenseur donc armez vous de courage si vous avez de gros bagages parce qu il faudra les monter a pied soit meme. Le logement est bien placé pas trop loin de la cité imperiale.

Eva homestay was perfect for us! great location, room with a nice terrace and a very friendly and helpful owner. We arrived early due to a night train and were treated very kindly welcome drink, a chance to change our room if we needed one ready, tips on what to do/see while they kept our luggage so many little things so very helpful when you want to enjoy your time in hue!

Eva is amazing. Her english is very good and she went above and beyond to help us enjoy hue. She is the best host and her place is very clean and comfortable. I stayed in some 5 star places in da lat and lang co and her service is on par with those. I would rather stay at eva s place than any other in hue.
Rất ưng ý sé ghé lại lần sau và giới thiệu cho bạn bè

Phòng rộng, đặc biệt là phòng đầu và phòng cuối có cửa sổ, không gian (201,301,304). Khách sạn ngay trung tâm phố đi bộ, tiện đi lại. Chỉ tiếc là phòng không có nước uống, dùng gì trả tiền đó d toalet nhỏ và ẩm.
Nhân viên nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp rất ok. Ngay trung tâm phố đi bộ thuận tiện cho việc đi lại
Khách sạn không có thang máy, khách phải tự xách vali lên lầu 3 phòng 403 phòng nhỏ tầm 10m2 màn sáo hư kéo không được nên bũi sáng rất chói khi đag ngủ

Khách sạn sạch, đẹp, vị trí ngay khu trung tâm. Tuy nhiên ra giường không thay mới, để mùi của khách cũ và nhăn nheo. Trong khi các phòng khác được thay mới. Không có nước suối miễn phí và trà cà phê trong phòng.
Vị trí tuyệt vời. Phòng khách sạn sạch sẽ và ngăn nắp. Nhân viên thân thiện và hữu ích.
Mặc dù đặt 2 phòng family 30m2 , nhưng khi nhận phòng thì báo là chỉ còn 1 phòng family và 1 phòng đôi...số tiền bằng nhau nhưng diện tích 1 phòng 15m2 va 1 phong 30 m2...

Phòng giống trong hình, đẹp xinh, rộng rãi thoáng mát, đầy đủ tiện nghi, có view nhìn trực tiếp xuống đường phố. Khách sạn nằm ngay trên phố đi bộ nên xung quanh có đầy đủ các quán ăn, đi ăn uống rất thuận tiện, nhất là buổi tối cuối tuần đi dạo phố đi bộ cũng tiện. Nhân viên lễ tân rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình tư vấn, giúp đỡ và hỗ trợ nhận phòng sớm cho gia đình mình. Nói chung chắc chắn sẽ tiếp tục lựa chọn khách sạn lần nữa nếu có dịp đến huế

Tụi mình đã có 1 kỳ nghĩ tuyệt vời tại huế. Khách sạn flora nằm ngay khu phố tây, bước chân xuống đường là tới phố. Khách sạn nằm ngày đầu đường nên quãng đường dắt bộ xe máy mỗi tối chỉ có 20m. Rất thuận tiện. Phòng ở sạch sẽ, ngay phía ngoài nên nhìn thẳng được xuống phố, thoáng mát. Phòng vệ sinh lúc nào cũng có nước nóng, rất thích. Các bạn lễ tân siêu dễ thương và nhiệt tình, lúc nào cũng ân cần hỏi thăm chu đáo. Con gái huế nói giọng ngọt nghe rất thích. Cảm ơn flora vì đã góp phần làm cho kỳ nghĩ của tụi mình tuyệt vời hơn nhé.
Nhân viên vô cùng thân thiện và nhiệt tình, lần sau tới huế nhất định sẽ quay lại flora
Mình đặt phòng 1 giường nhưng khách sạn cho mình ở phòng 2 giường luôn. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, nhân viên cực kì thân thiện nằm ngay trong phố đi bộ nên đi đâu cũng gần
Gần trung tâm, dịch vụ tốt, thân thiện
Nhân viên nhiệt tình với khách

Mình rất hay đi huế và đây là lần đầu tiên mình ở khách sạn này. Mặc dù mình nhận phòng vào lúc 2h sáng (vì bị trễ tàu) nhưng nhân viên ở đây vẫn rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Nhìn chung thì khách sạn khá nhỏ nhưng ấm cúng và sạch sẽ. Wifi lúc mình đến thì không sử dụng được nhưng nhân viên đã nhiệt tình khắc phục và đổi cho mình đường truyền mạnh hơn. Nói tóm lại thì mình không thấy điểm nào là không ok cả vì chỉ cần dịch vụ khách hàng tốt thì mình đã cảm thấy thoả mãn rồi, vì thật sự làm dịch vụ hay khách sạn đều không tránh khỏi sai sót, chỉ cần có thể lắng nghe ý kiến khách hàng và khắc phục nó là đã thật sự tuyệt vời. Mình rất ít khi viết feedback, nếu bản thân cảm thấy không xứng đáng để giới thiệu đến mọi người. Đây là khách sạn rất-đáng-để-quay-lại-lần-2
Phục vụ tận tình chu đáo, sẽ quay lại với thời gian gần

Vị trí khách sạn rất lý tưởng, ngay phố tây nên tham quan rất dễ. Tuy phòng nghỉ được không rộng lắm nhưng rất sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, vui vẻ, thân thiện! 2 anh chị nhân viên siêu dễ thương!
Phòng ở khách sạn hơi nhỏ nhưng bù lại nhân viên nhiệt tình. Giá cả chấp nhận được!
Nhân viên thân thiện hỗ trợ tốt và nhiệt tình. Lúc đầu không để ý nên đặt phòng tiết kiệm nên phòng hơi nhỏ nhưng sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Lần tới có dịp quay lại huế vẫn sẽ chọn flora
Phòng xinh và sạch sẽ, nhân viên nhiệt tình, nếu có dịp sẽ ghé lại

Khách sạn tốt trong tầm giá, ngay khu phố đi bộ nên có rất nhiều hoạt động cho khách du lịch, đặc biệt là khách nước ngoài, tuy nhiên giá sinh hoạt ăn uống khu này cao hơn các khu khác.... Với mình thì mọi thứ đều ổn, lần tới mình sẽ ghé lại
Khách sạn sạch đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện và nhiệt tình

Đặc trưng của khách sạn có lẽ là các bạn staff.
