The hotel looks nice. The view from the 33rd-floor restaurant was great. The gym was exceptionally well-equipped. But it s not a five-start hotel primarily because of poor service. The service at the restaurant was extremely slow because staff were not paying attention. They just stood there. The same can be said about the coffee shop in the lobby. I bought a piece of cake and a cup of coffee, but the coffeemaker was out of order, which was fine. The woman at the shop seemed to have no idea what to do. I asked if i could get something else that doesn t require the use of the coffeemaker, but she was either unwilling or just completely flustered. Then i asked if i could get a refund on my credit card just for the coffee, but not for the cake. She wasn t sure what to do. I asked if i could get it back in cash. No clear response. After about ten minutes of back and forth, she took it to the reception desk. The guy at the desk told me that they couldn t make a refund with cash. So he voided my purchase both for the coffee and the cake. In the end, i had to walk away, having wasted 20 minutes, with no cake or coffee. In the meantime, there was no apology or any acknowledgement that they had caused me inconvenience. Aside from the porr service, another potential problem for tourists is that the hotel is about 10-15 minutes away from a neighborhood where a lot of restaurants exist. You d have to cross major streets to get there on foot.

Stayed 12 days, high expectations for a 5 stars hotel. Nice location. Beautiful lobby. Staff dressed professional attire even to house keepers. All greeted us politely, opened our door. We felt welcome. Greet with smiles and keeping eyes contact during our conversations. It s small gestures, but not happen often in vn. We had 2 premium rooms, nice extra space. Rooms are clean. Bedsheets are white and clean. Bathrooms are clean with all amenities like shampoo, shower gels filled. Toothbrush abd toothpaste provided are really nice with other things that we forgot to packed. Towels are freshly clean. Room slippers are clean and newly white. However, one bathroom had the light switch broken, toilet didn t flush consistently, it s annoying on the 1st night as we told the manager they should checked the room before we moved in. It s nice they replaced the switch and a brand new toilet the next day when we re out in the morning. Our other room lock has battery ran out so we couldn t get back in the room on early morning. It was taken care right away. The staff did apologize and send a few things up as a token. There are not many rooms per floor which are very nice. 4 elevators provided plenty. We hardly had to wait for elevator. The sounds proof of noise are amazing. Our rooms are near the elevators, we didn t hear anything. The staff are amazing. Quyen took care of us. Buffet breakfast is very nice and clean. Food are fresh and variety. Love
とても良かったです フエは何度か行ったことがありますが メリアは初めてでした アップグレードして ラウンジが使えるようにしましたが 2人で13000円ほどでとても安い なのに サービスはしっかりしていてとても満足です 部屋から見える景色も素晴らしかった ありがとう
Quiet and very clean place, easy access to anything

The service and staff were awesome. The only complaints i have is the start of mold in the shower corners and the warmth of the common areas. The food was ok nothing to write home about. I would stay again.
It s a lovely, new hotel in hue, very near all the tourist attractions. It s modern with excellent service and comfort. Highly recommend
Très bel hôtel, bien situé, vue magnifique. Chambres confortables et propres. Petit déjeuner avec beaucoup de choix.
Such a comfortable stay, great service from all of the staff, helped organise day trip to hoi an, would stay again!

Staff, service, cleanliness of room, location were all exceptional. Only a 4 star for property condition because the toilet didn t flush very well and the ceiling fan speed didn t work well. Otherwise the property is kept in excellent condition. We would highly recommend a stay at the melia vinpearl in hue!

Lovely hotel, short grab from the imperial city. We had a great lunch from the restaurant with incredible views and breakfast was also fab. There was some construction noise in the night from nearby sites. Very good price for a great hotel.

The shower toiletries we very difficult to use as they are squirt bottles that didn t work and could not remove from wall mount. The plugs next to the bed did not work and the only real accessible plug was all the way across the room. When i tried to exchange money at the counter they would not accept the usd claim it not good but the one they did take and gave me money written on and marked. Why not accept my money with one little dot but give me tiền and written on money? sometimes it s the smallest things that will make me not return. Thể zenith restaurant was so hot i was sweating while eating. Over all the hotel was okay but i think trying to be to fancy makes it not tolerable. I won t stay again in the future

Large rooms. Great breakfast. Pool was adequate. Covered so nice and cooling but always quite busy. Rooftop bar had great views but as in any flash hotel was expensive evenduringhappy hour. Gives 3 keycards. One for each of us and one to keep the ac on while we were out. Fantastic
Very clean property !friekdly staff
Best breakfast ever
Room was fairly big. Nice swimming pool. Walkable to night market. Great location. Super clean. The doormen was very friendly but the receptionist was very unfriendly.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour au melia de hué. Toutes nos demandes préalables ont été respectées et même plus encore. Cela vaut vraiment le coup de prendre une chambre level, l accès au lounge toute la journée plus l happy hour de 15h30 à 18h30 sont un plus. Nous avons également bénéficié du service de lavage avec 2 habits par chambre inclus. La piscine est grande et tout le personnel est souriant et ne demande qu à aider. S il fallait trouver des reproches, je dirais que le mini-bar payant et la tv ancienne (non connectée) sont les seules choses négatives. En conclusion nous recommandons fortement cet hôtel proche de toutes les attractions de hué.

I had a wonderful experience at vinpearl-hue hotel. The building is impressive, the room impeccable and its staff very polite and helpful. Its location is also perfect - near good restaurants. My only regret is i didn t stay long enough to enjoy all the hotel has to offer.
Great service
Nice

Very dedicated efficient staff. Our room had some issue with the paint smell from a nearby room which was in renovation and linh at the concierge desk promptly moved us to another room on a different floor and solved the problem. We were very happy with our stay there and are definitely recommending this hotel.
The hotel is within walking distance to many good restaurants and shopping areas. Its facilities are well maintained and its staff very dedicated efficient. I highly recommend this hotel.

Our stay was great. The room was spacious, the bed comfortable and the bathroom large. There was a choice of pillows, which was perfect. The staff were super friendly and the breakfast buffet had all what we wanted and much more. Overall, two perfect nights.
Service is great. Polite and very helpful

I d found this hotel on a previous visit to hue (you can t really miss it), but i had been staying at another five star just down the road. I always said, if i ever came back, i would stay here instead, and i did just that. It s an impressive building both inside as out. I had booked a premium room with views, and boy were the views amazing. I ended up on 32nd floor, which is their highest floor for accommodation. It s also the same floor as their club/executive lounge called the level which we had included with our room. That too was amazing. In the afternoon (15 30 to 18 30) they do a lovely selection of nibbles/canapés and free drinks. The drinks included red and white wine, spirits, beer and even a few cocktails. It was absolutely worth every penny. The sky bar is phenomenal. Brilliant cocktails (including a 2-4-1 happy hour til 7pm). Lovely staff and amazing views. The pool is great. Heated to a nice temperature. Technically an inside pool, but they have big windows that they can open, although they were closed all the time i was here. Be nice to have those open. The rooms were well laid out with every amenity you could possibly need. Housekeeping did a great job of keeping everything spotless, thank you. Breakfast was the only slight disappointment. There was lots of food on offer, but i was surprised not to see things like eggs benedict for such a high-end hotel. They also seemed very understaffed with tables left uncleared. By far best hotel in hue though
どこからも目印になるタワーホテル フロントも部屋も広くて綺麗 スタッフの対応も速く的確で笑顔もある 隣にショッピングセンターもあり食品なども調達可能 スリッパ ガウン バスアメニティー 歯ブラシ ペットボトルの水もある 見晴らしもよく 最上階のbarからは周囲の景色が見渡せる 湯船もありゆっくりできた
La struttura era in posizione comoda
Great service from reception, lots of amenities with a clean room
Staffs was great!
Safe, shop
The staff were kind, helpful, friendly and welcoming. The breakfast buffet was very good. The lobby attendant bao was very helpful on several occasions. He s excellent to have on staff.

The staff were professional and their customer service were exceptional. The hotel is beside the mall making it convenient to pick up snacks. I chose this location as it was close to the imperial palace and there were many food options such as bun bo hue. The room was clean and spacious there are no complaints.
Great
Loved the hotel. Good service, good breakfast buffet, good views from the sky bar. Indoor pool is great! level rooms are worth it.
Friendly staff. Excellent breakfast buffet!

I had a room on the 20th floor with a great view over the old city and perfume river. The room was comfortable. Breakfast was good with egg station and great selection of food. Nice coffee shop in foyer selling coffee and cakes. I ate in the hotel restaurant one evening and the food was good only downside was there is a smoking area on a mezzanine level and the smell was strong. Location is good, next to hotel is shopping malk with some restaurants.
Enjoyed our stay. Staff were very helpful.

Excellent place with very high standard of cleanliness generous complimentary offerings . Two constructive observations 1) only one plug socket in the room ( hair drying is difficult because of the positioning of the lone plug socket . 2) lifts are way too slow for a modern 33 story building .
Everyone was incredibly kind and professional.
2 度目のフエでしたが 今回このホテルにして良かったです フエで一番高い建物で 部屋から王宮まで眺めることができるし 街の何処からでも見えるので 道を間違えることがありません 部屋は清潔で 朝食も美味しく 快適な４泊を過ごすことができました 次回フエに宿泊する場合は またこのホテルに宿泊します
すべて快適で問題なかった ただ 冷蔵庫が壊れていたのか電源が入らなかった

Bel hotel bien situé. La chambre est belle et grande et nous avions une belle vue degagée en angle. Bon petit dejeuner varié dans une belle salle de restauration. Les fenetres de la piscine peuvent etre fermées ce qui permet d en profiter. Personnel trés accueillant.
Thời gian tuyệt vời ở đây. Điều mình khó chịu duy nhất ở chỗ này là thang máy chậm v.
Phòng ở sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, rộng rãi.
Phòng trung tâm, đi lại thuận tiện, nhưng phòng mình giường đệm có nhiều kiến làm mình ngủ hơi sợ
Khách sạn rất oki, thân thiện và sạch sẽ
Phong be, không tu lanh. Duoc cai nhan vien than thien
Phòng sạch sẽ, dễ thương, ngay trung tâm đi lại tiện
Phòng gia đình dễ thương, tiện nghi vừa đủ sạch đẹp. Vị trí thuận lợi để tham quan xung quanh.
Tuyệt, phòng rất đẹp, 10 đỉm 3
Có lời khen vì khách sạn rất sạch sẽ, cũng gần trung tâm nên đi đâu book xe cũng tiện nè. Lưu ý cho mọi người là cần dọn phòng phải chủ động báo trước khách sạn nè.

Phòng nhỏ, xinh, ngay trung tâm, nhân viên nhiệt tình dễ thương, chỉ có bất tiện một chút xíu là phòng của mình không có gương soi đặt phía ngoài nên lúc trang điểm phải vào phòng với ánh sáng hơi yếu.
Khách sạn sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, yên tĩnh. Nhân viên dễ thương, nhiệt tình. Có dịp sẽ quay trở lại.

Tôi thấy phòng ốc thì cũng vừa nhưng vòi sen bị hư long ra chỗ tắm, chồng tôi có báo nhân viên trực ca họ nói biết rồi nhưng vẫn không thay đổi cho các khách khác thì thấy cũng không được chuyên nghiệp lắm nên tôi góp ý hy vọng khách sạn sớm cải thiện dịch vụ.
Giá phải chăng gần trung tâm, có thể thuê luôn xe máy, phòng thoáng mát
This hotel is clean, friendly, exactly as advertised.

Vị trí trung tâm nên giá này tương đối ổn! được cái khu vực này có rất nhiều quán ăn và đồ ăn vặt giá cả tương đối mềm! nếu đi xe máy thì đây là lựa chọn tuyệt vời nhưng nếu đi xe hơi thì điểm trừ chính là không có chỗ gửi và giữ xe hơi
Phòng gọn gàng, gần trung tâm có tv. Nhưng ra giường có kiến, cắn hết cả người mình làm ngủ không được ngon giấc nữa. Đã dậy phủi rồi nhưng không hiểu sao ở 2 ngày nó vẫn ở đâu chui ra cắn nhỉ
Phòng đẹp, thoải mái, sạch sẽ, thơm phức. Chị chủ dễ thương. Giống hình luôn nên mình chả up hình nữa )) mỗi tội là không có gương toàn thân để soi outfit trước khi đi chơi
Các bạn và cô chú ở home rất nice, home sạch sẽ và tiện đi lại
Phòng rộng rãi, sạch sẽ thoải mái, nhân viên thân thiện vui vẻ.10 điểm không bàn cải luôn
Nội thất cũ. Ăn sáng ok. Chổ để xe ô tô hơi chật.
Rất giá trị tiền khách sạn. Phòng là tốt và sạch, vị trí thuận tiện chỉ 20 phút đi bộ đến hoàng thái sắc. Ăn sáng là tuyệt vời với nhiều tốt. Rat khuyen khich.
Nhan vien nhiet tinh! phong dep, sach se, an sang nhieu mon ngon! noi chung tot
Nệm kêu, thức ăn sáng không ngon, không phong phú
Một khách sạn rất tốt, với cơ sở vật chất tuyệt vời, vị trí tuyệt vời và ăn sáng buffet tốt.
Khách sạn đẹp, ngay trung tâm, nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, dễ thương, đặc biệt nhà hàng ở tầng thượng view đẹp, thức ăn ngon. Sẽ trở lại vào lần sau.
Phòng thoải mái, nhà hàng có nhiều thứ cho bữa sáng. Nếu bạn muốn đặt một chuyến tham quan thành phố, hãy hỏi lễ tân. Các tour du lịch có giá 26 và hướng dẫn viên nói tiếng anh.
Phòng sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện.
Không đầy đủ đồ vệ sinh cá nhân, nhan viên khong nhiet tinh, nói chung ai đạt khách sạn khuyen mãi sẽ không phục vụ nhiệt tình
Dịch vụ tốt, nhân viên thân thiện, ăn sáng ngon.
Ăn sáng phong phú, phòng ốc tạm được, nhân viên nhiệt tình.
Khach san tam ok. Mon an sang khong thay doi neu o lau (6 dem) thi se thay ngan.
Hài lòng về chất lượng của khách sạn
Phuc vu tot. Khach san vi tri tot. Phong ngu chap nhan duoc.
Bản thân căn phòng quá cũ. Máy điều hòa cũng quá cũ.
Phòng cũ. Nước yếu. Chăn ga không sạch

Nhân viên lễ tân có vẻ không chuyên nghiệp và tiếp đón khách với thái độ hời hợt. Chổ lưu trú ngay trung tâm thành phố nhưng cơ sở vật chất quá tệ và cũ kỹ. Phòng rất cũ và có mùi so với giá tiền bỏ ra thì không hợp lý
Lúc đầu khách sạn đưa cho mình phòng không có ban công sau mình yêu cầu đổi lại.
Phòng tắm cũ, mành rèm bị hỏng không sửa

Superb service by the staff. The breakfast is ala carte, and they cook it only when you turn up at the dining area. Dining area is covered open air on 5th floor. During month of january, it is nice with cool and natural fresh air blowing. Hotel is new, just started in highly recommend it.

New hotel. Everything clean and well fitted. This has been the best hotel we stayed in for 2 months. Excellent beds, bathroom and facilities. Great location. Photos accurate. Stayed in family room. Was quiet and ultra clean. Bathroom with curtain so it wasn t wet all over the floor. Staff were extremely friendly. I couldn t reccomend it more. Wish we had more than 1 night.
Clean
Friendly staffs , very convenient!
The staff, in particular the two young women in reception were absolutely fantastic.
Very friendly helpful staff. Good breakfast.

Really disappointed with my stay here, hotel looks stunning in pictures but it s very old and dated and the rooms need a lot of tlc. The bedding and pillows were stained. There was rubbish under the bed. The head board and chairs look like they ve been around longer than me. The shower was the worst i ve ever used and the tv is old with no option for any apps, which isn t ideal when you are from the uk. I booked a later bus to leave today and ended up just paying 5 times the price for a taxi as the pool was also out of service. I had originally booked this hotel with the plan to chill at the pool on my last day for a few hours before i left but this was not possible. Checking in was a bit awkward where you were asked to go sit down while they did what they had to do. Was also told to confirm the price i paid which was a bit odd. The walls are also paper thin so both days during my stay i was woken around 5.30-6am with guests talking or walking through the halls for breakfast. Location is also pretty poor, about 25-30 minute walk from centre. The concierge was lovely but other than that really poor experience. Was my 6th hotel that i ve stayed in during this trip and was a real let down.

Hotel room wonderful. Large separate sitting area with large balcony. 1 1/2 bathrooms. Only big negative we were on 8th floor .. Restaurant bar on 9 ... No insulation really noisey. Our friends in room next to ours had to call 2 times to get them to stop noise.
Nice, clean hotel. Lovely staff. Not exactly in the main food district so need to walk 15 minutes or get a cab.
Muy amable todo el personal. Nos ayudaron con un problema que tuvimos ajeno a ellos, algo que se agradece mucho en un país extranjero. Muy bien en general.
Great clean room with wonderful views and very good breakfast spread
Friendly, efficient and helpful staff. Only a au 2 taxi ride to the centre of town, but easily walked. Lovely and clean, good breakfast provided.

This hotel is very large. The rooms are roomy and very clean. The pool area is very nice and the lobby is welcoming. The staff is friendly and allowed us to store our bags for a long time. The breakfast was delicious and we got a nice view of the city. The staff made great recommendations for restaurants in the area.

We ve spent some very nice days at the hotel. The staff was very very friendly. We only stayed there two days but we would definitely recommend it. The breakfast was alright. However, the hotel itself is not that central. So you have to take the taxi (around 15 minutes) in order to get to the central part of the city.
The hotel is clean.the staff was nice and accommodating .i would return to this hotel in the future visit to hue.
Hotel is clean. Breakfast was excellent with vietnamese and western food.
Great hotel in hue. Walking distance to the river and the old section. Good breakfast selection and they packed a breakfast for us on the day of our early flight out. Highly recommended.

帽子を忘れてしまった際 ハノイのホテルまで届けてくれた 大切な帽子だったので 本当に感謝している ありがとう 駅から近い ベトナムではあたりまえのことだが 定刻どおりに到着しない鉄道に乗り 疲れ果てて駅につき 駅周辺にはボッタくりタクシーしかいない中 わずかに歩けば到着するこのホテルはとても心強い 施設は少し古いが 古いなりに清潔にしている様子 朝食の種類はこの価格帯としては豊富 目の前が有名な宮廷茶の本店
Within walking distance of the railway station, but remote from the tourist area.
Clean and spacious rooms. Empty swimming pool. Good breakfast.
The trainee staff and staff were very kind
It was amazing. The hotel is near to the train station (walk distance). And it have a nice view to the whole city that you can appreciate during the breakfast.

Modern hotel with tv, fridge, restaurant, wifi, atm and very helpful and welcoming staff. Thank you to everyone at the door, reception, room and restaurant for a wonderful visit. A few minutes walk to the train station and to the river.

We were able to walk from train station to hotel easily, and they were very accommodating and let us check in early. Spacious room with comfy, clean bed. Shower had good pressure too. Hotel less than half an hour walk from old citadel too.

Personnel compétant , de bon service. Une des réceptionnistes, trés aimable, un peu à notre service, car parlant parfaitement français., nous a conseillé pour des excursions d une journée, organisées par l hotel hotel moderne, nous avons eu une grande chambre, tout confort. Par contre, il manque un peu d insonorisation entre les chambres.
Good location, staff are helpful. Restaurant service was slow.

The place was very tired and the reception staff no welcoming. The rooms were okay but not worth the money. The dining room staff were so lovely and helpful so not all bad. I think that this place needs a revamp and it would be alot nicer.
Heerlijk hotel vriedelijke service goed ontbijt.

Tijdens het gehele verblijf merk je dat dit ooit een mooi luxe hotel was. Echter is veel outdated , overal vlekken op het tapijt, en zichtbaar zijn er lekkages geweest. Ook sloot de deur van de kamer slecht en werkte het slot niet. Dit werd netjes opgelost maar veel laat zien dat er achter stallig onderhoud is. Het personeel is verder vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Bij aankomst krijg je een drankje als welkom en bij vertrek regelde zij een taxi voor ons.
The hotel is old. The bed was very hard and the bathroom ceiling had mold. On a good note, breakfasts were exceptional and staff very friendly. The hotel was also in a good location.
Although the facilities is a bit old but the friendliness and hospitality from the staff can offset it.
Get slept by nights

Abbiamo chiesto alla reception se potevamo affittare le biciclette e hanno fatto di tutto per convincerci a non prenderle. All arrivo non ci hanno fornito la mappa della città con i punti di interesse da vedere e gli spostamenti. La piscina è piccola e l acqua non è pulitissima. In generale buono/ medio - non eccellente.
It wasn t too bad, but choice of food for breakfast not much to choose from
Nice clean hotel with plush bedding. Good breakfast buffet, fast check-in check-out. We only stayed here one night. Wish we d stayed more.

While working for sixteen days in hue, i stayed with the welcoming staff of the mondial. By day 2, most every staff member knew my name, which scotch i preferred at the lobby bar, and where i was walking each morning. Phi, at the travel desk, planned several exploration adventures for me and always gave me reliable advice about best routes for walking in the evenings for outings, then remained available by texts for questions. Daily breakfasts were lavish and started early. I considered this my home-away-from-home and will stay again on my next trip to hue.

ミニバーのワインの価格が不備であったが 自分達の非を認めず英語が分からないふりをして飽くまでどこにも表示されていなかった価格を払わされた こちらが飲んだことは間違いない事実だが そんな価格が表示されていれば決して開栓しなかった それもそこそこ美味ければ諦めもつくが ワインとは言い難い代物だった 恐らく保存状態が悪かったのだろう 一生でもう二度と訪れる事はない土地だが これでフエでの良い思い出が台無しになってしまった
Notre meilleur séjour actuellement au vietnam depuis 1 mois.

Hotel müsste mal dringend renoviert werden. Zimmer objekte und flur dreckig. Haben uns ohne extra kosten early check in gegeben. Shampoo, zahnpasta und co wiederaufüllbar. Essen vom vor und vorvortag. Hier wird einfach an allem gespart.
Wi-fi connection is good. Breakfast is delicious. Room is clean. Almost things are good enough.
値段はお手頃ですが 部屋番号広くコストパフォーマンスがいいホテルでした 朝ご飯も美味しかったです

Comfortable, clean and very efficient. It s no criticism of the hotel itself to say that it is located some distance from the main restaurant and bar areas, and barely an inconvenience since taxis and cyclos are readily available. The location actually means the surroundings are considerably quieter than you would expect in a city. A very enjoyable place to stay.
高齢なのでホテル滞在時間が長いとリバービューにワンランクだけアップしました 広い寝室 広い応接 居間 バーカウンター ベランダも8畳近くあり トイレも2つありました 正直仰天です

Hotel was really clean and modern with comfortable rooms. A really good selection for breakfast and friendly staff. A bit further out from the citadel complex, about half hour walk but only 10 minute walk to the train station.
Could not fault hotel except for a hard bed. I didnt ask for another room which im sure they would have given me as i wasnt there long.
Absolut high class comfort, exelent service. Get a room facing away from road

I always stay at the mondial while working with the university. It is walking distance and the hotel staff are exceptionally helpful and friendly. The breakfast on the roof is very serene and a pleasure to experience every morning
전체적으로 괜찮았습니다. 다낭역에서도 도보로 이동 가능하고, 근처에 음식점들도 많고 시설도 괜찮았습니다.

Our stay was very good. The girls on the front desk very helpful. Only problem tour desk guy forgot to book our trip on the dragon boat but the front desk girls fixed the problem. All in all a pleasant stay.
Good location, friendly staff.
My stay at this hotel was just fantastic the staff was so helpful with tours, meals and other questions i had i would definitely recommend this hotel

Wir waren 3 nächte im mondial hotel hue. Das hotel ist schon etwas älter und die einrichtung etwas abgenutzt. Allerdings war alles recht ordentlich und sauber. Das frühstück wird in der 9 etage serviert, man hat die möglichkeit, auch auf der terrasse zu sitzen. Das frühstück ist überwiegend asiatisch, es gibt aber auch brot, etwas käse und wurst, obst undkuchen. Für ein paar tage würde ich das hotel empfehlen.

This is an incredible resort style hotel. The staff remembered me even after a couple days and brought me coffee the way i liked it. That is truly amazing. The breakfast was outstanding and huge and had everything you wanted. The pool was clean and warm and inviting. The grounds of the facility were pristine and well taken care of. You couldn t beat the location and could walk all of hue from it. It really is a wonderful location and i would stay here again twice over. )

Goed hotel, maar ligging is niet in de buurt van eettentjes. Wel op loopafstand van keizerlijke stad. Goed ontbijtbuffet op 9e verdieping met groot terras en uitzicht op de keizerlijke stad. Fietsen en scooters te huur in het hotel. Personeel doet zeer haar best om alles voor de gasten te regelen en het naar je zin te maken. Verzorging zwembad kan beter, oogt nog wat rommelig. Hotel is een beetje sfeerloos.
It was ok, nice location on the beach but the hotel is under construction which started early and woke us up.
鉄道を利用する人はここに泊ると便利だ 幹線道路沿いに建っているが 部屋の中では騒音はあまり聞こえず安眠できる デラックスの部屋は広々とし テレビの映りは良く ネット接続も安定している 冷蔵庫に入っていた果物の一部が変質し始めていたのは残念 パインの切れ端 朝食は種類が多く 麺類は二種類ある 中級のやや上のホテルと言った印象だ 鉄道利用するときは また泊るかも

My colleague and i stayed for 2 weeks while volunteering at university hospital in hue. The room is comfortable for a long stay and the staff/breakfast/parking are all excellent. I plan to stay at this hotel when i return to hue.
Very dated. Seems to be used solely for overnight bus bookings. Very big beds, looks much better in photos than in real life. Very large rooms and beds. Had a pleasant stay
The overall experience was good. Good breakfast and food in the restaurant. Friendly and efficient staff. Our room was a bit noisy though and wifi not always reliable...
Hotel was fine. It was an old hotel that could use an update. But great location. Good big room. Overall a good stay
La chambre est spacieuse, propre. Les staffs sont très gentils et souriants !
駅に割と近いので交通の便がいいです お風呂には バスタブがあり 冷蔵庫もありました 部屋も広かったですし 朝食バイキングも 食事が充実していました
Hotel staff is very helpful and friendly. Breakfast spread is decent. Room is clean but mattress can be more comfortable. Hotel should supply 2 pillows as a minimum standard.
La chambre était bien mais le matelas un peu dure. Pour le reste, le service était très bon, le buffet correct. Bien placé pour voir la citadelle et la cité impériale.
Everythings is good except for the wi-fi which is disconnected most of the time.
Service was good. Staff very helpful
I liked the service very much ,but they reallyneed to update their fitness center big time and also the pool water needs to be more clean
직원들의 친철함속에 잘 쉬었습니다.
Good.
A bit old but good for the money
The room door is hard to close, need to pull/push a little bit hard. Minor renovation will make it much better. Otherwise, it s a good place.
Nice hotel
Staff were super helpful and spoke good english. Would 100 stay again. Great breakfast. Pool area nice. Big room.
Everything is great!
Le petit déjeuner était excellent et varié! les installations dataient un peu. Bien situé. Restaurants pas trop loin

First visit to hue and this hotel is central location a very good choice. Smooth check in . Very large room with refrigerator and property safe. Great shower and bed very comfortable. Definitely have the breakfast on 9th floor with eggs made to order and extras. Also the coffee bar of choices. Convenient atm in lobby which i used with no issues. Visiting hue consider this hotel. J leon.

Le personnel est très gentil, les installations sont correctes, je dirais un 3 étoiles. Malheureusement, notre chambre était directement en dessous des salles de réception et il y avait un party donc tous les murs de notre chambre vibraient avec la musique. Nous pouvions même entendre les gens parler et chanter. Heureusement, le party n a pas fini trop tard.

I was on the 3rd floor and there was very little sound proofing. Other guests kept me up to midnight and some guests plus hotel staff were making a lot of noise outside my room from 6am. The beds also weren t comfortable.
Very bad service for local (vietnamese) guestes
Very bad service!!!

We booked 5 rooms at the same date at hotel.com. This hotel receptionist asked me more money for the kids breakfast , if was fine , but i told them not everyone want to have breakfast , they needs sleep late. But the hotel still charged the 3 person breakfast fee. But i told him we have 5 people want to sleep late, they don t go to restuarant have breakfast, he answer that . You need to paid!

Very accommodating stay from the hotel managers and staffs. Highly recommended when you are in hue, vietnam. My family will definitely stay at mondial hotel next time we are in hue. Huge thanks, mondial hotel hue. Much love.
Quiet location but still in walking distance to everything. If you like walking.
Allt var utmärkt på hotellet utan läget. Långt bort från restauranger och sevärdheter.

The restaurant manager at breakfast was fantastic...we re vegetarian and he went out of his way to make sure my 2 boys had what they wanted .. He even got the chef to make vegetarian pho for my son...great guy
施設が古いのが難点

We had a lovely stay at mondial hotel and would happily return on our next visit to hue. The standout feature of this hotel is undoubtedly the staff they are exceptionally helpful, friendly, attentive, and professional. From check-in to check-out, they were always making sure we had everything we needed, offering service with genuine warmth and care. The hotel itself is clean and well-maintained. Our room was spotless and equipped with all the necessary amenities. One thing to note is that irons are not provided in the rooms due to hotel policy, but they do offer an ironing service for a fee, which is a helpful alternative. The buffet breakfast was excellent, with a wide variety of dishes to choose from and a generous selection of both hot and cold drinks. It was a great way to start each day. However, there were a couple of areas that could be improved. The water pressure in our shower was very low, and the temperature control was quite extreme switching from cold to hot too suddenly, making it difficult to find a comfortable setting. These are small but important details that affected our overall comfort and are the main reasons we couldn t give a full five-star rating. That said, the overall experience was very positive, and we truly appreciated the hospitality and service. We look forward to staying here again on our next trip to hue.
Very cozy room and convenient.

The hotel is just okay room is spacious with most basic amenities that you can expected from a 4 stars hotel. I stayed in a room with a big balcony, but not much view as it not at high floor and view is mostly blocked trees or next building (all rooms with balcony are at 3rd floor). Wifi is free and fast, but not so stable, i have to constantly change different wifi points for connection. Breakfast is great with many choices of international and local dishes, restaurant for breakfast is at the top floor which provides great view of hue city. Location is ok , close to many cafes and most tourists attractions are within short driving distance. Overall, i think it s a nice hotel for the money i paid, after all there are not so many choices of good 4 stars or 5 stars hotels in the city.

The staff at the mondial was incredibly friendly. While the accommodations were not super expensive, they were not the best, either. The bathroom was very old and worn, as was the bed. There are ac boxes in the rooms, but there were cracks in the door leading to the balcony. Overall not bad, but (as a family with a small child) next time, we ll opt for something a little nicer.
Nice hotel but not walkable distance to sites and restaurants

Very nice hotel with very good buffet style breakfast. There weren t a lot of dining options in the immediate area but the staff gave excellent recommendations for restaurants that were a short taxi drive away. Quite close to the imperial city as well.

Immenses chambre toute vitree, personnel au top, seul beau rien ne fonctionne dans salle de sport comme souvent, seul 1 tapis se cours. Nous avions choisi une chambre de 45m2 rapport qualité prix excellent petit déjeuner parfait sur la terrasse toit

Great stay nice room on 8th floor but could be a little noisy from footsteps above in restaurant. Food was nice and restaurant suited western tastes and offered knives and forks for us untrained with chop sticks.

Mondial hotel hue is a lovely hotel, and we enjoyed our stay very much. We are especially grateful for the help they provided when i suffered a medical episode and needed to go to hospital for several days - no ask was too big, they asked my partner about my health whenever they saw her, and they were very welcoming when i returned. Cannot recommend their service highly enough!

Arrival was a warm welcome, room was good but air con looked like it had water damage because of leaking stains. The balcony had no furniture. From the 2 floors we been on (room floor and pool floor). It looks like you can smoke inside the hall way by the looks of the bins with ashtrays (cigarette butts)
スタッフも親切で心地よく過ごせました
部屋は広く良かった

Excellent séjour. Emplacement et service à la hauteur de la présentation sur le site. Petit déjeuner très varié et de bonne qualité. Les hôtesses d accueil très disponibles . Meilleur hôtel de notre séjour.
Located in walk distance from hue station, old but clean and well maintained facilities. Staffs were the best i ve ever met in vietnam.
Parfaite emplacement personnel au soins
Court séjour d une nuit. La chambre était plutot propre et convenable. Personnel agréable.
Hôtel pas cher un peu vétuste mais correct dans l ensemble

L hôtel est propre mais vétuste. Son emplacement est bien. Nous avons souhaité des vélos (notifié dans le descriptif) mais pour tout l hôtel il n y a que 3 vélos. Et malgré nos demandes (2 chambres donc 4 personnes) aucune solution n a été trouvé ! d autant qu il y a la rivière aux parfums à faire en vélo !!!
Staffs are very nice. The room is spacious. The flooring in the room needs renovation. The bed need a mattress pad to make it more comfortable.
C est un bon rapport qualité-prix
L hôtel est situé dans une petite ruelle tranquille. La chambre est très bien et propre. Le déjeuner est bon.
Nice place to stay in hue. Staff very helpful and kind. Mattress a bit hard.
Great place in hue. Very clean and great location! highly recommend.

We loved this hotel. Was in excellent location to explore hue. We loved to come back after a morning of exploration and enjoy the rooftop pool. Breakfast was plentiful and tasty. Staff were lovely. Would stay again.
スタッフがフレンドリーで 列車の切符手配も手伝っていだだき大変助かりました 自転車も無料レンタルでき良かったです
베트남 6일 가족 여행 중에 머물렀던 4성급 호텔 중에 제일 좋았어요. 깨끗함, 조식 모두 만족스러웠어요
Moonlight hotel in hue gives you great value for little money. Very good rooms and splendid breakfast. The hotel is 4 star and that s well deserved.

Hôtel très bien situé, au centre. Très grande chambre avec vue sur la rivière des parfums. Salle de bains avec une fenêtre, donc très lumineuse (mais aussi un peu chaude, en août !). Privilégier les étages élevés si vous êtes sensibles à la musique live, car il y a un bar à côté, mais les concerts ne durent que jusqu à 22 heures. Le personnel est très agréable, serviable et parle bien l anglais. Petit déjeuner-buffet dans les standards, au 12ème étage, avec une vue splendide sur la ville. Bar panoramique, le soir. Une belle adresse pour hué.
훼여행자거리 중심에 위치에 있으며 강변과 시장의 접근성이 매우 좋습니다. 직원들의 친절과 배려가 있는 훌륭한 호텔입니다.
Great location
Rooms very clean, staffs kindly to give us check in early without charge. Location is very good. We can walk to almost all best attractions
Really good loation right in the cntre and walking distance of citadel plus all the nightlife. Staff not overly heloful but could have just been the language barrier
在這一區的住宿好像都避免不了樓下或附近的pub聲 高層樓都聽得到 低樓層聲音更大 如果在這一區住宿要考量pub進去
Sehr freundliches personal, sehr gutes frühstück, zentrale lage aber ruhig.
だいぶ古くなってい来ているがしっかりとメンテされている 朝食は種類も多く楽しめる スタッフの対応もよく ホテル自体は満足できる シャワーの水圧は弱いことと ジムの機械が壊れているのは問題 他の人にもあるが とにかく近隣のクラブの演奏がうるさい サッシも防音ではないので夜中まで騒音のように聞こえてくるので のんびりしたい人にはお勧めしない
아주 만족 합니다. 06 07 08.2019 guest i am sorry. Massage staff tip because there was no money

Die lage des hotels ist super, die zimmer waren sauber und schön. Lediglich würde ich beim nächsten besuch des hotels ein zimmer im stock wählen, da im stock sich das restaurant befindet und man früh morgens geräusche von dort hört und geweckt wird, wenn mit den vorbereitungen für das frühstück begonnen wird. Die aussicht ist klasse.
Great hotel to stay at in hue. Walking distance to the citadel. Staff are very helpful. It is right in the backpacker district so be prepared for tourists and a little bit of noise.
Located in pham ngu lao street. Walkable to any dinning options, tourist activities and stunning views.
Okay but not great.facilities and hotel looks old.good location though.
Goede ligging, klein beetje gedateerd maar wel netjes en vriendelijk behulpzaam personeel.
立地が良く 何かと便利です 建物自体は古いですが 清潔に保たれています 他の方の口コミにもありましたが 周りにバーなどが多いので夜は音楽が騒がしいです その代わり 食事をする場所には困りません ホテルのスパもとても良かったです

Mi mujer y yo nos alojamos en el moonlight hotel en agosto de la ubicación es muy buena en una calle que es peatonal en el fin de semana y con muchos restaurantes alrededor. La habitación era espaciosa y con buenas vistas. El desayuno era bueno. La zona de piscina era un poco pequeña y el jacuzzi no funcionaba. Reservamos algunos transportes con el hotel sin problemas.
Bien situé chambres confortables belle salle de bain massage sur place à très bon prix

We were very happy with this hotel, which matched it s billing. Loved the rooftop bar and views. Great location for the night life particularly as it was in the traffic free area (evenings only). Will stay there again.

Et lite, men veldig fint hotell med bra beliggenhet i gamlebyen. Mat og drikke var også veldig bra, men personalet var ekstremt hyggelige og serviceminded - fantastisk søte, hyggelige og ikke minst hjelpsomme! kan anbefales på det varmeste og kommer veldig gjerne tilbake ved en annen anledning.
Excelente hotel...atendimento ótimo..boa acomodação.. Localização otima

2019年4月に２泊 ハノイから行くと フエの暑いこと 周辺に飲食店や旅行会社がたくさんあり とても便利な場所でした ９階の部屋からはフーン川がよく見えました 部屋は清潔で設備も十分でした ただ ホテルの隣のレストランが22時頃まで大音量でロックミュージックなどを流していて それがかなり不快でした 朝食会場のレストランは最上階にあり 眺望抜群 味もよし フロントのスタッフはとても感じが良かったです

Hôtel très bien situé en zone piétonne le soir à hué, seul bémol à coté de l hôtel bar ou boite de nuit avec musique forte jusque vers 23h. La clim était un peu fatiguée, la baignoire à remous style années 80 un peu dépassée , le coffre fort ne permet pas de ranger un ordinateur portable ... Les rideaux occultants sont de bonne qualité, mais ne permettent pas un noir complet. Le petit déjeuner était très satisfaisant en rapport qualité/prix, le café comme souvent pas terrible mais le choix de nourriture très bien. Personnel accueillant avec comme souvent verre de bienvenue et un bon pour un petit cocktail au bar de l hôtel.
Had family room next to the street, music from bars made it impossible to sleep, eben after taking my two hearing aids out

Overall this was a good hotel. Location was the best part. 20 min walk to the citadel, both local and expat bars/restaurants on the same block. They also were very helpful in booking me a ride to hoi an. For the disappointments, the gym was lacking, and went to the roof top bar in the afternoon and nobody was there, not even employees (they claim it opens at 10am).

Très bel hôtel mais situé dans une rue très animée.. Et encore nous y sommes arrivés un dimanche soir çà doit être terrible les vendredis et samedis musique trop forte jusque tard dans la nuit.. Si vous voulez pouvoir dormir à partir de minuit, mieux vaut aller voir ailleurs

Great hotel, perfect location since at night no cars in that street but you can hear the music from the streets. Nice small pool at the roof, great spa (even my 6year old daughter had a massage). We only stayed one night - i wish we would have had more time. Will definetly come back again
Wifi signal was weak. Only worked in the washroom. Friendly staff and the place was clean

The staff was helpful and nice . Loved the area , very central. Enjoyed the balcony view. (yes i m a smoker)nice pool. The gym was too small and the jacuzzi was broken (it needs a note) other than that it was nice. Some issues at check out because they mix complementary water with water you have to pay for. I don t even drink water but ended up paying for water because it s confusing what is complementary. So much for brushing your teeth and so on. Well well
ホテルの場所が素晴らしい スタッフがフレンドリー 設備は新しくないが清潔
Room is very clean and comfortable, friendly staff and service. I very sure to come back next time
Hotel room very spacious. Unfortunately the bathroom basin wouldn t drain and the large shower head didn t work either. Generally overall a nice hotel.
This hotel was in the heart of hue where lots of bars, hostels, etc
Perfect location near the river and nightlife/restaurants. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms are modern and very clean.

Hotel is not new but well maintained, bed is large and comfortable. Breakfast has everything you need. Special mention to the front desk staff in general which is one of the most professional i had encounter, flexible, understand your queries and offering solution to anything.
We had an excellent experience at the hotel. The room was spacious and the staff was supportive and accomodating.
La piscina es muy pequeña y con poco sitio para estar, no tiene bar en ella.

Hotellet ligger mycket bra till i hué i ett mysigt och levande område. Nära till bra restauranger, caféer och pubar. Servicen från personalen var toppenbra. Något sliten inredning. Totalt sett väldigt prisvärt hotell.

Great choice for a stay in hue. In addition to the many cultural attractions around hue, the area turns into a large walking street at night on weekends at least. Lots of fun happening spots within easy walking distance of the hotel
Hele mooie en nette accommodatie en het personeel is ontzettend vriendelijk en behulpzaam
Un buon hotel, pulito, in una via centrale con tutto intorno. Ottima la spa! piccolina la piscina.colazione buona e varia. Il personale è cordialissimo.
Very warm walking around hall and elevators. Ac only in room and lobby. Bed was a little hard. And bathtub is very high climb and not comfortable as a shower. Water spills all around it.

Het hotel ligt in dé straat van hue. De airco kan op standje vrieskist en het personeel is enorm vriendelijk en doet je best je naam te onthouden! het ontbijt is top, het zwembad heerlijk en alles is lekker op loopafstand!

Rooftop bar was excellent. Breakfast was very good triple room was more than adequate location was very good staff very helpful snd friendly. Pool was s little disappointing as no real area for sunbathing but still nice to have s swim.
Das hotel ist sehr zentral und das personal ist unglaublich engagiert!

36歳 女性 1人旅行で1泊しました 快適な宿泊となり 感謝しております アクセス 私は鉄道のフエ駅からタクシーで向かいました 確か3分ほどだったかと思います 観光スポットの王宮はじめ寺院4つは大変遠いので タクシーをチャーターして回るのがよいかと思います 市場は徒歩10分程度ですので 歩いて散策しに行きました 朝食 バラエティ豊かなバイキングです ベトナム料理が少しと サラダ 洋食 パン スイーツなど スタッフさんの対応 とても親切でにこやかでした ウエルカムドリンクのジュースが美味しくて 疲れが癒されました 治安 周りにお店やホテルが多く 賑やかなので夜に周辺を歩いてもさほど怖くありませんでした 備品 アメニティ類 必要なものはほぼ揃っているので 荷物が少なくて済みます 助かりました ドライヤー バスローブ スリッパ バスタオル フェイスタオル 歯ブラシと歯磨き粉 綿棒 コーム シャワーキャップ 冷蔵庫 施設 屋上のバーで1杯だけ飲みました 道路を挟んで向かいの若者向け パブの音楽がやや騒々しいのだけ少し残念でした ホテルの責任ではありませんが 部屋までその音が聞こえてくることはありません ジムやプール マッサージは利用せずでした 建物 新しくはないですが 手入れが行き届いておりとても清潔でした
The staff was great super friendly and helpfull. The view from the balcony is good. Sll the ameneties offered were giving. Thsnk you noonlight hotel for good service..
Gutes hotel mit tollem frühstück. Sehr nettes und zuvorkommendes personal. Schönes zimmer.
Great location and very nice staff!

Great value for the money! very clean and spacious rooms with everything you would need. Service was top notch and very good breakfasts. An easy location to walk to restaurants and most sites that you would like to visit. The spa is fantastic, be sure to ask for bona if you want a great massage!! stay here, you won t regret it.
I dont like the hotel, breakfast are not good to america, not asia
宿泊に関して大きな問題はなかったが 最上階の部屋はその上にあるレストランの朝食準備に関わるスタッフの足音で午前5時頃からうるさい 部屋もメゾネットだったので 隣室の話し声やいびきまで聞こえた こちらのも当然聞こえているだろう
We arrived early morning from the sleeper train and left our luggage while going out for the day. Room was very spacious and shower was good. Breakfast also very nice with plenty of options.
獲得升級 很棒
호텔 시설이 쾌적하고 여행자거리와 가까워서 주변 관광이나 휴식 등에 좋았음. 호텔 주변으로 식당이나 주점들이 많고 맛사지샵이 있어 이용에 불편함이 없음.
It was an excellent modern hotel. Great location. Fab breakfast, large comfy rooms with all mod cons. Great value for money and incredible views.
다른 것은 전체적으로 만족하나 단 한가지 밤 늦게까지 계속되는 그처 클럽의 음악소리가 너무 시끄러웠다.
Hotel centrale n ottima posizione. Upgrade gratuito in suite molto molto gradito. Colazione ok
The music from nearby nightclubs was so loud even with the windows shut, there was no way to sleep until it stopped at 12 30 am.
お天気が悪くて残念でしたがスタッフの方々がとても親切でした
便利なロケーション 到着時のスタッフの対応は丁寧で 感じが良かった スパが良くなかったのと 下水のにおいがしたのが難点
Friendly service nice breakfast room good size room nice roof top hot tub
The hotel is in a great location. Rooms could use a little updating, including a faster internet. Otherwise a nice hotel, in a prime location. Would definitely stay there again, when i m back in hue
Great location, simply wonderful stay. You won t be disappointed.
風呂は良つかた 朝ごはんは美味しいです
附近很多商家 很方便
国際会議で交通の便の良い場所と良いことでこのホテルを選んだ リバービューのデラックスタイプであったが 一人で使うには十分な広さであり 朝食はトップフロアで見晴らしがよいレストランで おいしくいただくことができた スタッフは 親切に近隣のレストランなどを案内してくれ タクシーもすぐに呼んでくれた 1点残念なことは プールが狭すぎて 泳ぐには適していない点である
スタッフのハスピタリティも高く 朝食のビュッフェも前日夜に外食したレストランよりも美味しく 部屋の設備 清掃も良く 何も不満がないホテルです

The hotel is in a great location for walking. A lively interesting area. The hotel was great in terms of a good room, lovely staff, but we had 3 nights without much sleep as the nightclubs next door across the road played tremendously loud music until very late. A pity, lovely hotel otherwise

Hotel was in a great spot close to many restaurants though could be a tad too touristy for some. The staff was amazing! the room was nice and breakfast was the typical foray u get at most hotels. Nothing too special. But very kind people and quite helpful with everything. I d recommend staying here if ur visiting hue.
比較舊的酒店 不覺得值4星 只屬於3星 泳池及健身室太早關門了2100就關了 所以睇吾到及指示不夠清晰 早餐吾算好食 另有包天台吧的 welcome drink一杯 在這欣賞夜景算是不錯啊
深夜 外の音がうるさかった ホテルのあつかっているツアーと同じコースをタクシーで周ったら4分の一の値段だった 食事がとてもよかった

Great location, very central, surrounded by shops and restaurants. If you want to cross the river to citadel, or market, it is walkable, but taxis are very inexpensive. Our room was spacious , clean, comfortable, with good a/c and shower. Breakfast was excellent, varied and plentiful. Staff friendly and efficient. Enjoyed our stay, and highly recommend. Pool is smallish, with no sunbathing area. We didn t use it as we were too busy exploring!

Beautiful hotel and wonderful staff. Location was very convenient. I ordered room service and it was very good. Rooms were spacious, clean and comfortable. Breakfast buffet had a great variety. Wifi was okay, i ended using my phone hotspot. Would definitely stay again!
Be sure to get a room on the quiet side, away from the noisy bars.

Property is dated, bathtub is very high and hard to get in and out. The worst part is the staff and pricing, they want to charge extra for additional person staying in the room even though we booked the room with capacity for four. They originally asked for 700,000vnd per pax per night and then changed to 600,000vnd. And then the next day when we had a visitor they asked for 200,000vnd if she was staying overnight. They afraid our guest would spend the night and took her id and even came to our room at 10pm and escort our guest out (though she was heading out). That s not a way to treat guests. Overall, hotel is old, saw spider in the bathroom, staff is rude, pricing is inconsistent, a total scam. I would never stay here again. Be aware!
Loved it, would come back

Very lovely hotel in a central location. A short walk to the river and surrounded by cafes, bars and restaurants . The hotel has lovely wooden floors and spacious rooms. The staff were welcoming and very helpful.

Excellent reception staff and welcome. Unfortunately a major water problem in the bathroom made it unuseable until fixed - this should have been picked up prior to us booking in. Pool area shabby and water cloudy. No skybar open. Breakfast just average for 4 star and price.
호텔은 깨끗한 편인데, 뜨거운 물이 안나오고 미지근해요. 그리고 호텔 밖의 술집에서 밤새도록 음악을 너무 크게 틀어 놓아서 잠을 잘 수 없었어요. 저녁 7시부터 새벽 3시까지 울리는데 방이 울릴 정도였어요. 피곤한 몸을 쉬고 싶으시면 다른 곳을 찾는 것이 좋을 듯 하네요.
Noisy area, bad isolation of the floors

Well located and a very comfortable hotel for accommodation and their breakfast was good. Staff was very helpful. We had a complimentary foot massage. Several good restaurants within walking distance.
Nearby club so loud music at night. Pool is a bit small. Buffet food was mediocre. Clean room, friendly, nice helpful staff nonetheless.
Clean rooms and centrally located! highly recommended!

Fantastic hotel in convenient location for exploring the old city. Very comfortable and clean room, with a superb selection available for breakfast. Every member of staff was friendly and extremely helpful. The manager and other staff knew and greeted everyone by name each morning, making us feel very welcome. Couldn t have found a better hotel!
Ms cindy and helen took amazing care of us. Buffet breakfast was delicious and the hotel was 1 minute from walking street. Would definitely stay again.
Nice hotel, great spa, comfortable bed and spacious rooms. However, might need a little upkeep after what was likely a slow period of slight neglect during covid
Highly recommend this hotel if you want a nice place, friendly staff, be close by shopping centers, bars and food, and many more.
I will coming back. Love this it
Excellent facility, great breakfast buffet. Shower was a bit of challenge, water over spray and hot / cold mislabeled but not big issue.
Gut

Goed gelegen in het uitgangskwartier van hue. Vriendelijk personeel goed ontbijt maar wel steeds hetzelfde en als er een horde chinezen ontbijten valt het wel tegen. Kamer ruim en net. Badkamer ruim maar had problemen met het koude water. S avonds na 11 uur was er nooit iemand aanwezig in de receptie, veiligheid ??? aan te bevelen.

Chambre convenable mais j ai eu du mal a gérer la temperature de la douche. De plus nous etions juste en dessous de la salle du petit déjeuner donc pas de grasse matinée. Personnel très gentil, petit dej au top ! l hôtel est situé dans une rue très animée ce qui est parfait pour les restaurants et bars. Mais également beaucoup de bruit (bar / boite de nuit) la nuit
Staff were very helpful and friendly. Had no problem with communication.
My second time at the moonlight hotel. Rooms were good. Other guests noisy when arriving late. Great views. Breakfast was very good.
Very good location. Quite nosy due to the location. Very good service and staff very helpful.

Overall nice hotel, walkable distance from the night market. I picked the river view side room. It is awesome to watch sunrise and sunset over the river on your balcony. My only complaint is that their tap water is malfunction in my first room, only hot water?! but friendly immediately apologied and changed another room for me.

We had a great stay at this hotel. The pool was not available but we ve been gifted 2 free drinks as compensation. The breakfast was the best we had until now in vietnam. The reception was very friendly and helpful. I recommend this hotel.
Tiếng ồn của các quán bar xung quanh gây ảnh hưởng đến giấc ngủ
Lễ tân, nhân viên ở đây đều rất nice và nhiệt tình. Một điểm trừ đáng buồn là phòng mình ngay cạnh chỗ thi công nên khá ồn và khó ngủ

Mình nhận phòng, mới tắm xong, ra nằm nude ở giữa giường, rèm phòng tắm vẫn kéo lên trên nên nhìn tử cửa vào là thấy nguyên cái giường mà mình mới tắm xong nên nằm nude ở đó.hk không bấm chuông, tự mở cửa vào để đặt áo tắm vì tưởng kh có khách. Nghiệp vụ thiếu sót, mở cửa thấy mình như thế mới biết. May là hk nữ chứ nam thì sao. Mẹ mình còn không tự ý vào phòng mình như thế, mẹ còn không thấy cơ thể mình như thế. Rồi lỡ khách đang sinh hoạt nam nữ thì sao. Hk cũng không dọn ấm đun nước. Sợ thật sự. May là khách trước chỉ bỏ nhân sâm hay cái gì vào nấu thôi nhé, chứ khách mà bỏ chất bẩn, hay gì thì sao. Cách âm kém, cứ nghe tiếng mở cửa là mình lại sợ có người vào phòng như hồi trưa, chốt cửa hư. Kháchsạn 4 sao mà giờ thật sự nấu nước cứ phải nấu 1 lần đổ đi chứ không tin được các bạn, không dọn dẹp thật sự mất niềm tin. Tivi cũ không có youtube. Bellman không chào khách, thấy mình vào thì chỉ đi ra nói mình chị để xe đó thì đừng khóa cổ nha. Hồi mình ở khách sạn khác, bellman thấy khách là mở cửa, xin chào, gọi xe, nói chị ở trong cho mát có xe rồi em gọi cho. Còn ở đây thì quá tệ.

Mình đến nghỉ vào dịp lễ 30.4. Khách sạn rất cũ và dơ. Chỗ để xe chật hẹp và lễ tân thái độ không nhiệt tình (chắc là chủ khách sạn) tụi mình đến huế lúc tối muộn, tầm 9g và lên nhận phòng soạn đồ ra, tắm xong thì quyết định đi ăn khuya. Lúc đó khoảng 10h30 thì xuống dắt xe đi ăn thì bị lễ tân phàn nàn con gái con lứa khuya rồi còn đi đâu nữa? tụi mình bảo là dạ tụi con đi ăn chứ chạy trong đà nẵng ra gặp mưa chưa ăn tối thì chú vẫn giữ thái độ miệt thị 2 đứa mình và dặn về trước 12h. Chú đóng cửa. Đến lúc tụi mình về thì chú yêu cầu mình để xe ở ngoài khoá cổ, nhưng những xe khác được dắt vào nhà nên mình không đồng ý vì đang lễ khách đông lỡ có mất thì phiền. Nên mình yêu cầu được dắt xe vào như các bạn khác thì chú bảo tự dắt đi, chú không dắt mình bảo dốc này cao cháu không tự dắt được, nhờ chú dắt dùm thì chú vẫn cái thái độ miệt thị tụi mình là con gái con lứa đi chơi khuya mới về, tuổi thanh niên mà dắt chiếc xe cũng không xong ... Ủa? rồi thời gian 2 đêm nghỉ tại khách sạn cũng gặp nhiều vấn đề không hài lòng vì còn quá nhiều vấn đề xãy ra ở đây. Nói chung mình sẽ không bao giờ quay lại. Ám ảnh đến 1 đời
